loans.name: Marta Emma

texts.es: Marta Emma D. 52 años D. edad, resiD. en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual lo conforman su esposo y 3 hijos los cuales ya son mayores D. edad y trabajan como empleados. Ella pose una tienda la cual ha logrado establecer en su hogar D. residencia y  mantener activa por muchos años. Para ella lo más importante es que su familia este bien y cuente con las condiciones necesarias para poder vivir tranquilamente. Su negocio es muy conocido en la zona y muchas personas demandan los productos que ella comercializa ya que Marta se caracteriza por ser una mujer creativa, servicial y honesta. Su sueño es ver su negocio crecer aun más D. lo que ha crecido, con el fin D. mejorar su nivel D. ventas y por consecuencia su nivel D. ingresos. Esto la ha hecho tomar la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra D. diversidad D. productos D. tienda (frijoles, arroz, azúcar, golosinas, pan dulce, aceite, detergente, etc.) que le permitan lograr sus aspiraciones y poder tener acceso a una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Marta Emma is 52 years old and lives in her own house with her family which comprises her husband and 3 children who are all adults and work as employees. She has had a shop for many years which she managed to set up in her house. The most important thing for her is that her family be well and have the necessary conditions to live peacefully. Her business is very well known in the area and many people ask for the products that she sells as Marta is a creative, helpful and honest woman. Her dream is to see her business grow even more than it already has so as to improve her sales and thus her income. This has maD. her take the decision to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to invest in her business with the purchase of a variety of products (beans, rice, sugar, sweets, pastries, oil, detergent, etc.) which will allow her to achieve her aspirations and have access to a better quality of .life.

loans.use: to buy beans, sugar, sweets, pastries, oil, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is single and has a 13-year-old child who attends school. For the past five years, she has been managing a green grocer to make a living. She also rears dairy goats.

Joyce is requesting a loan for 30,000 KES, which she will use to buy dairy goats and tomatoes.  In the next five years, Joyce wants to become the major supplier of vegetables in the local market.

loans.use: To purchase tomatoes and dairy goats

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a married woman with one child in school. Her husband is a businessman who contributes to the provision of basic family needs. She has a house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees for her child. 

She has operated a vegetable stall for the past two years; in addition, she also owns a retail shop. Her potential clients are her neighbors. She faces a major challenge of seasonality where demand is low during the rainy season. She dreams of expanding her business in the future.

With the 10,000 KES loan she wants to purchase vegetables for her vegetable stall. She decided to join Yehu because of easy accessibility of loan facilities.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables for her vegetable stall.

loans.name: Lora

texts.en:
Lora, a 38-year-old married woman with five children, four of whom are in school, has a business selling bananas, tomatoes, and onions in Hai Mahad branch in Yei, South Sudan. She has had this business for four years.

Lora requested this loan through BRAC South Sudan in the hope of expanding her business. She says that the extra income arising from the loan will help her to pay for the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase more onions, bananas, and tomatoes for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more artificial hair, hair lotion, spray, soap and shampoo for her business.

loans.name: María Celia

texts.es: María Celia D. 55 años D. edad, resiD. en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo y su hija D. 17 años D. edad. Ella se dedica a la venta D. diferentes productos principalmente artículos D.  librería los cuales los comercializa D. manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas donD. ella habita. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora para la cual su familia es su principal inspiración. Tiene muchos años D. dedicarse a este negocio por lo que ya cuenta con mucha clientela  y muchos reconocimientos en la zona. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y es por ella que se esfuerza día con día para poder darles el pan D. cada día. Ha  tomado la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad D. artículos como: lapiceros, papel, cuadernos, marcadores, plumones, lápices, y D. mas  materiales que permitan atraer a mas clientes. Confía plenamente en Dios y en su trabajo que logrará cumplir su sueño y dará a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: María Celia is 55 years old and lives in her own house with her family which comprises her husband and daughter who is 17 years old. She sells different products, mainly stationary which she sells as a street vendor in different areas where she lives. She is a very hardworking and enterprising woman for whom her family is her main inspiration. She has been in this business for many years and already has many customers and many contacts in the area. For her the most important thing is her family and it is for her family that she works hard every day to give them their daily bread. She has taken the decsion to ask INTEGRAL for a loan in order to buy a variety of articles such as: pens, paper, notebooks, markers, pencils and more items which will allow her to attract more customers. She relies on God and her work to achieve her dreams and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of articles such as: pens, paper, markers, notebooks, pencils, etc.

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan is a 39 year old married woman who has 7 children. Her husband is a driver and she is an employee at one of the factories in Jordan.
To be able to help in supporting the family income, Hanan also started making decorative pieces 3 years ago. These items look like plants and flowers. Hanan makes the pieces using plastic and other materials, while still keeping her original job at the factory.

Now Hanan has applied for a loan in order to help her proceed with her business and open a specialty store for selling what she makes.

loans.use: to help her proceed with her business and open a specialty store for selling what she makes.

loans.name: Sophy

texts.en:
Sophy is a married woman with five children, four of whom attend school while one is still too young for school. Her husband is a crane drive and contributes, financially to the family's basic needs. Sophy has a house with neither electricity, nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees her children. 

Sophy has operated a tailoring shop for the past ten years. Her potential clients are her neighbors. She faces a major challenge of machine break downs. She dreams of establishing another shop and employing someone else.

With the KES20,000 she wants to purchase cloth materials for her tailoring shop. She decided to join Yehu because it helps people financially.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials for her tailoring shop.

loans.name: Risper

texts.en:
Risper is a married woman with two school going children. Her husband is a fisherman and contributes financially to provide for the family's basic needs. Risper has a house with neither electricity, nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees her children. 

Risper has operated a cafe for the past two years. Her potential clients are the local area residents. She faces a major challenge of seasonality, where demand is low during the dry season because of lack of food. She dreams of establishing another café in the future.

With the KES 40,000 loan she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil. She would also like to expand the café structure. She decided to join Yehu because of its favorable terms and conditions.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil and also to expand the café structure.

loans.name: Jason

texts.en: Jason is a hardworking business man, aged 41. He is married and blessed with five children. For the last nine years, he has been managing a retail shop to make a living. He has been able to retain his business because of the financial support from Faulu Kenya. In the next 5 years, he wants to manage a wholesale business. He is requesting for a loan of 50,000 Kenya shillings to buy sugar and maize flour.

loans.use: to buy sugar and maize flour.

loans.name: Maria Lourdes

texts.es:
La Señora María es de la ciudad de Santaní, vive en su casa propia. Ella tiene un Copetín en la zona del Mercado Municipal, ella es una Señora muy emprendedora, trabajadora y creativa, es una cliente recurrente de la Fundación y le agradece por darle la oportunidad de ayuda a su negocio. Su objetivo es ampliar su negocio y asi mas adelante poder tener un comedor.
Ella comenta que su negocio la ha ayudado a salir adelante y mantener a su familia, dice que tiene muchos clientes lo cual le genera muy buenos ingresos. Le gustaría poder seguir con su negocio para poder ir creciendo día a día.>P>
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, golosinas y otros para el abastecimiento de su copetín, con lo cual podrá cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
María’s from the city of Santaní.  She has a snack bar in the municipal market.  She’s a very enterprising woman; hardworking and creative.  She’s a recurrent client of the Fundación and she thanks it for giving her the opportunity of help for her business.  Her goal is to enlarge her business so that later on she can have an eatery.

She comments that her business has helped her get ahead and to support her family.  She says that she has many customers which allows her to generate good income.  She’d like to be able to stay in business and to make it grow more each day.

She is asking for the loan to buy soft-drinks, snacks and other items to stock her snack bar in order to meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, snacks and other stock items for her snack bar.

loans.name: Aputu

texts.en: Aputu, a 30-year-old a single woman with no children, has operated a business selling clothes in Dar es Salam branch in Yei South Sudan for the past four years. Aputu requested this loan through BRAC South Sudan with the hopes of expanding her business. She says that the extra income arising from it will help her to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for sale.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a business man, aged 25. He is married and blessed with two children. For the last two years, he has been managing a motorbike transport business to earn a living. He has employed one person in his business. Previously, he used to farm and to work as a contractor, as a casual worker. In the next 5 years, he wants to buy a van for his transport business. John is requesting for a loan of 15,000 Kenya shillings to service his motorbike.

loans.use: to service his motorbike.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medicine.

loans.name: Charity

texts.en:
Charity is 30 years old, a married woman with five children, two of whom are in the school. She has a business of selling onions and tomatoes in Dar Essalam branch in Yei, south Sudan. She has been in this business for six years.

Charity requested this loan through BRAC south Sudan with the hopes of expanding her business. She says that the profits from this loan will help her to build a concrete house in the future.

loans.use: to able her purchase more onions and tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 38 years old, a married woman with five children, two of whom are in the school. She has a business of selling beer in Dar es Salam branch in Yei, south Sudan. She has been in this business for four years.

Mary has requested this loan through BRAC, south Sudan, to be able to purchase or order for more beer to sell. The extra income from this loan will be used for building a house for the children in the future.

loans.use: to be able to purchase more beer to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to renovate the school.

loans.name: Mikel

texts.en:
This is a time of new beginnings for Mikel. Four months ago, he and his wife gave birth to a baby girl, and he is currently getting his new clothing line off the ground. Mikel works full-time at a university while being a new dad and an entrepreneur. His goal is for his business, Eli Pierce, is to provide the working man with stylish dress shirts that “fit like a glove”. Mikel started the business from his personal savings and has gone through the production process a few times with samples of his shirt designs made by the manufacturer. He says the biggest challenge for Eli Pierce will be penetrating the men’s fine shirts market and getting the website up and running.

This loan from ACCION USA will enable Mikel to pay upfront for the fabric needed to produce the first set of bulk inventory. The loan is also helping Mikel start the business website so he can take orders online and become profitable.

loans.use: To pay for first bulk production of shirts and start the business website.

loans.name: Jeffrey

texts.en:
Jeffrey has over 20 years experience managing and buying in retail. He and his wife, Jennifer, created a business plan for an educational toy store in 2007 and they were open for operation by 2008. Jennifer is a speech pathologist and spends a few days a week helping at the store. Jeffrey says his toy store, Learn All About It, is currently in a large shopping plaza but still has the mom and pop feel to it. Jeffrey takes pride in having excellent relationships with his customers and with all of his experience in retail is confident about the success of the store.

This is Jeffrey’s second loan from ACCION USA. He will use it to cushion inventory purchasing during the upcoming holidays. Learn All About It has been growing every year and this loan will help free up cash flow as they get into the busy season.

Check out Jeffrey's business website here:
http://www.learnallaboutittoys.com/

loans.use: To purchase inventory for the upcoming holidays.

loans.name: Eliana

texts.en:
Eliana is from Peru and came to the United States to seek a new life and better economic opportunities. While maintaining a full-time job, she owns and operates a successful family run health food vending business, which she opened less than a year ago. While promoting healthier living to customers, Eliana sees this business venture as an opportunity to be an entrepreneur and help her family become independent. Her son helps manage the store and other family members help serve customers. Eliana decided to open the store because she saw a need to create healthier food choices for people in her community while satisfying their taste buds. They sell natural juices, milk shakes, smoothies, protein, health foods and other nutritional products. Eliana has explained that her greatest successes included overcoming the roadblocks that presented themselves with starting a business, such as not knowing how to operate and finance the health food store.

Eliana will use this loan to purchase food and drink preparation equipment for the store. This equipment will allow a higher volume of customer orders and more variety in the products they sell. Eliana wants her customers to have more choices and carry out orders faster so the store can expand and bring in more income for her family.

loans.use: To pay for food preparation equipment.

loans.name: Ototo

texts.en: Ototo, a hardworking 38-year-old businessman, is married and blessed with two children who are still in school. For the last 11years, he has been managing a retail shop to earn a living. He also runs a grocery shop for extra income.  Ototo, who hopes to grow his business into wholesale within five years, is requesting a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to buy sugar and rice.

loans.use: to buy sugar and rice.

loans.name: Joice

texts.en: Joice, a 35-year-old divorced woman with one child who is not yet in school, has had a business selling charcoal in Dar es Salam branch in Yei, South Sudan for the past five years. She has requested this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase more charcoal to sell, and says that the extra income arising from the loan will help her to buy a cow in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Hadjah

texts.en:
Hadjah is married with five children, two of whom go to school. She also takes care of additional family members. Hadjah has a business of selling bananas. She wants to use this loan to buy more bunches of bananas. She has applied for a loan of 1,000,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from MCDT SACCO. She has been in this business for 10 years. 

Besides selling bananas, she generates additional income from rental houses. She sells her bananas at the market and sells to all categories of people at retail. Her major business challenges include the ever-increasing price of bananas and the rainy season. 

Hadjah's goals and aspirations are to start going to villages of Masaka and Mbarara for bananas. She resides in a house which she owns and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Hadjah's greatest monthly expenses include school fees and electricity bills.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of bananas

loans.name: Adriana

texts.es: La señora Adriana, es  comerciante de artículos de segunda mano (ropa americana y juguetes) y su esposo es rentista jubilado. Adriana con su actividad y la renta de su esposo cubren los gastos de su familia. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de construcción (calamina, clavos, madera) ya que realizara el techado de una habitación. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Pasankeri  en la Ciudad de La Paz. Esta es la segunda vez que Adriana utiliza el financiamiento disponible en Kiva.
texts.en:
Adriana sells second hand American clothes and toys.  Her husband is a retired pensioner.  Adriana’s business activity and her husband’s pension cover the family expenses.

She needs the loan to buy construction material (sheets of corrugated metal, nails, and wood).  She will put a roof on a room.  She lives in her own house in the Pasankeri  area of the city of La Paz.  This is the second time that Adrian will use a Kiva loan

loans.use: to buy sheets of corrugated metal, nails, wood, and other materials to put a roof on a room in her house.

loans.name: Nuevo Futuro Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVO FUTURO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Silvia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de dulces, comercio, servicios y producción.

La señora Silvia,  indica que este es la primera vez que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por recomendación de sus familiares. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de dulces que viene trabajando desde hace años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de dulces) que comprara de la Ceja y lo venderá en su local de ventas. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la salud y el crédito.

En la fotografía no se encuentra la señora Edith, ya que se encontraba en el consultorio de salud
texts.en:
The A.C. “NUEVO FUTURO” will begin its first cycle as part of the Centro Focal Santiago II. It consists of 8 members and is lead by a board headed by Señora Silvia. The businesses the members of the communal bank are involved in are various among which are: candy sales, services and production.

Señora Silvia says that it is the first time that she works with Pro Mujer, having joined on the recommendation of relatives. She currently has a business selling candy which she has run for years. 

The loan she will now receive is to increase her capital to buy candy which she will purchase in La Ceja and sell in her shop. This kind of work allows her to generate income with which to support her family in any way possible, as she is married and has 2 children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she says that she likes the health benefits and the loans.

In the photo Señora Edith is not present as she was at the health clinic

loans.use: to buy candy.

loans.name: Primicias Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PRIMICIAS” iniciará su quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Santiago II, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Elisabet. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de cosméticos, venta de masitas, venta de dulces, venta de juguetes, venta de papa, venta de coca, venta de sopitas, taller de costura y cortes.

La señora Elizabet,  indica que este es el segundo año que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de coca que viene trabajando desde hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de su tía.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de coca) que comprara de villa Fátima y lo venderá en su local de ventas. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es soltera.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y la atención de salud que la institución.

En la fotografía no se encuentra la señora Dora, ya que no accedio a la misma por motivos culturales.
texts.en:
The A.C. “PRIMICIAS” will begin its 5th cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the communal bank Centro Focal Santiago II. It consists of 9 members and is lead by a board headed by Señora Elisabet. The members of the communal bank run various businesses such as: selling cosmetics selling cookies, selling candy, selling toys, selling potatoes, selling coca, selling soups, running a sewing and tailoring workshop .

Señora Elizabet says that this is the second year that she works with Pro Mujer, being invited to join by a promoter. She has been running a business selling coca for many years now, a business she learned from her aunt.

The loan she is currently obtaining will be used to increase her capital to buy coca which she will purchase at Villa Fatima and later sell in her shop. This kind of work allows her, as she is single, to generate an income to support her family wherever possible.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the training and the health care institute.

Señora Dora does not appear in the photo due to cultural constraints.

loans.use: to buy coca.

loans.name: Alhaji

texts.en:
Alhaji is 33 years old, married, and has four children between the ages of six weeks and 14 years. Three of his children attend school, and he also supports five relatives. He runs a building materials and tools store in Goderich in Sierra Leone. He has one employee working for him. 

He has been in this business for six years and sells building materials, like cement, iron rods, zinc, and pipes at his store. He also earns income from renting a house. Alhaji says that the main challenge to his business is securing more finances to help it grow. 

He requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more iron rods, cement, shovels and pipes. Alhaji says that the extra income from this loan will help cover his family's expenses. In the future, he would like to expand his business by opening more branches of his store in different locations.

loans.use: to purchase more iron rods, cement, zinc, and other building materials.

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es:
Juliana es una mujer de 55 años soltera, no tiene ningún tipo de educación formal. Tiene un hijo de 12 años quien está estudiando. Además mantiene y cuida a dos sobrinos que viven con ella desde hace algunos años. Los cuatro viven en la parroquia "Luz de América" en el cantón "Santo Domingo". Santo Domingo es cantón y ciudad de la nueva Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, que era parroquia rural de Quito,  Santo Domingo está entre la costa y la sierra del Ecuador, punto de enlace entre Quito, Guayaquil, Portoviejo,  y otras ciudades importantes. Situado en los flancos externos de la cordillera occidental, así como en la planicie costeña inferior a los 1000 msnm, es la zona de mayor pluviosidad del país. Tiene una gran riqueza hidrológica: existen cinco cuencas y micro cuencas importantes. Es una zona climática lluviosa subtropical, posee una temperatura promedio de 22 °C.

Juliana trabaja en el campo, plantando cacao y criando animales, dice que este oficio lo aprendió de su familia y que lo ha venido realizando toda su vida. Trabaja todo el día a todas horas, a veces le ayudan sus hijos. Quiere invertir en plantas de cacao y abono de esta manera podrá obtener un mejor ingreso. Considera a sus sobrinos como sus hijos y al igual que al suyo propio quiere verlos profesionales. Es su primer crédito con Fundación Alternativa y durante la entrevista le contó al oficial de crédito que lo que le gustaba de esta institución era que le hacían "sentir importante". 

Su sueño es poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y sobre todo poder seguir trabajando para que a sus hijos no les falte nada.
texts.en:
Juliana is a 55 year old single woman with no formal education. She has a 12 year old son who is in school. She also supports and takes care of two nephews who have lived with her for a few years. The four of them live in the parish of Luz de América in the Santo Domingo canton. Santo Domingo is a canton and city n the new province if Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, which was a rural parish of Quito. Santo Domingo is between the coast and the sierra of Ecuador. It connectsQuito, Guayaquil, Portoviejo,  and other important cities. Located on the flanks of the Western range and the coastal plane below 1000 meters above sea level, it is the rainiest zone in the country. It has great hydrological wealth: there are five important river basins and mini-basins. It is in sub-tropical rainy climate and has an average temperature of 22 °C.

Juliana works in the field planting cacao and raising animals. She says she learned this trade from her family and has done it all her life. She works all day long and sometime her children help her. She wants to invest in cacao plants and fertilizer so she can have more income. She considers her nephews as her own and along with her son she wants them to have a profession. This is her first loan with Fundación Alternativa and during the interview she told the loan officer that she liked the institution because it made her "feel important". 

Her dream is to be able to give her family a better quality of life and above all to keep working so that her children lack for nothing.

loans.use: to buy cacao plans and fertilizer.

loans.name: Sibi

texts.fr:
Sibi est une femme âgée de 46 ans, elle est mariée à un revendeur de véhicule d’occasion. sibi a deux enfants.
Sibi est une revendeuse depuis 2005,  elle achète et revend du charbon de bois à sa clientèle. Elle s’approvisionne à l’intérieur du pays.
Sibi sollicite de WAGES son premier cycle de prêt pour acheter des sacs de charbons de bois.
texts.en: Sibi, 46, is married to a used car salesman. She has two children. She has been a small-scale retailer since 2005. She buys charcoal and resells it to her customers. She gets her supply of charcoal from the interior of the country. She is asking WAGES for her first loan to buy sacks of charcoal.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Sopp Adbou Latif Mbacke Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarité est créé depuis environs 06 mois. Il est composé de 13 femmes qui sont issues du même village. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce et la transformation d'huile d'arachide. 


Madame MaF. debout à l’extrême gauche de la photo est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 49 ans. Elle est marié et mère de 07 enfants en charge. 

Elle est vendeuse de légumes dans les marchés hebdomadaires. Elle fait également de l'élevage de mouton comme activité parallèle. 

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra de financer son activité de vente de légumes et d'acheter une paire de moutons.

Les bénéficies générés par son activité lui permettrons de participer à la prise en charge de sa progéniture et d'assuré sa scolarité
texts.en:
This solidarity group has been created about six months ago. It is composed of 13 women from the same village. Their business activity is vending and making peanut oil.

Ms. MaF., standing on the far left in the photo, is the group’s leader. She is 49 years old. She is married and the mother of seven dependent children.
She sells vegetables at weekly markets. As a parallel activity, she also raises sheep. Her new loan will allow her to finance her vegetable business and to buy a pair of sheep. The income generated by her business will allow her to take care of her children and provide for their studies.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale

loans.name: Ignacia Aydalina

texts.es: La señora Aydalina, de 47 años de edad, es originaria de la ciudad de Granada, es casada, madre de dos hijos, ella es comerciante se dedica a vender yuca y golosinas. Ella inicio vendiendo golosinas en el parque central de su ciudad vendía de manera ambulante en loa alrededores del parque  después fue buscando un lugar fijo en el mercado central , decidió vender otro producto de mayor demanda en esa ciudad y fue que comenzó a vender yuca. Ahora tiene su puesto de venta de yuca y venta de golosinas en el parque, pero le gustaría poder expandirse un poco mas pero para eso necesita mas producto que ofrecer,tener un local con mejores condiciones es por ello que este solicitando el préstamo para comprar mas inventario de yuca y golosinas para vender. Al tener más producto podrá vender un poco y ofrecer sus productos en otros lugares de la ciudad.
texts.en: Aydalina is 47 years old and she is originally from the city of Granada. She is married and she is the mother of two children. She is a merchant who sells yucca and sweets. She started out selling sweets in the central park of the city, selling itinerantly around the park. She later started to look for a fixed placed in the market. She decided to sell other products which are in higher demand in the city. This is when she started to sell yucca. She now has a stand from where she sells yucca and sweets in the park. She would like to expand a little more but she requires more product to sell and a stand that is in better condition. She requests a loan to purchase more yucca inventory and sweets to sell. When she has more product she will be able to sell more and she will be able to offer her products in other parts of the city.

loans.use: to purchase more yucca inventory and sweets to sell.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
Maria, tiene 45 años de edad, es madre soltera  tiene un hijo de 10 años de edad, es originaria de la ciudad de Granada. Inicio vendiendo una comida típica llamada frito, en su casa de habitación ,luego consiguió un lugar para vender en la  acera de un asilo de ancianos esto le ayudo a dar a conocer su pequeño negocio después fue que comenzó a vender perfumes y cosméticos y ropa de manera  ambulante en los pueblos aledaños a la ciudad de Granada. 
Ella realizo el préstamo para comprar mercadería para vender tales como sandalias, chinelas de baño, cosméticos. Pues necesita mas productos para vender y darse a conocer como comerciante en otros lugares. Ella desea comprar una camioneta donde pueda cagar su producto a irse a vender a otros lugares , ya que sus pies se casan mucho de tanto caminar y un vehículo le facilitaría poder movilizarse con mas facilidad, aunque el sacrificio vale la pena pues su principal prioridad es tener la condiciones económicas que le permitan darle estudios profesionales a su hijo.
texts.en:
Maria is 45 years old and she is a single mother of a 10-year old boy. She is originally from the city of Granada. She started out selling a traditional food called "frito" from her house. She later secured a place from where to sell on the sidewalk beside a retirement home. This has helped her small business get known. Later she started out selling perfumes, cosmetics, and clothing itinerantly in the surrounding villages of the city of Granada.

She has accessed a loan to purchase merchandise to sell, such as sandals, bathroom slippers, and cosmetics. She requires more products to sell and to make herself known as a merchant in other locations. She wants to purchase a truck which would help her transport her products, to go to sell in other locations. Her legs become very tired from so much walking and a vehicle would facilitate her travels, despite the sacrifice. But it is worth the effort because her primary priority is to have the financial resources to provide her son with professional training.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for resale, such as bathroom slippers and cosmetics.

loans.name: Raisa

texts.ru:
У Раисы двое взрослых детей: Александр и Наталья. Они живут в городе Мелитополе. Раиса торгует мужской одеждой на привокзальном рынке. Она занимается этим видом торговли уже 12 лет. На данный момент ее оборот составляет 9 000 гривен, а прибыль составляет 3 000 гривен.  

Раисе необходим кредит в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить товар к осенне-зимнему сезону. За счет полученной прибыли она надеется дальше развивать свой бизнес и улучшать благосостояние семьи, а также закончить начатый ремонт в квартире.  

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en: Raisa has two grown children: Aleksandr and Natalya.  They live in the town of Melitopol.  Raisa sells men's and women's clothing at the market by a train station.  She has been involved in the retail business for 12 years.  Currently, her revolving capital amounts to 9 000 hryvnia, and profit amounts to 3 000 hryvnia.  Raisa needs a loan in the sum of 10 000 hryvnia in order to purchase merchandise for the autumn-winter season.  She hopes to use the resulting profit to further develop her business and improve her family's welfare, and also finish ongoing repairs in her apartment.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for the autumn-winter season

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in the purchase of merchandise and to purchase hens to expand her sales of eggs.

loans.name: Assoupi Fidèle

texts.fr:
Assoupi est une femme âgée de 43 ans, elle est mariée à un soudeur. Elle a 4 enfants.
Assoupi est une revendeuse depuis 1983. Elle achète et revend des produits d’alimentation  générale à sa clientèle composée de toutes personnes. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés Locaux et quelques fois à l’intérieur du pays. Elle sollicite de WAGES son second prêt pour acheter divers produits d’alimentation générale.
texts.en:
Assoupi, age 43, is married to a welder and has four children. She's been a reseller since 1983. She buys food products and resells them to a very wide clientele.

She gets her supplies on the local markets, and sometimes from the interior of the country. She's seeking her second loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy various food products.

loans.use: to buy various food products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in the purchase of raw materials and to expand her hydroponics business.

loans.name: Miriam De Jesús

texts.es:
A sus 50 años de edad Miriam es una emprendedora que comenzó su negocio con la ilusión de salir adelante y mejorar su situación económica, inicialmente vendía ropa a sus amigos y allegados y poco a poco fue mejorando las ventas, y sus clientes fueron aumentando, actualmente Miriam tiene un almacén donde trabaja día a día con tenacidad y esmero para que éste progrese constantemente.

Con su propósito de progresar, hoy en día quiere comprar un surtido mayor de ropa y zapatos tanto para dama como para caballero, pero Miriam no cuenta con el capital para comprar esta mercancía, por lo que solicita un crédito con el cual hacer estas compras, mejorar las ventas y proporcionalmente las utilidades, así su calidad de vida mejorará y sus sueños poco a poco se irán cumpliendo.
texts.en:
At the age of 50, Miriam is an entrepreneur who started out her business with the dream of moving forward and improving her financial situation. She started out selling clothing to her family acquaintances. Gradually her sales improved and her clients increased. Currently Miriam has a store where she works day after day with tenacity and care for its continual progress.

With her goal of progressing, today she wants to purchase a variety of clothing and shoes for both ladies and gentlemen. But Miriam does not have the capital to purchase this merchandise. She requests a loan with which she will make these purchases. It will improve her sales and consequently, her profits and her quality of life. Her dreams with gradually become a reality.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to add variety to her supply.

loans.name: Nidya Auxiliadora

texts.es: Nidia, esta muy agradecida con el préstamo Kiva pues represento un cambio muy positivo para su vida, ya que logro invertir para comprar materia prima para elaborar sus trajes , cumplió con el pedido que tenia, logro vender todo su producto con precios que le permitió ganar e incluso saldar sus costos de manera mas rápida y efectiva. Ahora tiene mas clientes su demanda aumento es por eso que esta solicitando este segundo préstamo este préstamo para comprar mas materiales de trabajo como tela , hilo y accesorios  para elaborar trajes de niños para bautizos. Pues tiene mucha demanda en esta nueva etapa de su negocio su hija la va ayudar a elaborar parte de su pedido. Tiene como meta comprar una maquina de cocer overlox para elaborar sus trajes.
texts.en: Nidia is very thankful for the Kiva loan. It represented a very positive change in her life. She made an investment in the purchase of materials to make her suits. She was able to fill the order that she had and she managed to sell her products at prices that permitted her to make a profit. She was even able to pay off the costs of the materials in a faster and more effective manner. She now has more clients and her demand has increased, and it is why she requests this second loan. This loan will be used to purchase more materials such as fabrics, threads, and accessories she needs to make baptismal suits for children. She sees a great demand in this new stage of her business. Her daughter comes to help her take on part of the order. Her goal is to purchase an Overlox brand sewing machine to make suits.

loans.use: to purhcase supplies like fabric, thread, needles, buttons, and pins.

loans.name: Sop Khelcom Group

texts.fr:
Groupe de solidarité reconstitué il y a environ 6 mois.Il est composé de 14 femmes.Elles font du petit commerce, vente de divers produits.

Maguette, (sur la photo de groupe elle est placée à gauche en médaillon) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 49 ans.Elle est mariée; mère de 4 enfants. Elle fait du commerce de détail dans les marchés hebdomadaires"loumas".

Ce nouveau crédit lui permettra, en sus des céréales (mil arachides et haricots "niébé") qu'elle va acheter, de diversifier et augmenter les produits à vendre. 

Elle voudrait avec les profits générés par son activité assurer à sa famille un meilleur cadre de vie. Exemple par l'amélioration de la nourriture et la prise en charge de la santé de la famille.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was reconstituted around six months ago and is made up of 14 women. They are all small-scale traders selling a variety of products.

Maguette (shown in the inset on the left of the photo) is in charge of the group. She is 49 years old, married and mother to four children. She trades on a retail basis in the weekly "loumas" markets.

This new loan will allow her not only to buy cereals (millet, groundnut and "niébé" beans) but to diversify and expand the products she sells.

With the profits she generates from her business she would like to ensure a better quality of life for her family, by improving their food and looking after their health, for  example.

loans.use: to buy various cereals ("niébé" beans, millet, groundnut)

loans.name: Houngbeke

texts.fr:
Houngbéké est un homme de 28 ans, il est marié à une revendeuse. Houngbéké a 2 enfants.
Houngbéké est un revendeur depuis 2009. Il a ouvert sa propre entreprise dans la laquelle il vend du matériel électrique à ses clients composés de toutes personnes. Il s’approvisionne à Lomé.
Il sollicite de WAGES son premier crédit pour acheter du matériel électrique et satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle.
texts.en:
Houngbéké, age 28, is married to a reseller and has two children. He's been a reseller since 2009. He created his own company to sell electrical goods to a very wide clientele. He gets his supplies in Lomé.

Houngbéké is seeking his first loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy electrical goods and meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy electrical goods

loans.name: Verónica Lucia

texts.es:
Verónica es una mujer de 30 años, madre de dos niños que tienen 1 y 6 años. Vive junto a sus hijos y su marido en la parroquia de "Río Verde" del cantón "Santo Domingo". Santo Domingo es la cuarta ciudad con más población del Ecuador después de Guayaquil, Quito y Cuenca. Su población va creciendo rápidamente ya que cuenta con un rico comercio y el mayor mercado ganadero del país. La provincia tiene de superficie 3.857 km² - 352.300 ha a una altitud de 625 msnm. Su temperatura habitual es de unos 25.5°C  y a veces llega a los 38 °C. Toda la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas"  figura como parte del territorio montañoso de la costa, de la cordillera occidental, históricamente conocida como Provincia de Yumbos y Capital de los Colibríes. Está ubicado en el trópico húmedo de América Latina. Es una provincia considerada nueva ya que fue creada en el 2007.

Verónica tiene un camión el cual está cargado de frutas y verduras. De esta manera va vendiendo su producto por las calles de la ciudad y también distribuyendo a tiendas y verdulerías. Trabaja junto a su esposo desde hace 8 años; lo aprendió de su familia. Ella quiere invertir en legumbres, por esta razón fue a Fundación Alternativa en busca de un crédito. De esta manera ella quiere mejorar su ingreso, de esta manera podrá reunir el dinero para arreglar su camión y seguir vendiendo. 

Sueña con ser una gran distribuidora de frutas y dar a sus hijos todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Veronica is a 30-year old woman and the mother of two children, aged 1 and 6. She lives together with her children and her husband in the Parrish of "Rio Verde" in the canton of "Santo Domingo". Santo Domingo is the fourth-largest city in Ecuador after Guayaquil, Quito, and Cuenca. The population continues to grow rapidly with its rich commercial activities and the largest cattle market in the country. The province has an area of 3,857 km², or 352,300 ha, and it has an altitude of 625 meters above sea level. The average temperature is about 25.5°C and sometimes it reaches 38 °C. The entire province of "Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas" forms the mountainous territory of the coast of the western range. Historically it is known as the Yumbo Province and the capital of the hummingbirds. It is located in the wet tropics of Latin America. It is a province considered to be new, having been established in 2007. 

Veronica has a truck which is loaded with fruits and vegetables. This is how she sells her products along the streets of the city and she also distributes to stores and produce markets. She has been working together with her husband for 8 years, having learned the business from her family. She wants to invest in the purchase of vegetables and for this reason she approached Fundacion Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) for a loan. This is how she plans on improving her income and saving enough money to have their truck fixed to continue their sales.

She dreams of becoming a large distributor of fruits and to provide her children with all that they need.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Anika

texts.en:
Anika is a visual artist and emerging fashion designer originally from Cleveland, Ohio who has been creating original artwork, African black soap and 100% organic shea butter for the past five years. Anika moved to New Orleans in 2009 as an Americorp Vista member. She fell in love with the uniqueness of the city and its food and decided that this was where she wanted to be. 

Commissioned by the National Black Social Workers Association in April 2011, Anika officially started Ampelonartist, LLC. The majority of Anika's work is inspired by New Orleans culture and African tradition. 

Anika's new business venture stems from her desire to bring African fashion to the modern woman. Her clothing line, NKWA Urban African Fashion will launch in Ghana this November. Anika considers herself a social entrepreneur who aspires to help families in Ghana by donating a portion of funds made from her clothing line launch to purchase water containers so families in Ghana can more easily access clean water. 

Anika's business is truly a family affair. Her husband, a native of Ghana, is the business agent as well as an artist, and her 13-year-old daughter acts as the photographer and salesperson, promoting the business' many products through social media outlets. 

In the future, Anika sees her business growing and being self-sustainable. "Ampelon means vineyard in Greek and I see my business as a collective of artists who will use art to make the world a more beautiful place, " explains Anika. 

Anika will use her Kiva loan to purchase materials such as cloth, fabric, and sewing supplies for the launch of her clothing line and to participate in the Cleveland Fashion Week in May 2012.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, cloth, and sewing supplies to successfully launch her clothing line

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in the purchase of merchandise and to cover the initial rental expenses of her store space.

loans.name: Ismaila

texts.fr: Monsieur Ismaila est un jeune sénégalais de 33 ans. Il est marié et père de 3 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre 3 et 11 ans. Il évolue depuis plus de 10 ans dans le secteur du  commerce. Il s’adonne à l’achat et la vente d’appareils   électroménagers. Parallèlement  il organise une opération de vente de moutons a chaque veille de Tabaski.  Il a choisi son activité par passion et est surtout intéressé  par l’aspect lucratif de cette activité. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis décembre 2004. Il sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de moutons à revendre pour la Tabaski qui approche. Il souhaite renforcer son fond de roulement de sorte qu’il pourra  augmenter ses bénéfices  et  améliorer les conditions de vie sociale de sa famille.
texts.en: Mr. Ismaila is a 33 year old man from Senegal.  He is married and the father of 3 children between the ages of 3 and 11.  He has been involved in commerce for more than 10 years.   He is dedicated to buying and selling household appliances.  Along with this, he organizes sales of sheep on the eve of Tabaski.  He chose his work out of passion for it and is particularly interested in the profits to be made from it.  He has been a member of l'U-IMCEC since December 2004.  He is requesting a loan of 300,000 frs. for the purchase of sheep to be sold for Tabaski which is coming up.  He hopes to increase his working capital in order to increase his profits, and to improve living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy sheep to sell.

loans.name: Sopp Madina Toure Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe existe il y'a six mois.il est formé par 10(dix) femmes qui habitent pour la plupart le village et ont comme activité principale le commerce.

La responsable du groupe s'appelle Mme Penda. Elle est mise en médaillon en bas au milieu de la photo.
Elle est veuve et âgée de 62ans et prends en charge ses deux enfants. 

Elle pratique le commerce de détails et l'embouche ovine et caprine. Elle maitrise bien ces activités  pour les avoir pratiquées depuis plusieurs

Elle achète avec son prêt de produits comme le sucre, le café ,le savon. Elle paie aussi de petits ruminants (moutons, chèvres).

son objectifs est de soutenir ses enfants dans leurs diverses entreprises.tout en subvenant a ses besoins personnels.
texts.en:
Sopp Madina Toure Group was established six months ago by ten women who, for the most part, live in the village. Their main business is buying and selling.

Mrs. Penda is in charge of the group. She's the one in the inset at the bottom of the picture. She's 62 years old, a widow and takes care of her two children.

Her business consists in retailing, and she also raises sheep and goats. She knows all the ins and outs of her business, since she's been in it for several years. 

With her loan, she will buy products such as sugar, coffee and soaps, as well as small animals (sheep, goats). Her goal is to support her children in their various endeavors, while at the same time providing for herself.

loans.use: to buy sugar, coffee, and soaps

loans.name: Fernando Rofel

texts.es:
Fernando es un joven de 28 años que es casado y tiene una pequeña hija de 1 año de edad. Viven en Santo Domingo, en la vía a "Puerto Limón" un sector cercano a las comunidades nativas de la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas". Santo Domingo es un cantón de la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas" el cual es uno de los más densamente poblados del Ecuador. Tiene un gran atractivo ya que posee varios monumentos distribuidos por toda la ciudad entre el que está el Monumento al Indio Colorado, sector conocido como la “Y del Colorado”.  Santo Domingo es un cantón privilegiado, con gente maravillosa, trabajadora y emprendedora, que lucha incansablemente por el desarrollo y progreso, que recibe al turista siempre con los brazos abiertos y los lleva a conocer lo maravilloso de su cultura y entorno. 

Trabaja criando y vendiendo cerdos desde hace 3 años y lo aprendió de su antiguo trabajo. Mantiene solo a su esposa e hija. Hace unos años sufrió un accidente que le dejo una incapacidad del 40%. Cuida su pequeña granja porcina todos los días de la semana. Fernando quiere comprar tres cerdas reproductoras, este será el camino para el crecimiento de su pequeña granja porcina y aunque es un camino largo es muy productivo. De esta manera podrá tener un mejor ingreso.

El trabaja con mucho ánimo y empeño, para salir adelante y su sueño es poder ver a su hija profesional y dar a su familia bienestar y solventar sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Fernando is a young man who is 28 years old and married. He has a 1-year old daughter. They live in Santo Domingo on the way to Puerto Limon, a nearby sector to the native communities in the province of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas. Santo Domingo is a canton in the province of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, which is one of the most densely populated in Ecuador. It has a great attraction for its various monuments scattered throughout the city. Among them is the monument called "Monumento al Indio Colorado". The sector is known as Y del Colorado. Santo Domingo is a privileged canton with marvelous people who are hardworking and enterprising and who fight incessantly for development and progress. Tourists are welcomed with open arms and they are welcomed to see the marvelous culture and surroundings.

He has been raising and selling pork for the past 3 years and he learned the trade from this past employment. He only supports his wife and daughter. A few years ago he suffered an accident and he was left with a disability of 40%. He manages his small pig farm every day of the week. Fernando wants to purchase 3 reproductive sows. This will be the way to make his small pig farm grow. Although its a long road it is very productive. This is how he will have a better income.

He works with great enthusiasm and care to move forward. His dream is to see his daughter grow up to have a career, and to provide his family with wellbeing and to meet all of their needs.

loans.use: to purchase three sows.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr:
Koffi est un homme âgé de 32 ans, il est  marié à une revendeuse. 
Koffi est un revendeur depuis 2001, il achète et revend des meubles à ses clients composés de toutes personnes. Koffi a 3 employés pour l’aider dans son activité. Il sollicite son premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter des fauteuils bourrés et satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle.
texts.en:
Koffi, age 32, is married to a reseller. He's been a reseller himself since 2001. He buys and sells furniture to a very wide clientele.

Koffi has three employees to help him with his business. He's seeking his first loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy padded furniture and meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy padded furniture

loans.name: Francisca Elena

texts.es:
Francisca es socia del Banco Comunal Paloma, tiene 42 años y 5 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 4 años. 
Francisca, tiene un tienda de abarrotes y verduras, ella inició su negocio con una tienda pequeña ahora gracias a todo el apoyo que recibió pudo crecer en su negocio, y construir el segundo piso de cu casa, lo que mas le gusta de las reuniones de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro y las capacitaciones que le ayudan en su vida personal, ahora este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de arroz, azúcar  porque ella abastece a los Wawa-Wasi. Francisca esta ahorrando para poder tener una tienda mayorista.
texts.en:
Francisca is a member of the Communal Bank "Paloma". She is 42 years old and she has 5children. She has is a member of Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) for the past 4 years.

Francisca has a grocery and vegetable store. She started out her business with a small store and today thanks to the support she received, she has been able to expand her business and she added a second floor to her house. What she most enjoys about the communal bank meetings is the savings program and the orientation sessions that help her with her personal life. She will invest this loan in the purchase of rice and sugar because she supplies daycares. Francisca is saving to be able to have a wholesale business.

loans.use: to purchase rice and sugar.

loans.name: Man Sid Taaba Yinga Group

texts.fr:
Mme IRENE est la représentante du groupe MAN SID TAABA YINGA. Elle est mariée et mère de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 19ans et le moins âgé a 05 mois. Un (01) va à l’école. Elle a 03 personnes en charge.

Elle vend des pagnes et habits d’enfants depuis 08ans. Elle s’approvisionnement au marché du secteur 10. Ses clients sont les femmes et les hommes.

Elle veut s’acheter (¼) un quart de balle de pagnes et une (01) balle d’habits d’enfants.

Mme épargne ses économies. Elle ambitionne agrandir son activité ,ouvrir d’autres points de vente et exporter ses produits.
texts.en:
Irene is the representative of the MAN SID TAABA YINGA group. She is married and the mother of 2 children, who are 19 years old and 5 months old. One of the children goes to school. She is responsible for 3 people. 

For the past 8 years, Irene has been selling "pagnes" (colorful African cloth) and children's clothing. She obtains her supplies in the District 10 market. Her customers are both men and women. 

Irene wants to buy a 1/4 bale of "pagnes"  and 1 bale of children's clothing. She saves her money. Her goal is to expand her business, open more sales outlets and export her products.

loans.use: to buy a 1/4 bale of "pagne" cloth and 1 bale of children's clothes.

loans.name: Roufai

texts.fr:
Roufai est un homme âgé de 23 ans, il est marié à une revendeuse. Il a un enfant.
Roufai est un revendeur depuis 2009. Il a ouvert sa propre boutique dans laquelle il vend des articles électroniques. Il s’approvisionne au Ghana et quelques fois au Nigéria.
Roufai  sollicite de WAGES son premier crédit de WAGES pour l’achat de divers articles electronique.
texts.en:
Roufai is a 23-year old man who is married to a retailer. He has one child. He has been a retailer himself since 2009 and has opened his own shop in which he sells electronic products. He gets his supplies in Ghana and sometimes in Nigeria. 

Roufai is requesting his first loan from Wages in order to buy various electronic products

loans.use: to buy electronic products

loans.name: Edwin Alexander

texts.es:
A sus 23 años de edad y como padre de1 niño, Edwin se dedicó a trabajar incansablemente para sacar adelante a familia, día a día se rebusca la manera de generar ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida, por ello, desde hace 5 años se dedica a la cría, engorde y venta de cerdos.

Para continuar con este negocio y esperando ampliar sus clientes, Edwin necesita un préstamo para comprar 20 bultos de cuido para los cerdos y una hembra de cría, de esta manera se mejorará la producción y generar mayores ingresos ya que se aproxima la época de diciembre. 

Este emprendedor sueña con tener una casa propia, por eso trabaja con gran dedicación y esfuerzo, para lograr una mejor calidad de vida para el y su familia.
texts.en:
At the age of 23, Edwin is the father of 1 boy and he works tirelessly to provide for his family. Day after day he looks for ways to generate an income in order to improve their quality of life. For this reason he has been working for the past 5 years in raising, fattening and selling pigs.

In order to continue on with this business and with the hopes of increasing his clients, Edwin needs a loan to purchase 20 sacks of food for pigs and a reproductive sow. This way he will improve production and generate a better income, especially because the December season approaches.

This entrepreneur dreams of having his own house. To this end he works with great dedication and effort. He wants to achieve a better quality of life for himself and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase feed for his pigs and to purchase a sow.

loans.name: Akouavi

texts.fr:
Akouavi est une femme âgée de 37 ans, elle est mariée à un enseignant et  a un enfant.
Akouavi est une revendeuse depuis 2007. Elle achète et revend pour ses clients des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés locaux de la capitale et travaille seule dans son activité. Elle sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour l’achat de divers produits d’alimentation générale.
texts.en: Akouavi is a 37-year old woman who is married to a teacher and has one child. She has been a retailer since 2007. She buys and sells to her customers general grocery products. She gets her supplies in local markets in the capital and works alone. She is requesting a loan from Wages to buy various groceries.

loans.use: to buy general grocery products

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz de 42 años es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio ya que es una actividad que le gusta y que viene realizándola por 10 años. Comenzó con poco capital y ayuda de su esposo realizando “Humitas” (hechas con maíz y envueltas en hojas de maíz). 

Ha trabajado por varios años desde las 08h00am hasta las 13:00 todos los días haciendo en la mañana las humitas y vendiendo a diferentes personas en la tarde con ayuda de su esposo. Una de las dificultades que presenta el negocio es cuando hay escases de maíz por eso ella reserva para no tener problemas. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere mejorar sus ingresos invirtiendo un préstamo en la comprar de maíz, queso y un molino.
texts.en:
Luz is 42 years old and she is a very hardworking woman who has great aspirations for her business. It is something she enjoys and she has had it for 10 years. She started out with a limited capital and with her husband's help, making "humitas", a food made with corn and wrapped in corn leaves.

She has worked for several years from 8am to 1pm every day making humitas in the mornings and selling them to different people in the afternoons with her husband's help. One of the difficulties she faces with the business is when there is a shortage of corn. This is why she stockpiles to avoid problems. She has many aspirations with her business and she wants to have a better income. She will invest her loan in the purchase of corn, cheese, and a mill.

loans.use: to purchase corn, cheese, and a mill.

loans.name: Moussa

texts.fr: Monsieur Moussa est âgé de 31 ans. Il habite au Sénégal. Il est marié et père de 2 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 5 et 7 ans. Depuis 1993 il évolue dans le domaine de la couture et gère  un atelier de couture dans la localité ou il loge. Il coud des habits d’hommes et de femmes.  C’est une activité qu’il  a choisi par passion. Et son intérêt  dans cette dernière c’est le beau  travail et l’aspect lucratif. Il est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis octobre 2009. Il sollicite un crédit de 200 000 avec lequel il compte régulariser une facture d’électricité  d’une part et d’autre part acheter des garnitures et des fournitures qui lui permettront de confectionner des habits prêt a porter a revendre. Ce financement lui permettra d’augmenter ses gains et d’améliorer le bien être  de sa famille
texts.en: Moussa is 31years old and lives in Senegal. He is married and father to two children who are five and seven years old. He has been developing a tailoring business since 1993 and manages a workshop in the town where he lives. He makes mens' and womens' clothing. He chose this business since he had a passion for it, and his interest is in the beautiful work it involves and the lucrative aspect of it. He has been a member of one of the branches of U-IMCEC (a Senegalese association of mutual savings and loans institutions) since October 2009. He is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs which he will use partly to settle an electricity bill and partly to buy trimmings and equipment which will allow him to make up ready-to-wear clothes for resale. This loan will allow him to increase his profits and improve his family's well-being.

loans.use: to pay his electricity bills and buy trimmings

loans.name: Olga

texts.es: Olga, de 30 años, es una mujer joven muy trabajadora y responsable, es conviviente y es madre de un hijo de cinco años, quien es su razón de vivir y por quien trabajan día a día para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Juntos habitan en casa de su suegro. Su trabajo consiste en la reparación de electrodomésticos de línea blanca, así como la venta de repuestos de los mismos. Ella trabaja en equipo con su pareja, pues anteriormente trabajaba sola en otro rubro, mientras que su pareja trabajaba como soporte técnico en una tienda de artefactos de electrodomésticos, pero hace cuatro meses que dejó de trabajar para formar en sociedad con ella y emprender éste nuevo negocio. Sus clientes tiene buenas referencias del trabajo que realizan, por ello es que tiene demanda de sus servicios. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tienen tiempo a su disposición, además de que le genera ganancias considerables, asimismo se ayudan entre sí. Espera poder mantenerse en el mismo ritomo, pues su anhelo es montar un local en donde atender a sus clientes, pero sin dejar de hacerlo a domicilio. Este será el doceavo crédito con MFP, le esta yendo bien hasta ahora, y espera seguir trabajando bien como lo ha estado haciendo, ya que siempre se mostró como una socia responsable. Por otro lado agradece por la ayuda anterior ya que le ayudo a crecer en su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprará repuestos y herramientas para ser más eficaz en el servicio de reparación de electrodomésticos.
texts.en: Olga is 30 years old and she is a very hardworking and responsible young woman. She lives with her partner and she is the mother of a five-year old son. He is her reason for living and it is for him that she works day after day, to provide him with a better quality of life. They live together with her father-in-law. Her work consists of the repairing kitchen and laundry appliances, as well as selling spare parts for these. She works as a team with her partner. Previously she worked along in another field and his partner worked as the technical support for a parts store for appliances. But four months ago he left his employment to form this team with her and to start up this new business. Their clients provide them with good references on the work that they do, and for this reason they have demand for their services. What they like about their work is having time at their disposal and they generate considerable profits. They also help each other. She hopes to maintain the rhythm and their goal is to set up a store from where to attend their clients, while not letting go of the in-home service. This will be their twelfth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and it has gone very well until now. She hopes to keep working well as they have until now. She has always demonstrated to be a responsible person. She is thankful for the previous support she received as it help her improve her business. With the funds requested, she will purchase spare parts and tools they need to be more effective in delivering appliance repair services.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and tools.

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
L. señora Nelly nació en L. provincia D. Anta del departamento del Cusco. Actualmente, elL. vive en L. ciudad del Cusco. 

L. señora Nelly tiene 48 años y es casada fruto D. esta unión tiene tres hijos, elL. es una madre trabajadora y responsable que saca adelante a su familia,  elL. es L. administradora D. los dormitorios que alquiL. D. su domicilio. Ya son 3 años que tiene el negocio y le va muy bien pero en esta oportunidad Nelly requiere el préstamo para ampliar el local y para hacer mantenimiento D. L. casa.    

Las reuniones D. las socias del Banco Comunal “Nueva Esperanza” son cada treinta días en L. ciudad del Cusco. El banco Comunal está conformado por personas que son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. L. mayoría D. los socios viven en L. ciudad del Cusco y sus actividades económicas D. los demás socios son por ejemplo venta D. artesanía, venta D. comida, venta comestibles, venta D. cosméticos y otros brindan servicios varios. 

Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una D. las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”. (Los socios que está en L. parte inferior D. L. fotografía llegaron tarD. a L. reunión del banco comunal).
texts.en:
Nelly was born in Anta province, in Cusco department.  She currently lives in the city of Cusco.

Nelly is 48 years old, married, and has three children from her marriage.  She is a hard-working and responsible woman who gets her family ahead in life.  Her business is renting out some bedrooms in her home.  She has been in this business for three years and is doing very well.  However, she needs this loan to expand her premises and do some maintenance work on her house.

The members of the 'Nueva Esperanza' community bank meet once a month, in the city of Cusco.  The members of the bank are hard-working, entrepreneurial people who are always looking for opportunities to get ahead in life and who work hard every day in order to proviD. their children with a better future.  Most of the members of this bank live in the city of Cusco and their businesses incluD. selling handicrafts, selling meals, selling food and selling cosmetics.  Other members proviD. services.

Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial area.  It is well known for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and for the fact that it is home to one of the seven Wonders of the World (Machu Picchu).

(The members who appear at the bottom of the photo arrived late to the community bank meeting).

loans.use: to expand her premises and do some maintenance work on her house

loans.name: Kenou Honore

texts.fr:
Kenou est un homme âgé de 37 ans, il est marié à une revendeuse. Il a 2 enfants.
Kenou est un revendeur depuis 1998, il achète et revend pour ses clients des pneus il emploie une personne dans son activité et  s’approvisionne au marché local du port autonome de Lomé.
Il sollicite son premier crédit pour acheter des pneus.
texts.en: Kenou is a 37 year old married man and father of two children. Since 1998 he has worked as a re-seller of tires, with one employee. He stocks up at the local market of the Port of Lomé, Togo. He is asking for a loan from WAGES in order to purchase more stock of tires.

loans.use: purchase tires

loans.name: Sonia Alexandra

texts.es:
Sonnia de 38 años, es una mujer trabajadora que decidió hace 15 años atrás tener un pequeño negocio de confección de ropa y así darse tiempo para pasar con su familia. Poco a poco fue mejorando sus ingresos hasta que decidió tener un ciber para darle un mejor futuro a su familia. 

En la actualidad tiene los dos trabajos donde dedica medio tiempo a la confección de ropa y el otro medio  tiempo al ciber ya que le ayuda su hermana.  Su horario de trabajo es desde las 08h00am hasta las 22h00pm.  

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con sus dos negocios por eso quiere mejorar sus ingresos con un préstamo para comprar computadoras y aumentar así la clientela que tiene. En el futuro quiere ampliar sus dos negocios.
texts.en:
Sonnia is 38 years old and she is a hardworking woman who decided to set up a small clothing production business 15 years ago to give herself time to spend with her family. She gradually improved her profits until she decided to set up an internet cafe, to provide her family with a better future. 

Currently she has both businesses. Half of her time she spends making clothing and the other half of her time she spends in the internet cafe, in which she gets help from her sister. Her work schedule is from 8am to 10pm.

She has many aspirations for her two businesses and she wants to improve her income through a loan. She will purchase computers and this will increase her clientele. In the future she wants to improve both businesses.

loans.use: to purchase computers.

loans.name: Messan Kossi

texts.fr:
Kossi est un homme âgé de 37 ans, il est marié à une revendeuse. Il a  2 enfants, 
Kossi est un revendeur depuis 2003.il achète et revend des appareils portables à sa clientèle composée de toutes personnes. Il est seul à exercer son activité et s’approvisionne à Lomé
Kossi sollicite de WAGES  son 4ème prêt pour l’achat de divers appareils portables et accessoires.
texts.en:
Kossi is a 37 year old man, he is married to a retailer. He has 2 children.
Kossi has been a retailer since 2003.He buys and sells portable telephones to his clientele which is the general public. He works alone and buys his stock at Lomé.
Kossi requests his 4th loan from WAGES in order to purchase various portables and accessories.

loans.use: purchase portable telephones and accessories.

loans.name: Sika Ahuefa

texts.fr:
Sika est une femme âgée de 32 ans, elle est célibataire sans enfant.
Sika est propriétaire d’un restaurant à Lomé depuis 2010. Son restaurant est très fréquenté et sa clientèle se compose de toutes personnes. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé. Actuellement elle manque de rafraîchissement raison pour laquelle elle sollicite de WAGES un premier crédit pour l’achat de  boissons à la brasserie de Lomé.
texts.en:
Sika is a 32 year old woman, she is single and does not have any children.
Sika has owned a restaurant in Lomé since 2010.Her restaurant is very popular and her clientele made up of the general public. She buys her provisions at Lomé. At present she is short of refreshing drinks which is the reason why she requests a first loan from WAGES in order to buy drinks at the Lomé brewery.

loans.use: purchase drinks.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es: Reynaldo es propietario de un taxi el brinda sus servicios desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las nueve de la noche, el siempre esta brindándole el mejor servicio a sus clientes. El motivo del crédito que realiza es para la compra de llantas, herramientas, focos, espejos entre otros. De esta manera el obtiene ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia, en esta ocasión requiere de nuestra ayuda para comprar realizarle ciertas mejoras a su unidad.
texts.en: Reynaldo is the owner of a taxi and he provides service from 7 in the morning until nine at night. She always provides his clients with the best service. The reason he requests a loan is to purchase tires, tools, headlights, mirrors and other products. This way he will acquire an income to move his family forward. At this time he requires our help to carry out some improvements to his car.

loans.use: to purchase new tires, tools, headlights, and mirrors.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
El señor   Lorenzo, vive en unión libre con la señora Rosa y con quien procreo siete hijos quienes  cinco ya están  casados y dos aun están a su responsabilidad.

     El solcito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de mantas para elaborar camisas y blusas bordadas en la que el comenta que le va muy bien ya que con ello a tendido un buen ingreso  para su familia.

    Su motivación a esta actividad fue el mismo para mejorar  la economía de su hogar, y como  tenía unos  ahorros decido invertirlo en ello y es como inicio su actividad así fueron pasando los años y cada día mejora su venta.

    Lo que más desea es que con esta pequeña actividad y préstamo  solicitado ella pueda ir mejorando mas  su negocio así seguir adelante con su familia que es lo más importante para él.
texts.en:
Lorenzo lives in a common law relationship with Rosa.  They have seven children together.  Five of them are already married and two are still their responsibility.

He requested the loan to buy fabric to make embroidered shirts and blouses.  He comments that he does very well since this has produced good income for his family.

He was motivated into this activity to improve his household’s economy and since he had a little money saved up he decided to invest it in this and this is how he started his activity.  The years have gone by and every day his sales improve.

What he most desires is that with this small activity and requested loan he’ll be able to continue to improve his business still more to continue forward with his family who are most important for him.

loans.use: to buy fabric to embroider, shirts and blouses.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Maria Isabel y su esposo el señor José Roberto son padres de familia, tiene tres hijos que están estudiando. 
Solicitan un préstamo para poder pagar la inscripción de la escuela donde estudian su hijo y comprarles los útiles escolares que son (carpetas, cuadernos, lápices, colores, plumas y mochilas) por el momento no cuentan con el dinero necesario para poder realizar esta necesidad escolar de sus hijos. 
Planean pagar el crédito con el sueldo que recibe Don José Roberto de su trabajo como despachador de una gasolinera, ya que Doña Maria Isabel se dedica al cuidado y atención de la familia. 
Desean que sus hijos tengan lo mejor una buena educación y el estudio necesario para que su futuro.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel and her husband, Jose Roberto, are the parents of a family. They have three children, all of whom attend school.

They request a loan to be able to pay the enrollment fees to the school where their son attends and to buy school supplies, which are: binders, notebooks, pencils, coloring pencils, pens, and backpacks. At this moment they do not have the necessary funds to be able to fill this need for their children. 

They plan on repaying the loan with the income that is earned by Jose Roberto. He is employed as a gasoline dispenser at a gas station. Maria Isabel is dedicated to the care and attention of the family. They want for their children to have a good education and to have the necessary schooling for their future.

loans.use: to cover her son's school enrollment fees and to purchase school supplies.

loans.name: Sayhua Group

texts.es:
La señora Tomasa nació en el departamento del Cusco y radica hace 20 años en la ciudad de Urubamba. (La socia está levantando la mano en la fotografía). 

La señora Tomasa tiene 37 años y tiene una relación de libre unión de la cual tiene cuatro hijos, ella es una madre trabajadora y responsable que saca adelante a su familia,  ella vende comida en el mercado modelo de la ciudad de Urubamba y la pueden encontrar desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 3 de la tarde en su puesto de venta todos los días. Ya son 14 años que tiene el negocio y le va muy bien pero en esta oportunidad Tomasa requiere el préstamo para comprar gallinas, cuyes y también para la alimentación de los animales menores.   

Las reuniones de las socias del Banco Comunal “Sayhua” son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco. 

El banco Comunal está conformado por personas que son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y sus actividades económicas de los demás socios son por ejemplo venta de animales menores, venta de comida, venta comestibles, venta de cosméticos, venta de verduras y otros brindan servicios varios. 

Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”. (El socio que está en la parte inferior de la fotografía llego tarde a la reunión del banco comunal).
texts.en:
Tomasa was born in Cusco department, and has been residing in the city of Urubamba for 20 years (she is the one raising her hand in the photograph). Tomasa is 37, in a common-law relationship, and has four children. She is a hard-working and responsible mother, who is helping her family get ahead in life. 

She sells meals in Urubamba's Modelo Market, and you can find her at her stall from 7:00am to 3:00pm every day. She has had the business for 14 years now, and it's going very well. But on this occasion Tomasa needs the loan to buy chickens, guinea pigs and also feed for small animals.

The members of the "Sayhua" communal bank meet every 30 days in the city of Urubamba in Cusco department. The communal bank is made up of  hard-working, enterprising people who at every turn are looking for opportunities to get ahead, and through their daily effort, to provide a better future for their children. The majority of the members live in the city of Cusco, and the rest of the members have businesses where they sell for example: small animals, meals, foodstuffs, cosmetics and vegetables. Others offer various services. 

Cusco is well known for its tourism, commerce, traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because Machu Picchu, one of the Seven Wonders of the World, is located there.
