Note: The member shown in the lower part of the photograph arrived late to the meeting of the communal bank.

loans.use: To buy chickens, guinea pigs, and feed for small animals.

loans.name: Roger

texts.es: Roger tiene 35 años, es un hombre dinámico y emprendedor, es conviviente y madre de dos hijos de 6 y 3 años, quienes son su motivo de trabajo y su deseo de superación. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, inmueble que logró comprar con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio. Su trabajo consiste en la fabricación de casas prefabricadas, muebles de madera, dicho trabajo lo realiza a domicilio. Es bueno en lo que hace, pues sus trabajos tiene un buen acabado; y ésto lo aprendió desde muy pequeño, en el que su padre le enseñó la carpintería. Ahora lo que más desea es implementar su trabajo con nuevas herramientas. Este será el cuarto crédito con MFP, le va bien en su grupo y espera poder seguir siendo socio puntual y responsable que fue hasta ahora, asimismo esta agradecido con los préstamos otorgados anteriormente ya que le ayudaron a tener mayor capital de trabajo. Con el monto solicitado,  acondicionará un espacio de su casa para hacer un taller, además comprará herramientas que le hacen falta para seguir realizando sus maravillosos trabajos.
texts.en: Roger is 35 years old and he is a dynamic and enterprising man. He lives with his partner and mother of his two children, aged 6 and 3. They are the reason for his work and for his wish to improve. Together they live in a house of their own. They managed to purchase the house with a great deal of effort and sacrifice. His work consists of making prefabricated houses and wooden furniture. He carries out his work at home. He does good work, especially because his projects have a good finish. He learned this business when he was very young. His father taught him carpentry. His greatest wish is to supply his business with new tools. This will be his fourth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). It has gone well for him within his group and he hopes to continue to be a member who is punctual and responsible. He is thankful for the loans granted to him previously especially because they have helped him have a greater working capital. With the funds requested he will condition a space in his house to set up a shop. He will also purchase tools to keep creating his marvelous projects.

loans.use: to purchase tools and to condition a space in his house to set up a workshop.

loans.name: Luz Andrea

texts.es:
A sus 31 años de edad Luz Andrea es una luchadora incansable que desde hace algunos meses tiene su propio negocio, vende comidas rápidas como perros calientes y hamburguesas, labor que desempeña diariamente de 5:00 p.m. 11:00 p.m. pues en este horario hay buenas ventas y ha tenido la ventaja de estar tener su negocio al lado del de su madre, pues así se apoyan entre ellas y se cuidan la una a la otra.

Luz Andrea actualmente debe comprar insumos para la producción de alimentos, como pan, carnes frías, desechables y gas, por lo cual hoy solicita un préstamo, con el cual hacer esta inversión, mejorar las ventas, y proporcionalmente su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At the age of 31, Luz Andrea is an incessant fighter who has had her own business for a few months. She sells fast foods, such as hot dogs and hamburgers. She works every day from 5pm to 11pm. This is the time when the sales are good and she has had the advantage of having a business beside her mother's. They help each other and they take care of one another. 

Luz Andrea currently needs to purchase ingredients to product her foods, such as bread, cold meats, disposable products and propane gas. This is why she requests a loan and upon making this investment she will improve her sales and consequently she will improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to prepare fast foods.

loans.name: Policarpio

texts.es:
El señor Policarpio  vive en una  localidad la que es muy bonita  ya que tiene una iglesia grande  que está en el centro del pueblo, el  vive en unión libre con la señora Dicsi Zenaida y  con quien procreo cuatro hijos que aun están a su responsabilidad.
    Don Poli como le dicen de cariño se dedica a  sembrar milpas, frijol para tener sus ingreso y solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la actividad de compra y venta de mantas bordadas para salir a venderlo en otro lugar y está contento  ya que le va bien.
 
    Su motivo a esta actividad fue su familia  para así mejorar cada día sus ingresos  y con un dinerito que  tenía guardado comenzó a comprar mantas y bordaros luego se asocio con sus vecinos y es como  está trabajando  y logrando sacar adelante a su familia.

   Lo que más desea es que con sus ganas de trabajar baya mejorando su negocio y así, continuar con el préstamo que tanto lo está apoyando y con el dinero que baya obteniendo su familia tenga mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Policarpio lives in a very pretty location that has a large church in the center of town.  He lives in a common law relationship with Dicsi Zenaida.  They have four children that are still their responsibility.

Don Poli, as he’s affectionately called, is a corn and bean farmer but to earn more income he requested the loan to buy fabric to embroider and then go sell in another location.  He’s happy because he’s doing well.

His family was what motivated him into this activity, to improve his income daily.  He used a little money he had saved up to start buying fabric to embroider.  Then, he partnered with his neighbors and this is how he’s working and managing to move his family ahead.

What he most desires is that his dedication to work will lead to his business’s improvement and continue with the loan that is so helpful to him and use the money he’ll be earning so that his family will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric to embroider and sell.

loans.name: Denis Del Socorro

texts.es: Denis Del Socorro tiene 48 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. El es un hombre muy laborioso, vive en su casa propia y se esmera a diario por sobre salir adelante junto a su esposa e hijos. El sale a vender sus productos de manera ambulante ya que así obtiene clientes nuevos, lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene la libertad de descansar en algunos lugares y seguir con su labor. Este será su décimo préstamo, espera ser muy puntual en sus cuotas, así comprara ropa en general, cosméticos, calzado, ropa interior, prendas de plata, reloj y bolsos.
texts.en: Denis Del Socorro is 48 years old and his activity is the sale of general merchandise. He is a very hardworking man who lives in his own home and who works daily to move forward together with his wife and children. He sells his products itinerantly to earn new clients. What he most enjoys about his work is having the liberty to rest in certain locations before setting out to work again. This will be his tenth loan and he hopes to be very punctual with his payments. He will purchase clothing in general, cosmetics, shoes, undergarments, silver jewelry, watches, and handbags.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in general, cosmetics, shoes, undergarments, watches, and handbags.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es:
Don Reynaldo, vive en  unión libre con la señora  María Teresa  y con quien procreo  un hijo de la edad de dos años, ellos llevan 5 años de casados.

     El solcito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de mantas por kilo y luego elaborar camisas y blusas para bordar en lo que salen a vender en la ciudad de san Cristóbal de la casas y así mismo compra mas material para seguir trabajando.

    En esta actividad lleva practicando  seis años y cuatro meses en la que el comenta que le va muy bien ya que ha visto un gran rendimiento en su negocio y ganancias para su familia.
 
    Lo que más desea es que con el préstamo  que solicito pueda ir  mejorando, día con día su actividad así con el tiempo  comprar otra máquina para trabajar más días a la semana.
texts.en:
Reynaldo lives with his common-law wife María Teresa.  The couple have a two-year-old son.  They have been together for five years.

Reynaldo requested this loan to invest in buying calico by the kilo.  He will use this to make shirts and blouses to be embroidered.  He goes out to sell his goods in the city of San Cristóbal de la Casas.  He will buy more material so that they can continue working.

Reynaldo has been in this business for six years and four months.  He says that things are going very well as his business is performing well and making good profits for his family.

What Reynaldo would like is to use the loan that he has requested to keep improving his business.  Over time, he would like to buy another machine so that he can work more days a week.

loans.use: to buy threads and calico so that he can embroider shirts and blouses

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, de 34 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive desde hace 10 años junto a Lidia, su esposa. Ambos tiene dos hijos: Lori y Nordi a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Punray. A pesar de su corta edad, logró muchas cosas. Pues su principal virtud es trabajar sin descanso. Hace 7 años que incursionó en la agricultura; sus principales sembríos constan de papa, arveja y habas. Los cuales cuida con mucha dedicación, pues logró obtener 5 hectáreas de terrenos productivos y aunque le falta capital para producir la extensión completa, no se desanima. Porque recibe la ayuda de su esposa, quien tiene una tienda de comestibles, donde vende productos de primera necesidad a los pobladores de su zona, ahí obtiene un dinero extra. Además de la camioneta que pudo comprar; con ello traslada su cosecha a la ciudad para comercializarla y también hace servicio de carga a terceras personas.  Él pertenece al banco comunal “Punray avanzado” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde agradece por el apoyo recibido durante todo este tiempo. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Jorge de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir en su próxima siembra de papa “única”.
texts.en: Jorge is 34 years old and he is a hardworking man. He has lived with Lidia, his wife, for the past 10 years. They have two children together: Lori and Nordi. They raise them in a house of their own, located in the community of Punray. Despite his young age he has achieved many things. His greatest virtue is working tirelessly. Seven years ago he started out in agriculture. His main plantations consist of potatoes, peas, and beans. He takes care of them with much dedication. He has managed to obtain 5 hectares of farmland and although he does not have enough capital to produce the entire area, he does not lose heart. He has his wife's support. She has a grocery store from where she sells basic consumer goods to the population in her region. They have an extra income from there. Additionally, he was able to purchase a pick-up truck. With it he is able to transport his harvest to the city to sell and he also provides transportation services to third parties. He is a member of the communal bank "Punray Avanzado" and it is his ninth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). He is thankful for the support he received. He will invest the funds he requested in the purchase of natural fertilizers to disperse on his next "unica" potato cultivation, a Peruvian variety of potatoes.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es:
La señora Dionicia  vive en una localidad en la  que las personas  trabajan con el bordado de mantas, ella  vive en unión libre con el señor  Manuel y con quien  procreo sietes hijos de los cuales ya todos están casados.

       Ella se dedica a  la compra y venta de mantas como son blusas y camisas, así es como ellos trabajan desde hace treinta años y cuatro meses y le va bien ya que ha tenido un gran rendimiento  en su negocio.

     Ella se inspiro en esta actividad ya que sus papas también se dedicaban a lo mismo y de la edad de veinte años comenzó a practicarlo formalmente y cuando se caso siguió practicando hasta la fecha ya que es con lo que ha sacado adelante a su familia.

     Lo que más desea es que con esta pequeña actividad ella pueda seguir trabajando hasta que dios le preste vida y así también la sigan poyando  con el préstamo.
texts.en:
Dionicia lives in a community whose residents embroider fabric.  She lives in a common law relationship with Manuel and has seven children with him; all are now married.

She sells embroidered blouses and shirts.  They’ve been working this way for thirty years and four months.  She does well since the business has produced good results.

She was inspired into this activity because her parents also did this and she started at the age of 20 for formally do it.  When she got married she continued doing it up to the present; this is how she’s supported her family.

What she most desires with this small activity is to be able to continue to work while God gives her life and also that she will continue to be supported with the loan.

loans.use: to buy fabric and embroidery thread.

loans.name: Ana Rosario

texts.es:
Ana de 38 años, es una mujer trabajadora que decidió hace 20 años atrás tener un pequeño negocio de confección de ropa y así darse tiempo para pasar con su familia. Poco a poco fue mejorando sus ingresos. 

En la actualidad su horario de trabajo es desde las 08h00am hasta las 20h00pm en donde confecciona todos los pedidos que le piden sus clientes y vecinos.  Tiene muchas aspiraciones que su negocio mejore sus ingresos por eso desea el préstamo para comprar cemento, arena, bloques y ampliar su negocio para que el espacio físico no le impida atender a mas clientes ya que su negocio está en la parte delantera de su casa. En el fututo desea tener un taller de confección con maquinas industriales.
texts.en:
Ana is 38 years old. She is a hardworking woman who decided 20 years ago to open a small business making clothes to have time to spend with her family. Little by little she improved her income. 

At present, her work schedule is from 8:00 am till 8:00 pm. She makes all kinds of things that her customers and neighbors order. She aspires to improving her income and for that she wants a loan to buy cement, sand, and blocks to expand her business so that the physical space won't stop her from serving more customers, since her business is in the back of her house. In the future, she wants a workshop with industrial machines.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and blocks to expand her business.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
La señora Josefa es ama de casa y vive en una localidad en donde las personas son de una sola religión y su templo es grande y bonito, ella vive  en unión libre con el señor Lucas y con quien procreo cuatro hijos que aun están a su responsabilidad.
    Solicito el presamos para invertirlo en la compra de mantas, hilos de colores para elaborar camisas y blusas, en donde lleva practicando  20 años y ella se siente muy contenta ya que le va bien con su venta.
    Quien la inspiro a  esta actividad fue su familia  ya que también desea apoyar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa  y así sacar adelante a su  pequeña familia  quienes depende de ellos dos.
    Lo que más desea  es que con el préstamo  y  su actividad pueda ahorrar y comprar una maquina  que utiliza para bordar y tenga más mercancías en el mes.
texts.en:
Josefa’s a housewife.  She lives in a community where all the residents belong to the same religion; their temple is large and beautiful.  She lives in a common law relationship with Lucas and has four children with him; all are still her responsibility.

She asked for the loan to buy fabric and colored thread to make shirts and blouses.  She’s been in this occupation for 20 years and she feels very happy because she does well with her sales.

Her family inspired her into this activity because she wants to help her husband cover household expenses and move her small family, who depend on the two of them, ahead this way.

What she most desires with the loan and her activity is to be able to save up to buy an embroidery machine to have more merchandise during the month.

loans.use: to buy fabric and embroidery thread.

loans.name: Lucas

texts.es:
Don Lucas vive en unión libre con la señora María Guadalupe y con quien procreo un hijo de la edad de siete meses de edad.
  
    El es la primera vez que solicita el préstamo en fundación realidad y es para invetero en la compra de mantas, en donde  lleva practicando dos años y le va bien ya que también se dedica a l transporte con su taxi en lo que lleva practicando nueve años y le ha dado un buen resultado.

     Lo que lo motivo  a  esta actividad fue su  esposa para  ir mejorando día con día sus ingreso, así también su esposa se encarga de costurar la blusa y camisas  que están bordadas, para  que juntos puedan  lograr lo que desean.

    Lo que más desea es que con el tiempo pueda tener un atienda en la que puedan vender su mercancía sin necesidad de salir a otro lugar, así también comprar un carro para apoyar a su familia cuando  llevan sus artesanías.
texts.en:
Lucas lives with his common-law wife María Guadalupe and their seven-month-old son.  

This is the first time that Lucas has requested a loan from Fundación Realidad.  He will invest it in buying fabric.  He has been in this business for two years and it is doing very well.  He also provides a taxi service.  He has been in the taxi business for nine years and it is also doing well.

Lucas was encouraged to start this business by his wife so that they could continue improving their income.  His wife sews the embroidered blouses and shirts so that they can jointly achieve what they want.

What Lucas would most like, in the future, is to be able to set up a store where he can sell his merchandise without having to travel.  He would also like to buy a car so that he can support his family when they transport their handicrafts.

loans.use: to buy fabric and threads

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia es socia del Banco Comunal Paloma, tiene 27 años y 1 hijo, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 2 años. 
Sonia tiene una tienda de abarrotes en Vilcas Huaman, en Ayacucho tiene una carreta donde vende todo lo de abarrotes y también comida, recuerda que antes solo tenía la carreta pero era poco y con el primer préstamo compró azúcar y arroz, ahora su negocio ha crecido y Finca ayudó con todas la capacitaciones y los préstamos recibidos. Sonia esta muy feliz con todo lo que ha logrado, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá para poder comprar arroz, azúcar y golosinas para poder enviar Vilcas, su sueño es poder tener una tienda mayorista.
texts.en:
Sonia is a member of the Paloma community bank.  She is 27 years old and has one child.  She has been a member of FINCA Peru for two years.

Sonia has a grocery store in Vilcashuaman.  In Ayacucho she has a cart where she sells all kinds of groceries and also food.  She recalls that, in the past, she only had the cart but it wasn't much.  She used her first loan to buy sugar and rice.  Now her business has grown and FINCA have helped with all the training sessions and the loans they gave her.  Sonia is very happy with everything that she has accomplished.  She will invest her current loan in buying rice, sugar and candies.  Her dream is to own a wholesale store.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and candies

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco, de 59 años es una persona humilde. Vive en compañía de su esposa, Constantina desde hace 30 años. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, pero solo viven con 2 de ellos en su casa propia; ubicada en el Barrio La Esperanza. Su rostro avejentado, es propio de su sabiduría y experiencia en la agricultura. Ya tiene 35 años de práctica en la siembra de arveja, maíz, papa y habas; los cuales lo realizan en sus propios terrenos agrícolas. Según cuenta hace años las ganancias eran mayores, por ello pudo mantener a sus hijos y sacarlos adelante. Aunque ahora le cuesta mayor esfuerzo, no se desanima; pues tiene los conocimientos necesarios para poder sacar una cosecha de calidad. Además tiene clientes fijos en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, donde lleva a vender sus alimentos. Pero como es un hombre de campo, posee vacas, cerdos y ovejas que le proporcionan un dinero extra, ya que los enseba y vende a un buen precio. Ahora este trabajador hombre se concentra en su próxima cosecha de alverja, donde espera tener buenas ganancias. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Punray Avanzando” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su apoyo, pues desea continuar con su trabajo. Además promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. 
Francisco de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de mil kilos de semilla de papa, de la variedad “única” y si el dinero le alcanza fertilizantes naturales.
texts.en:
59-year-old Francisco is a humble person.  He has lived with his wife Constantina for 30 years.  The couple have five children but only two still live with them.  They live in their own home which is located in La Esperanza neighborhood.

Francisco's aged face reflects his agricultural wisdom and experience.  He has been growing peas, corn, potatoes and beans for 35 years.  He grows these crops on his own farmland.  He tells us that the profits used to be greater years ago and so he was able to support his children and get them ahead in life.  Although it is now harder for him, he does not become discouraged as he has the knowledge he needs to produce a top-quality harvest.  In addition, he has regular customers in the wholesale market in the city of Tarma where he takes his crops to sell.

As Francisco is a country man, he owns cows, pigs and sheep which provide him with extra money as he fattens them and sells them at a good price.  Right now, this hard-working man is concentrating on his upcoming pea harvest which he hopes will make him good profits.  

Francisco is a member of the "Punray Avanzando" community bank.  This is his eighth loan from MFP and he hopes to receive your support as he would like to continue in his work.  He pledges to be punctual in making his loan repayments.  With your support, Francisco will invest the money he has requested in buying 1,000 kilos of 'única' potato seeds and, if the money reaches far enough, natural fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy 1,000 kilos of potato seeds, and fertilizers

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de Jesús tiene 43 años su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Ella es una persona muy responsable y que además se siente muy satisfecha de obtener un medio de ingreso para su familia. El motivo del crédito es para comprar variedad en sus productos como bolsos, perfumes, cremas, prendas, calzado, ropa en general, sabanas entre otros hasta los momentos tiene una gran cantidad de pedidos de parte de sus clientes y quiere cumplirlos.
texts.en: Teresa de Jesús is 43 years old and her business is selling general merchandise.  She is a very responsible person who feels very satisfied at having found a way of making income for her family.  She will use this loan to buy a range of products including bags, perfumes, creams, jewelry, footwear, clothes and sheets.  She has a large number of orders from her customers and she would like to fill them.

loans.use: to buy bags, perfumes, creams, jewelry, footwear, clothes and sheets

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar es socio del Banco Comunal Paloma,tiene 27 años y 6 hijos.
En Matara Oscar tiene un fundo donde tiene 6 vacas lecheras, y produce queso, Oscar siempre tuvo el alquiler de este fundo pero ahora él desea poder comprar el fundo, recuerda que antes no tenía mucho, con la ayuda de los préstamos que ha recibido ha podido incrementar el número de vacas lecheras, le encanta las capacitaciones y el ahorro le ayuda a poder trazarse metas y cumplirlas. Con el préstamo que solicita se comprará una vaca lechera y su meta es poder comprarse el fundo.
texts.en:
Oscar is a member of the 'Paloma' (Dove) community bank.  He is 27 years old and has six children.

Oscar has a farm in Matara where he has six dairy cows and produces cheese.  Oscar has always rented this farm but now he would like to be able to buy it.  He recalls that, in the past, he didn't have much.  With the help of the loans that he has received, he has been able to increase his number of dairy cows.  He loves the training sessions and the savings help him to be able to set goals and accomplish them.  Oscar will use the loan that he is requesting to buy a dairy cow.  His goal is to buy his farm.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es: Gregorio, de 54 años es un hombre responsable. Él está casado desde hace 26 años con Juana, su esposa; ambos tienen 2 hermosos hijos: Frateli y Abdias. En unión familiar viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Punray. Sus días se centran en el trabajo arduo, ya que estar “ocupado”, le gusta mucho. Por ello desde hace 30 años, comenzó a sembrar papa, arveja y maíz en sus terrenos de cultivo. Donde todas las mañanas cuida con esmero, pues sabe que la maleza y la plaga de insectos pueden dañar su cosecha. Ya tiene 10 extensiones de terreno, donde puede continuar con su actividad y eso le gusta mucho. Su objetivo es comprar más terrenos, por eso comenzó hace poco a trabajar como albañil en la construcción de casas, donde le pagan un dinero extra. Con el tiempo espera ahorrar lo suficiente para lograr su meta. Además posee 2 terneras con los que piensa en el futuro, hacer queso e incursionar en ese negocio. Mientras se concentra en su próxima cosecha, donde tiene invertido dinero y espera recibir buenas ganancias. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Punray avanzando”  y este es el noveno crédito con MFP; donde se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo para salir adelante. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Gregorio de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja.
texts.en:
54-year-old Gregorio is a responsible man.  He has been married to his wife Juana for 26 years.  The couple have two beautiful children: Frateli and Abdias.  They live together in their own home which is located in the small village of Punray.

Gregorio's days are centred around hard work as he really enjoys keeping busy.  He has been growing potatoes, peas and corn on his farmland for 30 years.  Every morning he carefully tends to his crops as he knows that weeds and pests can damage his harvest.  He has ten tracts of land on which he works and he really enjoys it.  His goal is to buy more land and so, a short while ago, he started working as a builder, building houses.  This provides him with extra money.  Over time, he hopes to save up enough money to achieve his goal.  Gregorio also owns two calves.  In the future, he plans to make cheese from their milk and break into this business.  In the meantime, he is concentrating on his upcoming harvest.  He has invested money in this and hopes to make good profits.

Gregorio belongs to the "Punray Avanzando" and this is his ninth loan from MFP.  He feels happy as he receives the support he needs to get ahead in life.  He pledges to be punctual in making his loan repayments.  With your support, Gregorio will invest the money he has requested in buying a bag of pea seeds.

loans.use: to buy a bag of pea seeds

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Daniel le está haciendo falta la barda alrededor para que su familia este segura y protegida de cualquier accidente. 
Solicita el préstamo para comprar el material que es (cemento, block, varilla, arena y pagarle a la persona que realizara la mejora) ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar este proyecto a su casa. 
Planea pagar el crédito con el sueldo que recibe del su trabajo como empleado de una compañía de transportes, ya que su esposa la señora Alejandra se encargara de los gastos familiares y escolares de sus dos hijos con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajos. 
Desean que sus hijos tengas un patrimonio seguro donde puedan vivir. 
Don Daniel esta agradecido por su cooperación en el anterior crédito el cual reparo su baño, espero contar con ustedes en este préstamo.
texts.en:
Daniel's house needs a wall around it so his family will be safe and protected from any accident.  He is requesting the loan to buy the materials (which are cement, blocks, metal rods, sand, and payment for the person who will do the improvement), since he doesn't have the money necessary to accomplish this project for his house.

He plans to repay the loan with his salary from his job with a transportation company, since his wife Alejandra takes care of the family expenses and the school expenses of their two children with the salary from her jobs.

They hope their children will have a safe inheritance where they can live.

Daniel is grateful for your help with the previous loan, which repaired his bathroom.  "I hope to count on you for this loan."

loans.use: to build a wall around his house.

loans.name: Dorotea

texts.es: Dorotea, de 50 años es una mujer responsable; que cuidó de sus 9 hijos, sola y a pesar de la limitación; continua trabajando por 5 de ellos que todavía son menores. Juntos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Punray. Ella es una mujer feliz, pues tiene el apoyo de sus hijos. Los que le ayudan en las actividades del hogar. Según menciona, tiene varios ingresos económicos. Uno de ellos es la agricultura, donde tiene 30 años de experiencia en la siembra de arveja y papa en sus 2 hectáreas de terreno agrícola. Los que le proporcionan ingresos en cada cosecha, ya que tiene clientes fijos en la ciudad de Tarma; de la misma manera hace 4 moldes de queso al día, con la leche que le proporciona las 3 vacas que posee. Los cuales son cuidados por sus hijos, como también los cuyes, cerdos y gallinas, ahí obtiene un dinero extra con la venta de los mismos. Además teje colchas, frazadas y chalecos a base de lana; los que comercializa a pobladores de la zona. Sus días son agitados y de mucho trabajo; por ello quiere juntar el dinero necesario para poder brindar a sus hijos una buena educación. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Punray avanzando” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera de su apoyo, en esta oportunidad. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Dorotea de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales y guano de ave de corral para esparcir en su próxima siembra de papa “canchan”.
texts.en:
Dorotea, age 50, is a responsible woman who raised nine children alone.  In spite of that limitation, she continues working for five of them who are still minors.  They live together in her own house in the rural community of Punray.  She is happy because she has her children’s support.  They help her with the household chores.

She mentions that she has various incomes.  One of them is farming.  She has 30 years of experiences growing peas and potatoes on two hectares of farm land.  These give her income with each harvest because she has fixed customers in the city of Tarma.  She makes four molds of cheese a day with the milk that her three cows provide.  Her children take care of the cows in addition to the guinea pigs, pigs, and chickens.  She gets extra money by selling the animals.

Also, she weaves wool bedspreads, blankets, and vests; and she sells them to the people living in the area.  Her days are very hectic with a lot of work because she wants to get together the money needed to be able to give her children a good education.

She belongs to the Punray Avanzando Communal Bank.  This is her ninth loan with MFP, where she hopes for your support at this time.  She pledges to be punctual with her payments.  Upon receiving your support she will use the requested money to buy natural fertilizers and poultry guano to spread the next time she plants “canchan” potatoes (has a pink, thin skin; the meat is of a pale whitish color).

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer and poultry guano.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: Maria Cristina es casada y tiene 1 hijo de 4 años el cual está bajo su cargo. Desde hace 4 años que tiene este negocio que es una pulpería, fue por iniciativa propia que ha obtenido este medio de vida, la responsabilidad de brindarle a su familia los ingresos necesarios para su hogar hacen que Maria se esmere en el buen servicio para con sus clientes. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de granos básicos, pan, refrescos, detergentes, sopas, enlatados y  papel higiénico. Ella necesita comprar más insumos y productos para que su negocio tenga variedad para sus clientes y así pueda continuar creciendo.
texts.en: Maria Cristina is married and has a 4-year-old child in her care.  She has owned her general store business for four years.  She started out in this line of work through her own initiative.  The responsibility she has to provide her family with the income they need means that Maria takes care to provide her customers with good service.  She is requesting this loan to buy basic grains, bread, soft drinks, detergents, soups, canned goods and toilet paper.  She needs to buy more supplies and products so that her business has a good range of products available for her customers and can therefore continue to grow.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, bread, soft drinks, detergents, soups, canned goods and toilet paper

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria, de 50 años es una mujer valiente. Está casada desde hace 33 años con Gerardo, su esposo. Ambos tienen 7 hijos de los cuales falleció uno, ahora vive con 3 de ellos en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Punray. Siempre tiene una sonrisa en los labios. Con esa alegría comienza el día, pues ella se dedica al negocio de compra y venta de carne de toda variedad, el cual comercializa a los pobladores de la zona de Huacuas, donde tiene clientes fijos. Los que también le pidieron ropa de toda variedad, por ello Victoria, compró mercadería de la capital para revenderlo; ahí obtiene buenas ganancias, pues la zona es alejada y no existen comercios. Además ella aprovecha el frío del lugar; tejiendo faldas y chompas a base de lana, los que comercializa de la misma manera. Le gusta mucho su negocio; por ello espera ahorrar lo suficiente para poder tener una tienda equipada con las necesidades de los pobladores de la zona andina. Confiesa que su pasatiempo es la agricultura; siembra arveja en su terreno agrícola, pero en poca cantidad. “No debo dejar la costumbre”, afirma. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Punray avanzando” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con su objetivo. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.  Victoria de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de madejas de lana para sus tejidos y ropa de toda variedad para su negocio.
texts.en:
50-year-old Victoria is a courageous woman.  She has been married to her husband Gerardo for 33 years and the couple had seven children.  One of their children died and they now live together with three of them in their own home which is located in the small village of Punray.

Victoria always has a smile on her face.  She starts each day in this cheerful way.  Victoria's business is buying and selling all kinds of meat.  She sells her meat to the people who live in Huacuas area and has regular customers there.  Her customers also ask her for all kinds of clothes.  Victoria therefore bought merchandise in the capital city to re-sell.  This makes her good profits as the area is quite remote and there aren't many stores.  She makes the most of the fact that the place is cold and knits skirts and sweaters.  She also sells these.  Victoria really enjoys her business and hopes to save up enough money to open a store equipped with things that people in this Andean region need.  She confesses that her hobby is agriculture.  She sows peas on her plot of land but only in small quantities.  "I mustn't lose the habit" she says.

Victoria is a member of the "Punray Avanzando" community bank and this is her ninth loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive your support so that she can continue achieving her goals.  For her part, she pledges to be punctual in making her loan repayments.  With your support, Victoria will invest the money she has requested in buying skeins of yarn for knitting and all kinds of clothes for her business.

loans.use: to buy skeins of yarn in different colors and a range of clothes

loans.name: Jony Alexis

texts.es: Jony Alexis tiene 25 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de videos juegos. Desde hace 5 años,  que tiene  este medio de vida es en su vivienda en donde tiene establecido su negocio. La clave de su negocio es tener los juegos más recientes ya sus clientes son muy exigentes en solicitar los mejores juegos. En la actualidad considera que el ofrece un buen servicio para sus clientes. El crédito es para la compra discos, controles, videos juegos entre otros.
texts.en: Jony Alexis is 25 years old.  His business is providing a video game service.  He has been in this line of work for five years and his business is located in his home.  The key to his business is having the latest games available as his customers are very demanding and request the best games.  He currently believes that he offers his customers a good service.  He will use his loan to buy discs, controls, video games, etc.

loans.use: to buy discs, controls, video games, etc.

loans.name: Paula Petrona

texts.es: La señora Petrona Paula se dedica a la venta de nacatamales y tortillas desde hace 22 años, la ubicación es en su vivienda en donde la mayoría de sus amigos, vecinos, familiares, saben de la buena calidad de sus nacatamales. El crédito lo utilizara para invertirlo en la compra de masa, especies, chile, hojas, entre otros productos. Su sueño es que su negocio crezca cada día y mejorar cada día  en el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: Señora Petrona Paula has been selling nacatamales [Nicaraguan tamales] and tortillas from her home for 22 years.  The majority of her friends, neighbors, and family know of the good quality of her nacatamales.  She will use the loan to purchase flour, spices, chilies, leaves and other products.  Her dream is for her business to grow every day and to improve the welfare of her family every day.

loans.use: purchase flour, spices, chilies, leaves and other products

loans.name: Sope Ababacar Sy Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarité est créé depuis environ six mois. Il est composé de 10 femmes qui habitent toutes dans le même village et elles ont comme activité dominante le commerce de détails et l'embouche ovine.

Madame Soda positionnée à l’extrême droite de la photo est la responsable du groupe. Mère de 6 enfants; elle est âgée de 41 ans et a à sa charge des parents et beaux fils.

Elle fait du commerce de tissus au marché ou  elle a une cantine.Elle fait comme activité secondaire l'embouche ovine et caprine.

Avec son crédit elle compte acheter des tissus pour renforcer sa boutique afin d'augmenter son épargne pour aider son mari dans les charges familiales et assurer un bon épanouissement à ses enfants.
texts.en:
This solidarity group has been in existence for about six months. It is composed of 10 women who all live in the same village and whose primary activity is selling retail and raising goats and sheep. 

Madame Soda, who is on the far right of the photo, is the one responsible for the group. She is a mother of six children, aged 41, and is caring for her parents and her step-children.  

She sells cloth in the marketplace where she has a little shop. Her secondary activity is raising sheep and goats. 

With her loan, she intends to buy fabric to add to the stock in her shop so as to grow her savings to help her husband support the family and ensure that her children do well.

loans.use: to buy cloth destined for resale.

loans.name: Mwavuli Youth Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Western Kenya! John is the facilitator of the Mwavuli Youth group. John and his group joined One Acre Fund in 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program. As with the majority of farmers in Western Kenya, members of Mwavuli Youth Group are farmers who rely on maize as their staple crop. 

John takes care of five children at home. He joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough to ensure food security for his family and later educate them. In the recent 2011 season, John had an excellent maize yield harvesting six bags on ½ an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, John was only able to harvest two bags of maize on ½ acre of land. 

With income from maize sales, John will invest in livestock rearing and save for future use. 

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to John and his group during Kenya's next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund's integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit, and insurance. 

In 2012, the members of Mwavuli Youth group will each plant between ½ and one acre of maize.

In the photograph above, John is pictured with his group members.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Guillermo Antonio

texts.es: El Señor Guillermo tiene 42 años, la ubicación de su negocio es en el mercado en donde la mayoría de sus clientes siempre llegan a buscar el precio de sus productos a un precio accesible. Hace más de 6 años que tiene este medio de vida, Guillermo tiene que mantener a su esposa y sus tres hijos, quienes son lo más importante para él. Ha solicitado un crédito para la compra de zapatos para fútbol, zapatos para beisbol, botas, sandalias, zapatos deportivos entre otros.
texts.en:
Guillermo is 42 years old.  His business is located in the market where the majority of his customers always come to look for his products at an accessible price.  He has had this work for more than six years.

Guillermo has to support his wife and three children, who are the most important thing for him.

He has requested a loan to buy soccer shoes, baseball shoes, boots, sandals, and sports shoes, among other types.

loans.use: to buy soccer shoes, baseball shoes, boots, sandals, and sports shoes, among other types.

loans.name: Lizbeth Mireille

texts.es:
Lizbeth es una mujer divorciada, madre de tres hijos que tienen 16, 14 y 11 años. Los cuatro viven en la parroquia de "Río Verde" del Cantón "Santo Domingo". Santo Domingo es cantón y ciudad de la nueva Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, que era parroquia rural de Quito,  Santo Domingo está entre la costa y la sierra del Ecuador, punto de enlace entre Quito, Guayaquil, Portoviejo,  y otras ciudades importantes. Situado en los flancos externos de la cordillera occidental, así como en la planicie costeña inferior a los 1000 msnm, es la zona de mayor pluviosidad del país. Tiene una gran riqueza hidrológica: existen cinco cuencas y micro cuencas importantes. Es una zona climática lluviosa subtropical, posee una temperatura promedio de 22 °C.

Ella tiene un negocio de confección de ropa. Por la mañana ella es profesora en un colegio del cantón y luego ella trabaja en su taller de costura. El ser padre y madre de sus hijos ha sido duro ya que ella es quien solventa económicamente las necesidades de su hogar y por esta razón tiene dos trabajos. Aprovechando la temporada de entrada a clases ella quiere invertir en telas para uniformes y de esta manera aprovechar la gran clientela de la época. Así podrá tener mejores ingresos y así sus hijos podrán seguir estudiando.

El sueño que Lizbeth tiene como madre es de poder ver a sus hijos realizados tanto profesionalmente como en su vida personal.
texts.en:
Lizbeth is a divorced woman and a mother of three children, ages 16, 14 and 11.  The four of them live in the Río Verde parish in the Santo Domingo canton.  Santo Domingo is a canton and city in the new Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas province, which used to be a rural parish of Quito.  Santo Domingo is between the coast and the mountain range in Ecuador, a connecting point between Quito, Guayquil, Portoviejo and other important cities.  It is situated on the outer edges of the western mountains and in the lower coastal plain at 1000 meters above sea level.  This area has the highest rainfall in the country.  There is a great abundance of water as there are 5 important river basins and micro basins here.  It is a rainy, subtropical zone and the average temperature is 22 °C.  

Lizbeth has a business making clothing.  In the morning, she is a teacher at the local school and then she works in her sewing shop.  It has been difficult being both mother and father to her children as she provides the only source of income to cover the household expenses and because of this, she has two jobs.  Since it is the of the start of the school year, she wants to purchase fabric to make uniforms and take advantage of the large number of customers during this season.  This way she will be able to increase her income so her children will be able to continue studying.  

Lizbeth's dream as a mother is to see her children achieve success professionally as well as in their personal lives.

loans.use: purchase fabric to make school uniforms.

loans.name: Nestor Jacobo

texts.es: Néstor Jacobo tiene 31 años es casado tiene un hijo vive con su esposa. El se dedica a la venta de medicamentos, pues siempre ha sido una persona muy dedica y al mismo tiempo siempre ha trabajado para proporcionarle a su familia los ingresos necesarios. El crédito lo solicita para comprar vitaminas, suplementos, jarabes, pomadas, gel entre otros. El crédito le ayudara como apoyo para mejorar su negocio. Uno de sus mayores desafíos ha sido el complacer a sus clientes en brindarles lo que le solicitan. Su sueño es obtener otro negocio en donde pueda generar más ganancias a su hogar.
texts.en: Néstor Jacobo is 31 years old, married and has a child.  He lives with his wife.  He sells medicines for a living.  He has always been a very dedicated person and has worked to provide his family with the necessary income.  He is requesting a loan to buy vitamins, supplements, syrups, ointments and other things.  The loan will help him to improve his business.  One of his greatest challenges has been accommodating his customers and being able to offer them what they request.  His dream is to obtain another business so he can generate more income for his household.

loans.use: purchase vitamins, supplements, syrups, ointments and other products.

loans.name: Wekhuyera Netundo Group

texts.en:
Richard is the facilitator of the Wekhuyera Netundo group. Richard and his group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program. 

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Richard and his group during Kenya's next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund's integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance. 

Richard takes care of nine children at home. He joined One Acre Fund to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and to grow enough to ensure food security for his family. In the recent 2011 season, Richard had a very good maize yield harvesting 13 bags on one ½ acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Richard was only able to harvest four bags of maize on one ½ acre of land. 

With income from maize sales, Richard will invest in livestock rearing and save for the future. 

In 2012, the members of Wekhuyera Netundo group will each plant between ½ and one acres of maize. 

In the photograph above, Richard is pictured with his group members.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Julia Justina

texts.es:
Doña Julia, de 57 años de edad, originaria de la cuidad de Granada, es comerciante, ella vende zapatos en el mercado municipal de la ciudad de Granada, lleva 5 años con este negocio, ella empezó vendiendo chinelas de baño de manera ambulante sin tener un punto fijo de venta pero poco a poco y con mucho esfuerzo fue adquiriendo su pequeño local. 
Ella esta solicitando el préstamo para comprar inventario de zapatos de diferentes estilos y medidas para vender. Ella espera vender un poco más al tener más variedad de estilos para vender y que le brinde la oportunidad de seguir adelante con su negocio. Ella desea ampliar su local, hacerlo un poco mas grande y contratar a vendedores que le ayuden a vender su productos en los diferentes zonas comerciales de Granada.
texts.en:
Doña Julia is 57 years old and is a native of the city of Granada.  She is a merchant who has been selling shoes in the municipal market in the city of Granada for 5 years.  She started out selling bath slippers in an itinerant manner without having a fixed location from which to sell.  Little by little and with a lot of hard work, she was able to buy her own small local.  

She is requesting a loan to buy different styles and sizes of shoes to sell.  She hopes that by having more variety of styles that she will sell a little more and have the opportunity to get ahead in her business.  She wants to expand her local, making it a little bigger, as well as hire sales people that will help her to sell her products in the different shopping districts in Granada.

loans.use: purchase an inventory of different styles and sizes of shoes to sell

loans.name: Imani B Group

texts.en:
Felistus is the facilitator of the Imani B group. Felistus and her group joined One Acre Fund in 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program. 

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Felistus and her group during Kenya's next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund's integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance. 

Felistus takes care of seven children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Felistus had a very good maize yield harvesting eight bags on ½ an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Felistus was only able to harvest one and a quarter bags of maize on ½ acre of land. 

With income from maize sales, Felistus will educate her children and invest in livestock rearing. 

In 2012, the members of Imani B group will each plant maize plots between ½ and one acre of land. 

In the photograph above, Felistus is pictured with her group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Imani Shg Group

texts.en:
Violet is the facilitator of the Imani SHG group. Violet and her group joined One Acre Fund in 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Violet and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

Violet takes care of 12 children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertiliser and hybrid seeds to ensure food security for her family and give them education. In the recent 2011 season, Violet had a very good maize yield harvesting 7 bags on half an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Violet was only able to harvest 3 bags of maize on half an acre of land.

With income from maize sales, Violet will educate her children and invest in business.

In 2012, the members of Imani SHG group will each plant maize plots between one half and one acre of land.

In the photograph above, Violet is pictured with her group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Umoja Oaf Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Umoja OAF Group in Western Kenya!  Saul is the facilitator of the Umoja OAF group. Saul and his group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.  This group resides in Chwele district.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Saul and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

Saul takes care of 2 children at home. He joined One Acre Fund in order to increase farm profits and educate his children. In the recent 2011 season, Saul had a very good maize yield harvesting 20 bags on 1.5 acres of land. Before joining One Acre Fund,  Saul was only able to harvest 2 bags of maize on 1 acre of land.

With income from maize sales, Saul will educate his children and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Umoja OAF group will each plant between ½ and 1 acres of maize.  

In the photograph above, Saul is pictured with his group members, with their Field Officer at the far left.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Maria Teresa de 42 años, es casada vive en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Ella cuenta con su negocio que es una panadería, actividad que realiza desde hace 11 años, cuenta con su propia clientela, es conocida por la limpieza y los deliciosos panes que ofrece. Ha solicitado un préstamo para comprar insumos, huevos, mantequilla, harina, leña entre otros. Maria con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante se ha ganado la confianza de sus clientes, con la finalidad de que más adelante tenga un negocio grande donde ofrezca una gran variedad de pan.
texts.en: María Teresa, 42, is married and lives in her own house that has all basic utilities.  She has two minor children in her care.  She has a business which is a bakery, an activity she’s been in for the last 11 years.  She has an established clientele and she’s known for her cleanliness and for the delicious bread she offers.  She’s asked for a loan to buy ingredients: eggs, butter, flour and firewood, among others.  With her hard work and drive to get ahead, María has won over the trust of her customers with the aim of later on having a business where she offers a great variety of bread.

loans.use: to buy eggs, butter, flour and firewood.

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.es:
Esmeralda, de 43 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de Granada, madre de 4 hijos, ella es comerciante, se dedica a elaborar y vender tortillas de maíz. Su nivel de estudio es básico, solo llego hasta sexto grado de primaria. Inicio a los 35 años de edad, comenzó con 3 libras de maíz , vendía un promedio de 60 tortillas, su cocina era un pequeño comal(cocina ella de barro), ella misma salía vender sus tortillas pues se levanta desde muy tempranas horas de la madrugada para poder a salir a vender. Hoy en día tiene una pequeña cocina industrial, tiene tres ayudantes los fines de semana vende comida que son otros ingresos que ella tiene. 
Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz, leña. Es parte de la materia prima fundamental  que necesita para elaborar sus tortillas y con el préstamo podrá adquirir mayor cantidad para elaborar mas producto y vender mas. Además tiene como meta poder poner una venta de comida , quiere vender almuerzos, tener una distribuidora de refrescos y como planes futuro poder remodelar su local para darle una mejor presentación a su negocio y ofrecer oportunidad de trabajo a otras personas.
texts.en:
Esmeralda, 43, lives in the city of Granada.  She’s the mother of four children.  She’s a merchant.  She makes corn tortillas to sell.  Her educational level is basic, she only completed sixth grade in elementary school.  She started work at the age of 35.  She started out with just three pounds of corn and sold 60 tortillas on average.  Her stove was a small clay griddle.  She herself would then go out to sell her tortillas because she rises at dawn to be able to go out to sell.  Today, she has a small industrial stove and three helpers.  On weekends she sells food which is another source of income for her.

She is requesting the loan to buy corn and firewood which are fundamental materials needed to make tortillas.  With the loan she’ll be able to buy larger amounts to make more product and sell more.  In addition, she has the goal of setting up food sales; she wants to sell lunches and have a soft-drink distributorship.  Also in her future plans is remodeling her locale to make her business more presentable and to be able to offer employment to others.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Karla Vanessa

texts.es:
Karla es una mujer de 27 años madre de tres hijos. No está casada y vive en la parroquia de "Río Verde" del cantón Santo Domingo. Santo Domingo es un cantón de la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas" el cual es uno de los más densamente poblados del Ecuador. Tiene un gran atractivo ya que posee varios monumentos distribuidos por toda la ciudad entre el que está el Monumento al Indio Colorado, sector conocido como la “Y del Colorado”.  Santo Domingo es un cantón privilegiado, con gente maravillosa, trabajadora y emprendedora, que lucha incansablemente por el desarrollo y progreso, que recibe al turista siempre con los brazos abiertos y los lleva a conocer lo maravilloso de su cultura y entorno. 

Desde hace 5 años trabaja de manera independiente confeccionando ropa, oficio que aprendió de su último trabajo. Da trabajo a dos señoras que le ayudan en la confección. Trabaja todo el día y en ocasiones la jornada se extiende hasta altas horas de la noche. Ella desea invertir comprando telas y una máquina para de esta manera extender su negocio. 

La vida no ha sido fácil pero ella desea mantener su ritmo de trabajo y así poder seguir sustentando económicamente su hogar. Su sueño es tener su casa propia y por ello se esfuerza diariamente.
texts.en:
Karla’s a 27-year-old mother of three children.  She’s not married and lives in Río Verde Parish in Santo Domingo Canton.  Santo Domingo is a canton belonging to Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas Province which is one of Ecuador’s most densely populated.  It’s very attractive because it has several monuments scattered throughout the city.  Among them is the “Monumento al Indio Colorado” [Monument to the Red Indian], a sector known as “Y del Colorado.”  Santo Domingo is a canton that’s blessed with marvelous, hardworking and enterprising people that strive untiringly to develop and make progress; they receive tourists with open arms and show them the marvels of their culture and surroundings.

For the last five years she’s been working independently making clothes, a skill she learned at her previous employment.  She employs two women that help her sew.  She works all day and sometimes the work day extends well into the night.  She wants to buy fabric and a sewing machine to expand her business.

Life has not been easy but she wants to keep up the pace of her work to continue supporting her home economically.  Her dream is to have a house of her own and that’s why she works so hard every day.

loans.use: to buy fabric and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to erect a front wall.

loans.name: Ivania Del Socorro

texts.es: La Ivania Del Socorro tiene 30 años, cuenta con un negocio que es la venta de calzado. Con las ganancias que le genera dicha actividad percibe ingresos para cubrir las necesidades y obligaciones que tiene en su hogar, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad los cuales estudian en escuelas públicas La Señora Ivania utilizara el crédito para comprar sandalias, botas, chinelas de baño, zapatillas, zapatos deportivos entre otros. Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio y darles una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: Ivania Del Socorro is 30 years old.  Her business is selling footwear.  Profits from this activity make it possible for her to cover her household needs and obligations.  She’s a single mother of two minor children who go to local public schools.  Ivania will use the loan to buy sandals, boots, bath slippers, slippers and sports shoes, among others.  Her goal is to make her business grow and to provide her children with a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sandals, boots, bath slippers, slippers and sports shoes, among others.

loans.name: Maria Angelica

texts.es: Maria Angélica, vive en casa propia, Maria ha logrado obtener desde hace 2 años su negocio que es la venta de cosméticos y ropa nueva su esfuerzo constante por obtener diariamente nuevos clientes. El ingreso generado por ella es lo que provee el alimento diario de esta familia además sirve para pagos de los servicios básicos de agua y luz, dado que los ingresos que percibe su esposo son muy bajos para cubrir las necesidades de éste hogar. La actitud positiva, responsable y emprendedora es la que ha permitido que éste no sea primer crédito es por eso que solicita el financiamiento para la compra de lápiz labial, brillos, polvos, pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes entre otros.
texts.en: Maria Angelica lives in her own home.  For the last two years Maria has been running her business of cosmetics and new clothing sales, through her constant effort to obtain new customers.  Her income provides the daily food for this family and also pays for the basic services such as water and light.  The income that her husband provides is not enough to cover the expenses of the family.  Her positive, responsible and enterprising attitude is what made her seek a loan in the past and what has brought her to ask for one now.  She will purchase lipsticks, lip glosses, powders, slacks, shirts, skirts among other items.

loans.use: to buy lipsticks,lips glosses, powders, slacks, shirts, skirts among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy underwear for men and women, body treatments, creams, perfumes, powders, lipsticks, eye shadow, and more.

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es: Pablo Emilio tiene 43 años, su actividad es una pulpería y venta de ropa. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este negocio. Inicio porque él siempre le ha gustado tener un medio de vida con el cual pueda mejorar los ingresos de su hogar. Pedro realizara este crédito para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, entre otros.
texts.en: Pablo Emilio is 43 years old. His business is a general store and the sale of clothing.  He has had this business for 5 years.  He started it because he always liked having a means of being able to improve the income of his home.  Pedro will invest this loan in the purchase of basic grains, candies, refreshments and other products.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, candies, refreshments and other products.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: la señora Norma tiene la actividad de venta de comida, tiene un local para la venta, ella no solo vende almuerzo sino también platos especiales como ser pollo chuleta silpancho y otros, ella esta casada sus hijos ya son mayores y ya trabajan y otros ya están casados, la señora en su juventud estudio para ser profesora ejerció varios años su profesión, pero ella vio que en el negocio le va mucho mejor por eso ella decidió dedicarse al negocio, su esposo tiene la actividad de topógrafo el trabaja bajo contrato normalmente con alcaldía de la ciudad de la paz, la señora invertirá el crédito en la construcción de su terreno, la señora quiere construir su terreno para que en un futuro uno de sus hijos vaya a vivir ahí.
texts.en: Mrs. Norma sells food from a space that she owns.  She not only sells lunches but also special dishes such as chicken, pork chops, silpancho (a typical local dish) and others.  She is married and has grown children.  They work and some are already married.  When she was young she studied to be a teacher and worked at this profession for several years.  She noted that she was better off running her business and decided to dedicate all her time to it.  Her husband works in topography and has contracts with the office of the mayor of the city of La Paz.  She will invest this loan in the construction of her land.  She wants to to develop her land so that in the future her children can live there.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for the development of her land.

loans.name: Tamara Lucia

texts.es: Tamara tiene 34 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. La experiencia que tiene con su negocio es de 4 años, la falta de empleo hicieron que Tamara buscara esta forma de sobrevivir. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de bolsos, calzado, cosméticos, ropa interior entre otros. Ella sueña con seguir adelante con su negocio.
texts.en: Tamara, 34, sells general merchandise.  She has four years’ experience in this business.  Lack of employment opportunities led Tamara to seek out this way of surviving.  The reason for the loan is to buy purses, footwear, cosmetics and underwear, among others.  She dreams with staying in business.

loans.use: to buy purses, footwear, cosmetics and underwear, among others.

loans.name: Marlon Adolfo

texts.es: Marlon Adolfo es un hombre soltero, su negocio lo realiza de manera ambulante es con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación que ha obtenido todo lo que posee. El se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general, empezó invirtiendo en pocos productos como calzado, bolsos, ropa, reloj, prendas entre otros fue así que por medio de sus amigo logro tener fama. Es por tal razón que realiza este crédito para la compra de materia prima. El sueña con mejorar sus ingresos y lograr incrementar su inventario.
texts.en: Marlon Adolfo is a single man.  He’s a street vendor who has acquired what he owns through much effort and dedication.  He sells general merchandise.  He started out investing a little in such things as footwear, purses, clothes, watches and other items.  This was the way that he eventually became well known among his friends.  For this reason, he’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise.  He dreams with improving his income and increasing his inventory.

loans.use: to buy footwear, purses, clothes, watches and other items.

loans.name: Maria Jose

texts.es: Maria José es una mujer de 43 años, Desde hace 2 años ella se dedica a una librería. Esta actividad la empezó por motivación propia con ahorros de salario, pues trabaja como docente,  para así poder aportar económicamente a su hogar. Es no es su primer crédito pues está convencida de que esto le ayudará a tener mayor ingreso para su familia. Maria nos cuenta que lo más complicado del negocio es convencer al cliente, es por esto que ella diariamente trata de mejorar su manera de expresarse. El crédito es para la compra de hojas de block, cartulinas, lapiceros, borradores, reglas, resaltadores entre otros.
texts.en:
María José, 43, has been running a stationery shop for the last two years.  She started the business on her own initiative to help support her household with savings from her salary because she works as a teacher.  

This isn’t her first loan because she’s convinced that this will help her have higher income for her family.  María tells us that the most complicated thing about her business is convincing customers and this is why she tries daily to improve her manner of speaking.  The loan will be used to buy binder paper, construction paper, mechanical pencils, erasers, rulers and highlighters, among others.

loans.use: to buy binder paper, construction paper, mechanical pencils, erasers, rulers and highliters.

loans.name: Beatriz Adriana

texts.es:
La señora Beatriz tiene ya más de cuatro años con su negocio de venta de ropa para eventos sociales. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para invertir en comprar más mercancía y variedad de vestidos de fiesta  para mujeres, niñas y trajes de noche para hombres y niños, ya que sus clientes le están solicitando que tenga más variedad de ropa. 
Doña Beatriz planea pagar el crédito con las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas de su negocio, ya que su esposo el señor José se encargara de los gastos familiares  y escolares de sus dos hijos, con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo como chofer de un camión de carga. 
Desea que su negocio tenga más inventario y que pueda tener mas ingreso para ayudar a su esposo para que sus hijos puedan tener una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Beatriz has been selling party clothes for the last four years.  She’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise and a variety of party dresses for woman and little girls as well as evening wear for men and boys because her customers are asking her to have a wider variety of clothes.

Beatriz plans to repay the loan with profits earned from her sales since her husband, José, takes care of covering family expenses and their children’s educational expenses with the salary he earns working as a truck driver.

She wants her business to have more stock inventory so that she can earn higher income to help her husband so that their children can have professional careers.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: La señora Rosa Maria tiene 54 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad la señora Rosa tiene su negocio que es la venta de ropa de todo tipo para damas, caballeros, y niños desde hace 15 años que tiene experiencia con este negocio. Con su nuevo préstamo comprara pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, shorts, ropa interior. Todo lo que está comprando es para atraer la atención de nuevos clientes. Es por medio de esto que ella está generando ganancias a su hogar.
texts.en: Rosa María, 54, is a single mother of two minor children.  Rosa’s business is clothing sales.  She has been selling all sorts of clothes for women, men and children; she has 15 years’ experience with this business.  She will use her new loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits, shorts and underwear.  Everything she’s buying is to attract the attention of new customers.  It’s through this that she generates profits for her home.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits, shorts and underwear.

loans.name: Blanca Roxana

texts.es: La señora Blanca es socia integrante del banco de emprendimiento "buenas emprendedoras" se dedica a la confección y costura de  loncheras, mochilas chalequeras estuches chamarras. El crédito esta destinado a la compra de material como ser rollos de tela cintas elásticas y otros por mayor. Vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, en la casa de sus padrinos. Mas adelante piensan en comprar un terreno y tener un hogar propio, es una persona joven trabajadora su deseo es poder tener un taller de confección mas grande y contratar mano de obra.
texts.en:
Señora Blanca is a member of the communal bank "Buenas Emprendedoras" [Good Entrepreneurs]. She works as a sewer and makes lunch bags, satchels, pencil cases, vests and jackets. The loan is to be used for the purchase of materials such as rolls of fabric, elastic bands and other wholesale goods. 

She lives with her husband and her three school age children in her godparents' house. They are thinking about buying a plot of land and having a home of their own later on. She is a young, hardworking person and she wants to be able to have a bigger sewing workshop and to hire staff.

loans.use: to buy supplies (rolls of fabric etc)

loans.name: Benito

texts.es:
Benito natural de la ciudad de San Miguel, tiene 42 años, esta casado Fortunata de 40 años y tienen 05 hijos. Juntos habitan en su propia casa en el distrito de Samugari perteneciente a la selva Ayacuchana.
Los verdes campos de su comunidad, han sido en la vida de Benito un lugar muy agradable para trabajar, pues él proviene de una familia que por tradición siempre se han dedicado a la agricultura, y actualmente cuenta con su propia parcela de 3 hectáreas y en ella siembra cacao, café y plantas de maní. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar, pues de esa manera ve su recompensa luego de mucho dedicación y esfuerzo. Tiene 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que el transportar sus cultivos desde su comunidad hasta los centros de acopio situados en la ciudad de Santa Rosa, le resulta muy difícil. Por otro lado comprará calaminas para renovar el tejado de si vivienda. Con el tiempo, espera juntar el dinero suficiente para comprar nuevas tierras para luego heredarlos a sus queridos hijos. Este será su 17avo crédito con MFP, sus anteriores créditos le fueron muy beneficiosos para invertir en su parcela y en esta oportunidad espera contar con el mismo apoyo de ustedes para seguir prosperando.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles que solicita, comprará materiales de construcción para poder refaccionar el tejado de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Benito is from the city of San Miguel.  He’s 42 years old and married to Fortunata, 40.  They have five children.  They live together in their own house in Samugari District belonging to the Ayacucho jungle region.

The green fields in his community have been Benito’s life.  It is a very pleasant place to work because he comes from a family that’s been traditionally involved in farming.  He currently has three hectares of land where he grows cocoa beans, coffee and peanuts.  What he most likes about his work is harvesting because that’s the reward for his hard work and dedication.  He’s been in this line of work for 15 years and considers transporting his crops from his community to the gathering centers located in the city of Santa Rosa to be the most difficult part.

On another note, he plans to buy sheets of plywood to reroof his house.  In time, he hopes to gather enough money together to buy new fields to then pass down to his beloved children.  This will be his 17th MFP loan.  His previous loans were very beneficial for him to invest in his field and on this occasion he hopes to have the same support from you so that he can continue making progress.  He will use the requested 2000 new soles to buy construction materials and supplies to reroof his house.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Leidis Mariela

texts.es: La joven Leidis Mariela de 23 años de edad, labora como responsable de Administracionn Tributaria desde hace 3 años desempeñandose con gran honestidad y responsabilidad; esta solicitando su 2do credito con el objetivo de comprar un terreno y en el futuro hacer su casa poco a poco. Según referencias comerciales, laborales y personales, es una joven con muchos deseos de superaciòn laboral y profesional, sus padres siempre la han apoyado en sus estudios, su mayor sueño en la vida es culminar sus estudios universitarios y gozar de estabilidad labora para asi poder ayudar a su linda familia.
texts.en: Leidis Mariela, 23, has been employed for the last three years as a tax collector honestly and responsibly.  She’s asking for her second loan to buy a piece of land on which to gradually build her house.  According to commercial, employment and personal references, she is a young woman with a strong drive to improve both professionally and at work.  Her parents have always supported her schooling.  Her greatest wish in life is to complete her university training and to enjoy employment stability to be able to help her lovely family.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land

loans.name: Ashley

texts.en:
Ashley is what you'd call a jack-of-all trades. She has worked as a computer technician, a Hilton Hotel guest services representative, and a land-lady. In 2004 she started her first business, a transportation service that took children to and from daycare. It was during this time she decided to start  Open Minds Open Hearts Daycare because she witnessed first-hand that many daycares did not stimulate and educate the children enrolled there. As the name of her center suggests, Ashley strives to help children to learn social and emotional skills that will prepare them for school and life in general. "A good daycare is not just a babysitting service," says Ashley. "I want to make sure that all the children that leave me will do great in school. They are the future." 

Open Hearts Open Minds Daycare opened in 2006 after Ashley obtained her Child Development Associate's degree. The center can hold up to 35 children in three separate classrooms. Ashley's business provides full-time employment to three staff members besides herself. The business is located in a spot close to Ashley's heart: a renovated grocery store next door to her grandfather's house where she was raised. 

Ashley is seeking this loan because she wants to boost her Quality Star Rating from three to four stars, helping her to attract more clients and to reflect the center's mission of providing excellent childcare. Ashley will use the loan to purchase child-sized tables and chairs, musical instruments from a variety of cultures to expose the children to cultural diversity, and materials for outside activities to promote active physical play. 

Ashley was drawn to applying for this loan because of the person-to-person nature of Kiva. "What I like about the Kiva loan is that it is people helping people, showing that we are united no matter where we are in the world," she said. "It's great to know that someone supports you and has a connection with you. Versus a bank, it just sees numbers, it doesn't see you as a person, it doesn't see your mission. Kiva is more personal than numbers." 

People always ask Ashley how she went from computers to childcare. She says she has always loved children, and now her business allows her to spend more time with her two-year-old son, Colby.

loans.use: To pay for age-appropriate furniture, musical instruments, and outdoor playtoys.

loans.name: Liz Mariela

texts.es: la señorita Liz  se dedica a la venta de accesorios para celulares como carcasas radios,  USB, chicotillos , cables USB, cargadores vende en una de las avenidas mas concurridas de la ciudad de La Paz y vive en la zona céntrica de la ciudad,  pertenece a un banco de emprendimiento  Sam Soom  es cliente antigua muy responsable  el dinero del crédito es  para la  compra de mercadería en cargadores, radios carcasas de celular y de este modo incrementar su capital de trabajo, es una persona joven con ganas de superación, trabaja duro ya que su deseo es el de mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Liz sells cell phone accessories like cases, radios, USBs, cables, straps and chargers along the city of La Paz’s busiest streets.  She lives in the central part of the city and belongs to the Sam Soom communal bank.  She’s a longstanding client and very responsible.  The money from the loan is to buy merchandise like chargers, radios, mobile phone cases to increase working capital.  She’s a young person with a strong drive to improve.  She works hard because she wants to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cell phone cables and chargers.

loans.name: Amparo
