texts.es: La cliente amparo de 28 años de edad con domicilio en la zona alto san isidro de propiedad  de los padres tiene la actividad de salón de belleza ubicado en el mismo domicilio, pero encontró un lugar de mayor afluencia de clientes en otro ambiente cercano al domicilio que le ofrecieron en anticrético por un monto módico, ella cuenta con el 70% del efectivo y es por tal razón que solicito un crédito en nuestra institución, ya que también el hermano es cliente nuestro, nuestra clienta es soltera pero tiene un niño de 1 año de edad el cual mantiene ella sola con el apoyo de sus padres, es una persona joven con ganas de superación desea mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de su pequeño hijito.
texts.en:
Amparo, 28, resides in the Alto San Isidro zone in her parents’ house.  She has a beauty salon there but she found a different location that has more street traffic in another neighborhood near her house that she’s being offered at an affordable price in the “anticrético” modality [Anticrético is a transaction whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract. If your loan is not repaid, the property owner loses the property to you].  She only has 70% of the cash needed and this is why she’s asking for a loan from our institution since her brother is also a client of ours.  

She is single but she has a one-year-old son who she currently supports by herself with help from her parents.  She is a young person with a strong drive to improve her and her little boy’s quality of life.

loans.use: to complete rental agreement payment.

loans.name: Blanca Azuvena

texts.es:
Blanca de 39 años, es una mujer trabajadora que es vendedora de ropa. Comenzó su negocio con un préstamo en D-MIRO para tener un capital de trabajo fuerte y comenzar con su negocio. 

Poco a poco fue desarrollando su negocio con variedades de ropa. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 08h00am vendiendo ropa y bebidas para generar dinero ya que tiene tres hijos. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere mejorar la visualidad de su negocio ampliando las paredes para que el cliente tenga comodidad al ver la mercadería. Con el préstamo quiere comprar cemento, arena y bloques.
texts.en:
Blanca, 39, is a hardworking woman who sells clothes.  She started her business with a D-MIRO loan to be well capitalized and start her business.  Gradually, she developed the business with a variety of clothes.  

Presently, she works from 8am selling clothes and beverages to generate income since she has three children.  She has many goals for her business and this is why she wants to improve its appearance expanding the walls so that her customers will be able to examine her merchandise more comfortably.  She will use the loan to buy cement, sand and concrete blocks.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and concrete blocks.

loans.name: Bayardo Antonio

texts.es:
A sus 38 años de edad Bayardo es un emprendedor que hace varios años se dedica al cultivo de fríjol, café y tomate, pues en su familia las labores del campo son una tradición y actualmente él es quien genera los ingresos de su hogar gracias a sus cultivos. 

Bayardo solicita un préstamo con el cual mejorar su negocio, hacer adecuaciones locativas, compra de abono, insecticidas y fungicidas para que sus cultivos estén siempre en perfecto estado, y aunque Bayardo no cuenta con el capital para invertirle a su negocio, esta lleno se sueños por cumplir poco a poco, y así ofrecerle  a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Bayardo, 38 years old, is an entrepreneur who has been working for some years growing beans, coffee, and tomatoes. It is traditional in his family to work at farming and he is the one who brings in the household income thanks to his crops.

Bayardo is asking for a loan in order to improve his business, make some adjustments to it, to buy fertilizer, insecticides, and fungicides to help keep his crops in perfect condition. Although Bayardo does not have investment capital, he is full of dreams to satisfy, little by little, and by doing so to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es: La Sra. Carmen tiene como actividad la venta de repuestos de fotocopiadoras actividad que realiza los días jueves y domingos en la populosa feria de la 16 de julio de la ciudad de el Alto de la Paz, LA Sra. Carmen vive junto con su esposo quien es constructor y sus tres hijos que están estudiando,  esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingreso para ellos, en esta ocasión solicitan financiamiento para el aumento de capital de operaciones comprando repuestos por cantidad , la Sra. Carmen también  diversificaran su actividad realizando acopio de chatarra para su posterior venta a las fundiciones, de esta manera poder mejorar sus  ingresos.
texts.en:
Carmen is in the business of selling spare parts for photocopiers. She works on Thursdays and Sundays at the crowded 16th of July Market in the city of Alto de la Paz. 

Carmen lives together with her husband who is a builder, and her three sons who are studying. 

This activity is the principal source of income for them. She is asking for a loan in order to buy spare parts in quantity to increase her profits. She is also thinking of branching out now by gathering iron scrap for later sale to smelters, and in this way be able to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase photocopier spare parts in quantity

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es: Oscar Antonio tiene 51 años, su actividad es una pulpería en donde ofrece los productos de primera necesidad para sus clientes. Oscar siempre ha sido un padre responsable que le ha brindado a su familia los ingresos necesarios para mejorar su calidad de vida. Él solicita este crédito para la compra de granos básicos, detergentes, golosinas, sopas y enlatados.
texts.en:
Oscar Antonio is 51 years old. He has a general grocery store where he offers basic essential goods for his customers. 

Oscar has always been a responsible father who has provided his family with the income needed to improve their quality of life. 

He is asking for this loan in order to buy basic grains, detergent, candy, and cans of soup.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, detergent, candy, and cans of soup.

loans.name: Sembrando Group

texts.es:
La señora Magdenia nació en la ciudad D. Espinar y radica hace 24 años en la ciudad D. Cusco. (La socia está levantando la mano en la fotografía). 

La señora Magdenia tiene 24 años y tiene una relación D. libre unión, ella es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y  profesional, ella es docente y trabaja en un colegio D. la ciudad D. Cusco. Ya es un año que enseña y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Magdenia requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo cuadernos, pizarras, lapiceros y otras cosas mas.

Las reuniones D. las socias D. Banco Comunal “Sembrando” son cada treinta días en la ciudad D. Cusco. El banco Comunal está conformado por personas que son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. La mayoría D. los socios viven en la ciudad D. Cusco y sus actividades económicas D. los demás socios son por ejemplo venta D. cosméticos, venta D. comida, venta comestibles, venta D. ropa, venta D. verduras y otros brindan servicios varios. 

Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional D. Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una D. las siete maravillas D. mundo “Machupicchu”. (Los socios que está en la parte inferior D. la fotografía llegaron tarD. a la reunión D. banco comunal).
texts.en:
Magdenia was born in the city of Espinar and has lived in Cusco for the last 24 years. (She is raising her hand in the photo.)

Magdenia, 24, is in a common law relationship.  She’s a hardworking, responsible, professional woman.  She’s a teacher working in a school in the city of Cusco.  She’s been teaching for a year and does well thanks to the dedication she puts into her work.  On this occasion, Madgenia needs the loan to buy supplies like notebooks, blackboards, mechanical pencils and other things.

The meetings of the “Sembrando” (Planting) communal bank take place very thirty days in the city of Cusco.  The communal bank is composed of hardworking, enterprising people who are always looking for opportunities to get ahead and through their daily efforts proviD. better futures for their children.  Most of the members live in the city of Cusco.  The economic activities of the rest of the members are, for example, cosmetics sales, food sales, grocery sales, clothing sales, vegetable sales and other proviD. various services.

Cusco is known for being a very touristy, commercial zone as well as for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.  

(The members appearing in the bottom of the photo arrived late at the communal bank meeting).

loans.use: to buy supplies like notebooks, blackboards, pencils, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her business

loans.name: Maria Nicolasa

texts.es:
Doña Maria continua  con la venta de cosmetico, ya que es su medio para apoyar  a su familia, sus dos hijos siguen estudiando para un futuro mejor.
Los productos Avon que vende, han dado buenos resultados, ya que sus ventas crecieron, al vender mas variedad. El numero de cliente ha aumentado, logrando mantener el equilibrio de sus ventas.
Su nuevo prestamo sera para seguir comprando mas mercaderia de cosmetico en variedad como: cremas de cuerpo, perfume, vanidad, pintura de labios, locion, shampoo, aceite para el cabello, asi como la compra de ropa interior para dama y caballeros.
Doña Maria, espera seguir alcanzando ventas altas, ya que su meta es tener un techo mejor, ya que le falta seguir construyendo las paredes de concreto.
texts.en:
Maria is still selling cosmetics, as this is how she supports her family. Her two children continue studying for a better future. 

The Avon products that she sells have given her good results and her sales have grown and she is selling a wider variety. She has increased the number of clients that she serves, successfully maintaining her sales. 

This new loan is to buy more cosmetic supplies including body lotions, perfume, cosmetic cases, lipsticks, creams, shampoos, and hair oil, as well as buying underwear for women and men. 

Maria wants to continue achieving high sales. Her goal is to have a better roof, and to continue building the concrete walls that she needs.

loans.use: to buy clothes and cosmetics for her business

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es: Clotilde, de 57 años, es una mujer trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Adrián de 59 años y sus 03 queridos hijos y lo que más desea es brindarles una mejor calidad de vida, por ello se esmera diariamente. Ella proviene de una familia de cuya tradición familiar ha sido la agricultura, es así que trabaja sus tierras para que sean fertiles, es ahí donde siembra cacao y café, ya que estos productos tiene mayor demanda en el mercado. Es por ello que cuida de sus plantas de la plaga de insectos, ya que estos perjudicarían la cosecha. Lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus cultivos hasta los centros de acopio, pues es ahí donde vende sus productos. Este será su séptimo crédito de con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr comprar mallas y costales que le servirán para cuidar sus plantas de los insectos.
texts.en:
Clotilde, age 57, is a hard-working woman.  She lives in her own house with her 59 year old husband, Adrián, and their three beloved children.  What she wishes for the most is to give them a better quality of life.  That is why she does her best every day.

She comes from a family whose tradition has been agriculture.  That is why she works the land so that it will be fertile.  She grows cacao and coffee because these products are in greater demand at the market.  That is why she takes care of her plants so they are not affected by insect infestation, which would damage the harvest.

She has been doing this work for 20 years.  She considers the most difficult part to be transporting her crops to the gathering centers.  That is where she sells her products.

This will be her seventh loan with MFP.  She really wishes for a small support from all of you so that she can buy mesh and large sacks that she will use to keep her plants insect free.

loans.use: to buy mesh and large sacks.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es: Cecilia, de 32 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Alexander de 34 años y lo que más desea es aprovechar las oportunidades que tiene para mantener a su familia. Desde joven empezó a ganarse la vida trabajando en distintos oficios, pero cuando se casó, sería su pareja quien la ayudase a obtener un negocios estables. Es así que se dedica a vender ropa en un local, situado en el mercado central de su ciudad. En dicho lugar atiende a sus clientes con mucha amabilidad y cortesía, quienes la visitan continuamente, debido a los novedosos modelos de ropa que trae de ña ciudad de Lima. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejar a sus clientas sobre las prendas que mejor le quedan. Tiene 07 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer de pie todo el día. Con el tiempo, desea poner una tienda más grande, donde pueda brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Este será su décimo crédito con MFP y se siente muy contenta de saber que obtendrá un apoyo mas de ustedes, ya que así se sentirá segura de comprar lo solicitado y esta dispuesta a devolver puntualmente sus aportes programados. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ropa, de preferencia ropa de verano, ya que el lugar donde viven es muy caluroso.
texts.en:
Cecilia, 32, is a cheerful, hardworking woman who lives in her own house with her partner Alexander, 34.  What she wants most is to exploit the opportunities she has to support her family. From a young age, Cecilia began to make a living working in various trades, but when she married, her partner was the one who would help her obtain a stable business. 

Thus, Cecilia is selling clothes in a place located in the central market of their city. She serves her customers with kindness and courtesy, who continually visit her because of the innovative models of clothes that she brings from the city of Lima. What Cecilia likes most about her job is advising her clients on the best-fit garments. She has been doing this activity for 7 years and believes that the hardest part is having to stand all day. Over time, she wants to install a larger store, where she can provide better service to her customers. 

This will be Cecilia's tenth loan with MFP and she feels very happy to know that she will get more support from you.   Thus she will feel secure to buy the requested items and is willing to return your contributions in a timely manner. With the requested two thousand nuevos soles, Cecilia will buy more clothes, preferably summer clothes, as the place where they live is very hot.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Claudia Maria

texts.es: Claudia María tiene 39 años su actividad es la venta de ropa y cosméticos. Hace más 10 años que tiene este medio de vida, ella compra sus productos en el mercado de Managua en donde le resulta mucho más favorable, actualmente tiene varios encargos que le han realizado, ella siempre está cumpliendo con lo que le solicitan. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, lápiz labial, cremas, tratamientos entre otros.
texts.en: Claudia María is 39 years old and her business is selling clothes and cosmetics.  She has been in this line of work for more than ten years.  She buys her products in the market in Managua which works out a lot more favorable for her.  She currently has several orders that people have placed with her.  She is always fulfilling the requests of her customers.  Claudia María will use this loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, lipsticks, creams, treatments etc.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, lipsticks, creams, treatments, etc.

loans.name: Las Perlas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se caracteriza por estar rodeada D. cerros y se siembra muchos arboles D. hule.
Las Perlas es un grupo conformado por dies mujeres las cuales cada una tiene una actividad economica:
Rosa- Venta D. pan
Florinda- Venta D. tacos
Praxedis- venta D. carne
Juana C- Venta D. pollo
Claudia D. J.- Venta D. abarrotes
Juana - venta D. refrescos
Abigail- Farmacia
Geronimo- Venta D. Perfumeria
Araceli- Venta D. pollo

La señora Mirian es uno D. los miembros D. este grupo, ella tiene la edad D. 38 años, estudio hasta el tercer grado D. secundaria y esta casada con el señor Samuel que trabaja como jornalero en el campo, ellos tienen dos hijos D. los cuales uno estudia la secundaria y el mas pequeño la primaria. Ella nos platica que siempre le ha gustado trabajar y que desD. se caso ella y su esposo decidieron abrir un negocio para poder ganar un poco D. dinero extra y ofrecer una mejor calidad D. vida a su familia.
Doña Miriam nos dice que como su esposo sabra hacer pan abrieron una panaderia en la cual trabajan los dos con el tiempo poco a poco fue creciendo su negocio y abrio una pequeña tienda D. abarrotes y ahora ella y su familia atienden sus dos pequeños negocios.
Ella necesita este credito para invertirlo en la compra D. aceite, huevos, arina, gas, azucar, levadura, para la elaboracion  del pan y azucar, frijoles, aceite, productos enlatados, papel higenico, refrescos, dulces, jabon y un poco D. papeleria (lapiceros, sacapuntas y lapiceros) para resurtir su negocio.
Doña Miriam espera que con esta inversion su negocio prospere ya que desea que sus hijos puedan una profesion.
"Gracias por traer estos prestamos hasta nuestras comunidad"
texts.en:
This group is noted for the fact that it they are surrounded by hills and lots of rubber trees.  'Las Perlas' is a group which has ten [female] members.  Each one has her own business activity:

Rosa - sells bread
Florinda - sells tacos
Praxedis - sells meat
Juana C - sells chicken
Claudia D. Jesús - sells groceries
Juana - sells soft drinks
Abigail - runs a pharmacy
Gerónima - sells perfume
Araceli - sells chicken

Miriam is one of the members of this group.  She is 38 years old and studied up to the third year of high school.  She is married to Samuel who works as a farm laborer.  They have two children: one is in high school and the other is in elementary school.  Miriam tells us that she has always enjoyed working and that, when they got married, she and her husband decided to open a business so that they could earn a little extra money and offer their family a better quality of life.

Miriam tells us that, as her husband knows how to make bread, they opened a bakery.  They both work in the bakery and, over time, they gradually grew their business and opened a small grocery store as well.  Now Miriam and her family serve in the two small businesses.

Miriam needs this loan to invest in buying oil, eggs, flour, gas, sugar and yeast for making her bread and sugar, beans, oil, canned goods, toilet paper, soft drinks, sweets, soap and some stationery products (pens, pencils and pencil sharpeners) to re-stock her grocery store business.

Miriam hopes that this investment will help her businesses to prosper as she would like her children to grow up to have a profession.  She says "thank you for bringing these loans to our community".

loans.use: to buy groceries and bread

loans.name: Petrona De Los Angeles

texts.es: Petrona De Los Ángeles se dedica a la venta de quesillos, hace más de 6 años que tiene este medio de vida pues siempre le ha gustado este tipo de actividad ya que todos los días se relaciona con sus clientes sale a vender sus productos todos los días desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las seis de la tarde pues además tiene que atender a sus 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de bolsas, cremas, tortillas, servilletas, sal, entre otros.
texts.en: Petrona De Los Ángeles sells 'quesillos' (tortillas filled with soft cheese and pickled onion and a sour cream sauce).  She has been in this line of work for more than six years and has always enjoyed this type of activity as she gets to mix with her customers every day.  She goes out every day to sell her products, from 7 o'clock in the morning until 6 o'clock in the evening.  She also has to look after her two dependent children who are still in her care.  Petrona will use this loan to buy bags, creams, tortillas, napkins, salt, etc.

loans.use: to buy bags, creams, tortillas, napkins, salt, etc.

loans.name: Cenelia

texts.es:
A sus 59 años D. edad Cenelia es una luchadora incansable, dedicada a la venta D. comidas fritas, D. gaseosas, tinto y café, labor que desempeña diariamente D. 5:00 a.m. 8:00 p.m. pues en este horario hay buenas ventas y ha tenido la ventaja D. tener una buena ubicación en el sector.
Cenelia actualmente debe comprar insumos para la producción D. alimentos, como gaseosas, café, azúcar, maíz, harina, y papas, por lo que hoy solicita un préstamo, con el cual hacer esta inversión, mejorar las ventas, y proporcionalmente su calidad D. vida.
texts.en: At 59 years of age, Cenelia is a tireless and tenacious woman.  Her business is selling fried food, soda and coffee.  She carries out this work every day from 5.00am to 8.00pm as this is when she makes good sales.  She has the advantage of being in a good location in the neighborhood.  Cenelia currently needs to buy supplies for making her food.  She will buy soda, coffee, sugar, corn, flour and potatoes.  She is requesting a loan in order to make this investment, improve her sales and, proportionally, her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making food

loans.name: Martha Celsa

texts.es: La señora Martha es natural de Ancash,soltera , tiene 41 años y tiene 02 hijos, siempre le ha gustado trabajar y estudiar para poder salir adelante y superarse por sus hijos. En la actualidad ya termino la carrera de Enfermeria Tecnica y ahora va a empezar a llevar cursos de especializacion para luego poder realizr su tesis y obtener su titulo. El prestamo es justo para sus cursos de especializacion. Su meta es poder culminar su carrera y poder ser un buen ejemplo de superacion para sus dos menores hijos.
texts.en:
Martha is a native of Ancash.  She is 41 years old and single with two children.  She always has enjoyed working and studying to be able to get ahead and improve herself for her children.  At present she already finished the training in technical nursing and now is going to begin taking specialized courses to later be able to write her thesis and get her degree.

The loan is just for her specialized courses.

Her goal is to be able to finish her studies and be a good example of self-improvement for her two minor children.

loans.use: to pay for specialized courses for her profession.

loans.name: Justo

texts.es: El señor Justo nacido en la población de Mocoya - Chuquisaca, de 54 años radicado actualmente desde hace 30 años en la comunidad de San Miguel perteneciente al municipio de la Guardia, vive  en concubinato (que conviven pero no son casados) con la señora Paulina y tienen 4 hijos  ya mayores de edad, el Sr.  Justo y su señora se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 30 años, es su primer crédito y lo va a destinar a la siembra de maní y o que implica el preparado de la tierra,  el señor justo también esta a punto de conseguir la titulación de sus tierras, por ello el trabaja con esmero en la agricultura, estando agradecido por el préstamo.
texts.en: Justo was born in the town of Mocoya - Chuquisaca.  He is 54 years old and has been living in the community of San Miguel, in La Guardia, for thirty years.  Justo lives with his partner Paulina (they live together but are not married) and they have four grown-up children.  Justo and his partner have been farming for thirty years.  This is his first loan and he will use it to sow peanuts, preparing the land for planting.  Justo is also about to receive legal ownership of his land.  For this reason, he carries out his farming with great care.  He is grateful for his loan.

loans.use: to sow peanuts

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 36-year-old married man from Ramallah. Since Mohammad would like to improve his family’s financial situation, he is now thinking of opening his own business. He would like to open a restaurant of his own. He hopes that throughout this loan he will be able to buy supplies and everything that is required to start his business.

loans.use: to buy supplies and everything that is required to start his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a plot of land

loans.name: Damian

texts.es: Damián, natural de la ciudad de San Miguel de 40 años de edad, esta casado con Maximiliana de 37 y tienen 03 hijos.quienes se encuentran en etapa escolar. Juntos habitan en su propia casa, ubicada en el distrito de Samugari. El trabajo al que se dedica es el del agro, pues cuenta con una parcela de tierra, en donde siembra cacao y frutas cítricas. Su faena lo realiza en el centro poblado de Palmapampa, a partir de las 7:30am hasta las 4:00 de la tarde, actividad que ha continuado durante 15 años, y junto a su esposa tratan de la calidada de su producción, fertilizando sus tierras. El único inconveniente es no contar con personal para acelerar su trabajo. DSu plan a futuro es ampliar su negocio y estbilizarse económicamente, asimimso desea comprar más tierras. Este será su quinto crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte le será de mucha utilidad y por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes, pues en esta oportunidad el dinero que se le conceda lo derivará para contratar personal y fertilizar sus tierras y cuidar de las plantas de cacao y frutas cítricas.
texts.en:
40-year-old Damián is from the city of San Miguel.  He is married to 37-year-old Maximiliana and they have three school-age children.  They live together in their own home which is located in Samugari district.

Damián's business is farming.  He has a plot of land where he grows cacao and citrus fruits.  He carries out his work in the village of Palmapampa, from 7.30am to 4.00pm.  He has been in this business for 15 years and, together with his wife, they try to ensure the quality of their production, fertilizing their land.  The only problem he has is not being able to hire laborers to speed up his work.  His plan for the future is to expand his business and reach a level of financial stability.  He would also like to buy more land.

This will be Damián's fifth loan from MFP.  He knows that it will be very useful to him and so hopes to receive the support of each and every one of you.  On this occasion, he will use the money he receives to hire workers, fertilize his land, and care for his cacao and citrus fruit plants.

loans.use: to hire laborers

loans.name: Bayardo Antonio

texts.es: Bayardo Antonio tiene 42 años, su actividad es la venta y elaboración de bolis. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos, pues él se siente muy feliz ya que es por medio de los créditos que él ha podido realizar su negocio ha mejorado notablemente. Bayardo tiene más de 20 años en esta actividad pues él conoce muy bien su negocio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de grandes paquetes este prodcuto.
texts.en:
Bayardo Antonio, is 42 years old. He makes and sells bolis (a powdered soft drink). 

This is not his first loan, and he has been very happy because through the loans he has been able to carry out his business and improve it significantly. He has been doing this for more than twenty years. 

The reason for this loan is to buy the packaged bolis in bulk.

loans.use: to buy packaged bolis, a powdered softdrink, in bulk.

loans.name: Nuvia Monserrate

texts.es:
En la parroquia Ayacucho del cantón Santa Ana se reúnen cada quince días el Banco Comunal Amigas Por Siempre. Este lugar es conocido por su gran vegetación pero sobre todo por sus hermosos balnearios de agua dulce que son muy visitados por turistas locales y de otras ciudades.

La señora Nuvia tiene 40 años, está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene 5 hijos, dos mayores de edad y tres menores que estudian en colegio. Su marido trabaja en el extranjero.

Ella es un ama de casa que para sacar a su familia adelante ha tenido que trabajar muy duro. Nuestra amiga se dedica a la cría y venta de animales para lo cual cuenta con una pequeña granja en su casa, allí por temporadas mete hasta 200 pollos  los mismos que los tiene por tres meses y luego los vende a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa o entrega a tiendas de la localidad.  Además de esto por las noches  tiene una carreta en la cual sale a vender comidas rápidas como hot dog, hamburguesas, jugos y batidos de fruta, trabaja todos los días sus hijos le ayudan en el negocio de comidas rápidas, tiene 8 años que se dedica a estas actividades y le va bien.

Este crédito lo quiere emplear para comprar pollos, alimento para los mismos y víveres para preparar los alimentos.  Es fundadora del Banco Comunal y le gusta por los beneficios que recibe de la institución.
 
Su sueño es seguir adelante en su vida y su negocio.
texts.en:
The Amigas Por Siempre communal bank meets every 15 days in Ayacucho parish, in Santa Ana canton. The area is known for its lush vegetation, but above all for its beautiful fresh water spas, which are much frequented by locals and by tourists from other cities.

Sra. Nuvia is 40, married and has 5 children, two adults and three minors who are in secondary school. Her husband works abroad.

She is a housewife who has had to work very hard to help her family get ahead. She raises and sells animals for which she has a small poultry farm at her house. She takes in up to 200 chickens every season for three months and then sells them to merchants who come to her home or she delivers them to stores in the region. Besides this, she has a nighttime business selling fast food such as hot dogs, hamburgers, juices and fruit smoothies. She works every day. Her children help her in the fast food business. She has had these businesses for 8 years and is doing well.

She will use this loan to buy chickens, chicken feed and supplies to prepare her fast food. She is founder of the communal bank and she likes it because of the benefits she receives from it.

Her dream is to continue getting ahead, in her life and in her businesses.

loans.use: to buy chickens, chicken feed and food supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies to build a new interior wall and enjoy better living conditions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy different types of wood.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es:
En la parroquia Ayacucho del cantón Santa Ana se reúnen cada quince días el Banco Comunal Amigas Por Siempre. Este lugar es conocido por su gran vegetación pero sobre todo por sus hermosos balnearios de agua dulce que son muy visitados por turistas locales y de otras ciudades.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Ana, Tiene 35 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos de 20, 15 y 10 años de edad, los dos menores  estudian en colegio y escuela. Ella estudia Educación Básica  a distancia de la extensión de la Universidad de Manta.

Nuestra amiga al verse sola con sus hijos tuvo que ver la forma de sacarlos adelante para lo cual se dedico a la venta de productos de Avon (productos de belleza, perfumería y accesorios de damas), trabaja todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 14h00, deja a crédito y cobra todos los fines de semana. Nos cuenta que lo que más vende son los cosméticos y perfumes ya que son muy buenos comenta, lleva más de 8 años en esta actividad y le ha podido a salir adelante con sus hijos.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, bisutería y cosméticos. Es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal, es la  tesorera del Banco y le gusta por la ayuda que les dan los créditos.
  
Sus sueños son sacar su titulo de maestra y poder darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In the  Ayacucho parish of the Santa Ana canton the Amigas Por Siempre communal bank meets every two weeks. This place is known for its vegetation and beautiful fresh water beaches that are visited by many local tourists and people from other cities. 

Here we met Ana. She is 35 years old and is a single mother of three children, aged 20, 15 and 10. The two youngest go to high school and elementary school. She does Basic Education at a distance from the University of Manta extension program.

When our friend found herself alone with her children, she had to find a way to get them ahead. She started to sell Avon products (beauty products, perfumes and ladies' accessories). She works every day from 8:00 am until 2:00 pm. She sells on credit and collects on weekends. She tells us that what sells the most are the cosmetics and the perfumes, since they are good. She has been doing this activity for more than 8 years and has been able to get her children ahead. 

This loan is to buy perfume, creams, jewelry and cosmetics. She is a founding member of the communal bank and its treasurer. She likes it because of the help that the loans provide.  
  
Her dreams are to get her teaching degree and give her children the best.

loans.use: to buy perfume, creams, jewelry and cosmetics.

loans.name: Sonia Del Socorro

texts.es: Sonia Del Socorro tiene 60 años, su actividad es la venta de nacatamales desde hace 34 años que tiene este medio de vida. El objetivo de su crédito es para la compra de materia prima como hojas, masa, mecates, chile, especie entre otros productos. Sonia es una mujer muy emprendedora pues la lucha constante que realiza diariamente es muy significativa para sobrevivir con su familia. Ella sueña con agrandar su negocio y realizarle las mejoras pertinentes.
texts.en:
Sonia Del Socorro, 60, sells nacatamales (large Nicaraguan tamales).  She has had this work for 34 years.

The purpose of her loan is to buy ingredients such as leaves, dough, twine, chili peppers, and spices, among other products.

Sonia is a very enterprising woman, since the constant struggle she carries out daily is very meaningful in order to survive with her family.  She dreams about growing her business and making the appropriate improvements.

loans.use: to buy leaves, dough, twine, chile, and spices.

loans.name: Estebana Del Carmen

texts.es:
Estebana, de 48 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de León, madre soltera, tiene dos hijos, ella es comerciante se dedica a vender atoles (una bebida hecha de maíz y leche) y también se dedica al servicio de Lavandería, su nivel académico es básico solo llego hasta el tercer grado de la primaria. Empezó en este negocio por herencia familiar ya que su madre se dedicaba a vender atoles en la comunidades aledañas a la ciudad de León y esto e sirvió de experiencia es así como se gana la vida honradamente, sale a vender de manera ambulante todos los días y por las tardes  se dedica a lavar ropa ajena.
Ella realizo el préstamo para comprar materia prima como maíz, leche, azúcar, canela para elaborar sus atoles. Con esta inversión podrá adquirir mas materia prima para trabajar y vender más su producto. Ella desea ampliar su negocio, darle una mejor presentación a su producto  para hacerlo mas atractivo y poder venderlo  por mayor cantidad en el mercado municipal.
texts.en:
48-year-old Estebana lives in the city of León.  She is a single mother and has two children.  She is a saleswoman who sells 'atole' (a drink made from corn and milk).  She also provides a laundry service.  Her academic level is basic as she only studied up to the third grade of elementary school.

Estebana started out in this business as it was a family inheritance.  Her mother used to sell 'atole' in the communities surrounding the city of León and this provided her with experience.  Estebana earns an honest living in this business, going out to sell her products every day as an itinerant vendor.  In the afternoons, she washes other people's clothes.

Estebana took out this loan to buy raw materials such as corn, milk, sugar and cinnamon for making her 'atole'.  As a result of this investment, she will be able to acquire more raw materials with which to work and will sell more drinks.  She would like to expand her business and better present her product, to make it more attractive.  She would like to sell in larger quantities in the town market.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as corn, milk, sugar and cinnamon for making her 'atole' drinks

loans.name: Juan Alexander

texts.es: Juan Alexander tiene 28 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 9 años que se dedica a este negocio, inicio con las ganancias de vendedor ambulante pues todos los días salía bajo el sol, lluvia y otros factores a vender sus productos. Juan ofrece productos como calzado, cosméticos, ropa interior, sabanas, manteles, entre otros productos.
texts.en: Juan Alexander is 28 years old and his business is selling general merchandise.  He has been in this business for more than nine years.  He started out with the profits he made as an itinerant vendor.  He used to go out every day, come hail, rain or shine, to sell his products.  Juan sells products such as footwear, cosmetics, underwear, sheets, tablecloths, etc.

loans.use: to buy footwear, cosmetics, underwear, sheets, tablecloths and other products

loans.name: Virgen Guadalupe Group

texts.es:
La señora Narley nació en el distrito D. Huallabamba D. la provincia D. Urubamba del departamento del Cusco y radica en la comunidad D. Hycho del distrito  D. Huallababamba. (La socia está levantando la mano en la fotografía). 

La señora Narley tiene 24 años y tiene una relación D. libre unión D. la cual tiene un hijo, ella es una mujer trabajadora, responsable que saca adelante a su familia, ella se dedica a la venta D. verduras y vendía en la ciudad D. Urubamba pero ahora venD. verduras en la comunidad D. Hycho D. forma ambulatoria. En esta oportunidad Narley requiere el préstamo para comprar más verduras.   

Las reuniones D. las socias del Banco Comunal “virgen Guadalupe” son cada treinta días en la comunidad D. Hycho. El banco Comunal está conformado por personas que son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. La mayoría D. los socios viven en la comunidad D. Hycho y sus actividades económicas D. los demás socios son por ejemplo venta D. maíz, venta D. verduras, venta D. comida, venta D. cereales,  venta D. ropa y otros brindan servicios varios. 

Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una D. las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Señora Narley was born in the Huallabamba district in Urubamba province in the department of Cusco, and she lives in the community of Hycho in Huallabamba district.  (The member is raising her hand in the photograph).

Señora Narley is 24 years old and lives in a common law relationship from which she has a child.  She is a hard-working woman, who is responsible and moves her family ahead in life.  She works selling vegetables; she used to sell in Urubamba market, but now she sells in the Pompas market in Hycho as a street vendor. On this occasion, Narley wants the loan to buy more vegetables.

The members of the "Virgen Guadalupe” communal bank meet every month in the community of Hycho.  The communal bank is maD. up of people who are hard-working and entrepreneurial.  They are continually looking for opportunities to move ahead in life and through their daily efforts to deliver a better future for their children.  The majority of the members live in the community of Hycho, and the economic activities of the other members incluD. selling corn, selling vegetables, selling food, selling cereals, selling clothes, and others who proviD. various services.

Cusco is well-known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it's the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.  

(The member who is in the rear of the photograph came late to the communal bank meeting).

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables.

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es: Faustina, de 46 años, es una mujer trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a sus 04 hijos, por quienes desea continuar trabajando muy duro para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida. Los verdes campos del poblado de su distrito, han sido en la vida de Faustina un lugar muy agradable para trabajar, desde muy pequeña sus padres le enseñaron esta labor. Actualmente posee tierras, propiedades que comprase ella y su esposo en vida, sin embargo ella sigue trabajando 12 años sobre esas tierras sembrando cacao, café y árboles. Lo que más le gusta es cosechar ya que así ve la recopemsa luego de tanto trabajo, por otro lado le resulta difícil transportar los frutos cosechados hasta los centro de acopio, situados a una hora de distancia. Por ello Faustina si logra beneficiarse con el crédito comprará animales de carga como el burro que es muy útil para el trasporte. Con el tiempo, espera juntar el dinero suficiente para comprar nuevas tierras. Este será su 17avo crédito con MFP, por lo que espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar trabajando en la agricultura. Con el dinero solicitado comprará un burro.
texts.en:
Faustina, 46, is a hard-working woman.  She lives in her own house with her four children, for whom she wants to continue working very hard to give them a better quality of life.

In Faustina's life, the green fields of the town in her district have been a very pleasant place to work.  Her parents taught her this work since she was very little.  She currently has land, properties that she and her husband bought.  Nevertheless, she continues working these lands, 12 years growing cacao, coffee, and trees.

What she likes most is the harvest, since in this way she sees the reward after so much work.  On the other hand, it's difficult for her to transport the harvested products to the storage centers, located an hour away.

Because of this, if she manages to get the loan she will buy pack animals like a donkey, which is very useful for transportation.  In time, she wants to get enough money to buy new land.

This will be her seventeenth loan with MFP.  She hopes for the support of every one of you to continue working in agriculture.  With the requested money she will buy a donkey.

loans.use: to buy a donkey.

loans.name: Nelvia Modesta

texts.es:
Nelvia, una joven, de 27 años de edad, originaria de una comunidad llamada las Leches ubicada en Chacaraseca municipio de  León,  tiene 2 hijos , es amad de casa y al mismo tiempo trabaja en la agricultura. Ella empezó a trabajar en la agricultura a la edad de 10 años con sus padres, pues ellos también eran agricultores, al casarse siguió trabajando en la siembra de Yuca junto con su esposo. Ella comercializa su producto en el mercado municipal de la ciudad de León. Baja de la montaña a la ciudad para poder vender su producto.
Ella realizo el crédito para sembrar yuca, comprar insumos para siembra. Con esta inversión le facilitares las herramientas y materiales para sembrar mas fácilmente, pues ella quiere que su cosecha se extienda , para poder producir mas y comercializarlo en los diferentes tipos de mercado.
texts.en:
Nelvia is a young women of 27, and has two children. She is from the community of Las Leches, located in the Chacaraseca municipality of León department.  She is a housewife and farms at the same time.  

She began farming at the age of ten with her parents, who were also farmers. When she got married, she continued growing yucca alongside her husband. She sells her crop in the municipal market of the city of León. She comes down from the mountains to sell her crop.

She took out the loan in order to plant yucca, and to buy the farming supplies needed for planting. The loan will enable her to buy tools and materials to plant more easily. She wants to expand her crop, in order to produce more and sell it in different kinds of markets.

loans.use: To plant yucca, and to buy farming supplies for planting.

loans.name: Clementina

texts.es:
La Señora. Clementina es socia del banco comunal San Vicente, vive por una comunidad que pertenece a la parroquia de la Victoria del Portete, este lugar es de clima frió y propicio por sus pampas para la cría de ganado, su población se dedica a la cría de animales, a la agricultura y muchos laboran en la ciudad de Cuenca en diferentes actividades, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora Clementina tiene 66 años, es viuda pero en su unión conyugal ha concebido 7 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, casados e independientes. La casa en la que habita es de su propiedad siendo el sacrificio del trabajo en su juventud.

Doña Clementina se dedica a laborar en los quehaceres de su hogar y como pasa en casa se dedica a la agricultura que es solo para su consumo, también cría cuyes, gallinas y ganado los que los vende cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica. 

En el banco comunal es socia hace 2 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos.
 
Su meta es tener más animales.
texts.en:
Clementina is a member of the "San Vicente" communal bank.  She lives in a community that is part of the Victoria del Portete parish. This is a place with a cold climate, and because of its grasslands, it is suitable for raising livestock. The people who live there raise animals and farm. Many work in the city of Cuenca in various activities. They maintain the culture and traditions of their people.

Clementina is 66 and a widow, but she has seven children who are adults, married, and on their own.  She owns the house where she lives, and it represents the sacrifice and hard work of her youth.

Clementina works doing her household chores, and as she spends her time at home, she farms to supply her own needs.  She also raises guinea pigs, chickens, and livestock, that she sells when she has any financial need. She has been with the communal bank for two years, and she will use her new loan to buy chickens. Her goal is to have more animals.

loans.use: To buy chickens.

loans.name: Heraclio

texts.es: Heraclio tiene 43 años, es un hombre muy trabajador y se esmera por dar lo mejor a sus 02 queridos hijos quienes son el motivo para continuar trabajando. Juntos habitan en su propia casa. La labor que realiza es labrar la tierra, pues cuenta con 3 hectáreas de terreno en donde siemnbra cacao, café, achiote y maní. Sus padres le enseñaron a remover la tierra desde muy niño y a la edad de 25 años compró su propia parcela; desde entonces viene trabajando en esta actividad. Sin embargo durante la temporada de cosecha y deshierbo de maleza necesita el apoyo de jornaleros para así acelerar sus trabajo. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo, porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas den buenos frutos. Cuenta asimismo que durante el invierno no es de su agrado porque son épocas donde abunda mayor cantidad de precipitaciones de lluvia, estropeando los brotes de los frutos. Este será su 14avo crédito con MFP, espera ser muy puntual en sus cuotas, ya que no quiere causar problemas a la entidad financiera y agradece su anterior ayuda. Con los 3,000 soles que solicita, comprará sacos de abono y semillas de árboles como: caoba, tornillo, cedro y Pino chuncho.
texts.en:
Heraclio is 43, and a very hard-working man. He tries hard to give the best to his two dear children, who are the reason why he continues working. They live together in their own house.  He farms on three hectares of land, where he grows cacao, coffee, achiote (annatto seeds) and peanuts.

His parents taught him to till the soil from the time he was a child, and at the age of 25, he bought his own parcel of land. Since then, he has been working in this business. However, during harvest season and weeding he needs the help of day laborers in order to get the work done more quickly. 

He feels very committed to his work, because thanks to his daily efforts, he has the enjoyment of seeing his plants give good crops. He also says that the winter season isn't to his liking, because those are the times when the greatest amount of rain falls, spoiling the shoots of his crops.

This will be his 14th loan with MFP. He expects to be very punctual with his payments, since he doesn't want to cause problems for the institution, and is grateful for their previous assistance. With the 3,000 soles he is applying for, he will buy bags of fertilizer and seeds for trees such as mahogany, tornillo, cedar, and chuncho pine.

loans.use: To buy bags of fertilizer, and seeds for trees such as mahogany, cedar, tornillo, and pine.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: Teresa tiene 57 años, su actividad es una pulpería. Tiene más de 23 años en este negocio, pues siempre está pendiente de lo que sus clientes, amigos, vecinos y familiares le solicitan. Ella tiene 4 hijos de los cuales con mucho empeño y dedicación ha logrado formar. El objetivo del crédito es para la compra de granos básicos, detergentes, golosinas, refrescos, pan, galletas entre otros.
texts.en:
Teresa is 57, and runs a small general store. She has been in this business for 23 years, as she is always attentive to what her customers, friends, neighbors, and family members ask for.  She has four children, who she has managed to educate through a lot of determination and dedication.  

The purpose of the loan is to buy basic grains, detergents, candy, soft drinks, bread, cookies and other things.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, detergents, candy, soft drinks, bread, cookies, and other things.

loans.name: Rosa Micaela

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa es socia del banco comunal San Vicente, vive por una comunidad que  pertenece a la parroquia de la Victoria del Portete, este lugar es de clima frió y propicio por sus pampas para la cría de ganado, su población se dedica a la cría de animales, a la agricultura y muchos laboran en la ciudad de Cuenca en diferentes actividades,  mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña María tiene 40 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 8 hijos de 20, 18, 17, 15, 14 12, 5 y 3 años de edad, su primera hija es independiente, su segundo y cuarto hijo trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, su tercera hija pasa en casa ayudando en lo quehaceres del hogar, su hija de 14 años  estudia en el colegio y sus hijos de 12 y 5 años estudian en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que habita es de propiedad.

La Señora María como tiene hijos pequeños pasa en casa y se dedica a la cría cuyes, pollos y cerdos los que los vende cuando tiene  alguna necesidad económica. 

En el banco comunal se encuentra 2 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y ganado para la cría.
 
Su meta es tener más animales para la cría.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the "San Vicente" communal bank. She lives in a community that is part of the Victoria del Portete parish. This is a place with a cold climate, and because of its grasslands it is suitable for raising livestock. The people living there raise animals and farm. Many work in the city of Cuenca in various activities, and maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.

María is 40, married, and has eight children; ages 20, 18, 17, 15, 14, 12, 5 and 3 years old. Her first daughter is living on her own. Her second and fourth son are working and help her financially. Her third daughter spends her time in the home, helping with the household chores.  Her 14 year-old daughter is in high school, and her sons, 12 and 5 go to a small village school.

Her husband works in construction as a bricklayer. They own the house where they live. As María has small children, she stays home and raises guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs, which she sells when she has any financial need. She has been with the communal bank for two years, and she is going to use  her new loan to buy chickens and livestock to raise. Her goal is to have more animals to raise.

loans.use: To buy chickens and livestock.

loans.name: María Judith

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal San Vicente, vive por una comunidad que  pertenece a la parroquia de la Victoria del Portete, este lugar es de clima frió y propicio por sus pampas para la cría de ganado, su población se dedica a la cría de animales, a la agricultura y muchos laboran en la ciudad de Cuenca en diferentes actividades y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. María tiene 59 años, es casada y fruto de esa unión ha concebido 8 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, cuatro de ellos son casados e independientes, sus 4 hijos solteros trabajan y le ayudan  económicamente. Su esposo labora como jornalero, la casa en la viven es de su propiedad.

Doña María se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar, a la cría de ganado y de cuyes para la venta y también labora en la agricultura, y lo que siembra es solo para su consumo.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 2 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono y alimento para sus animales. 

Su meta es tener más animales.
texts.en:
María is a member of the "San Vicente" communal bank. She lives in a community that is part of the Victoria del Portete parish. This is a place with a cold climate, and because of its grasslands, it is suitable for raising livestock.  The people who live here raise animals and farm. Many work in the city of Cuenca in various activities and maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.

María is 59, married, and has eight adult children. Four of her children are married and on their own. Her four unmarried children work, and help her financially. Her husband works as a day laborer. They own the house where they live.

María works at her household chores, raises livestock and guinea pigs for sale, and also farms. What she grows is only for her own use.
 
She has been with the communal bank for two years, and she is going to use her new loan to buy fertilizer and feed for her animals. Her goal is to have more animals.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and animal feed.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es: Irene tiene 51 años, convive con su pareja y fruto de ello tienen tres hijos, Carlos, Lerner e Iris de 06, 05 y 03 años respectivamente. Juntos habitan en la hermosa selva ayacuchana, ubicada en al localidad de Santa Rosa, donde tienen su casa propia. Ella empezó su aventura como carpintera, desde muy niña aprendio esta labor al observar a padre. Su pasión por el oficio la llevó a adquirir sus propias herramientas de trabajo, para pulir la madera. Tiene 22 años realizando esta actividad en compañía de su esposo. Por otro lado, también es realiza estos trabajos para colegios, instituciones y municipalidades de su zona, elaborando mesas, sillas, andamios, roperos, escritorios, entre otros. Cuenta con 03 ayudantes, quienes se encargan de terminar con el trabajo; se siente muy comprometido con su labor, su lema es la "puntualidad en la entrega del trabajo" que se le encomiendan, es por ello que cuenta con mayor clientela. Sin embargo, no le agrada absorber los polvillos de la madera, y por tal razón hace sus tratamientos médicos cada cierto tiempo en las postas medicas. Su inconveniente es no contar con suficiente capital para poder comprar más madera, por tanto recurre a MFP, para que le facilite su 15avo crédito, para que pueda comprar bloques de madera que le serán de gran utilidad para seguir prestando servicios a su comunidad.
texts.en:
Irene is 51, and lives with her life partner. They have three children: Carlos, Lerner and Iris, who are six, five and three respectively. They live together in the beautiful tropical forest of Ayacucho, in the town of Santa Rosa, where they have their own house.  She began her career as a carpenter from a very young age, learning this work by watching her father. Her passion for the trade led her to acquire her own tools for finishing wood. 

She has been doing this work for 22 years, alongside her husband.  Furthermore, she carries out work for schools, institutions and municipalities in her area; making tables, chairs, scaffolding, closets, desks, and other things.

She has three helpers, who are responsible for finishing off the job. She feels very committed to her work. Her motto for the jobs entrusted to her is "deliver the work on time." That's why she has more customers. However, she doesn't like inhaling the sawdust from the wood, and for this reason, she receives medical treatments in the health clinics from time to time.  

Her problem is not having enough capital to be able to buy more wood. Therefore, she is turning to MFP for her 15th loan, so that she can buy pieces of  wood that will be of great use to her in continuing to provide services to her community.

loans.use: To buy pieces of wood for carpentry.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Marcelina, de 52 años, es viuda y tiene una hija a su cargo. Juntas residen en la localidad de Samugari, ubicada en la selva tropical Ayacuchana donde tiene su propia casa construida a base material rústico como adobe y techo de calamina. Ella proviene de una familia cuya tradición es la agricultura, y hoy es toda una experta en el tema agrícola. Ante la perdida de su amado esposo, le fue muy difícil sobresalir, y solo tuvo que mirar hacia delante y trabajar por su querida hija. Es así que siembra cacao, café y árboles maderables, productos que le han brindado los ingresos necesarios para mantenerse y cubrir los gastos de educación de su hija. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que los carros de carga son muy escasos por esta parte de la zona. Este será su 17avo crédito con MFP y es una socia muy cumplidora con sus anteriores cuotas, por lo que espera seguir así. Con los 2, 000 soles que solicita, adquirirá sacos de abono y fertilizantes naturales para mejorar sus plantas y así sacar buen provecho en cuanto a sus frutos.
texts.en:
Marcelina is 52, a widow, and has a daughter in her care. They live together in the the village of Samugari, located in the tropical forests of Ayacucho. Here she has her own house, constructed with simple materials such as adobe and tin roofing. She comes from a family whose tradition is farming, and today she is quite an expert on farming.  

Faced with the loss of her beloved husband, it was very difficult time for her to get through, as on her own she had to look ahead, and work for the sake of her dear daughter.  That's why she grows cacao, coffee, and trees for lumber. These products have provided her with the income necessary to maintain herself, and pay for her daughter's school expenses.

What she most likes about her work is planting her land, and she does it with great care. She has been doing this work for ten years and what she considers the hardest part is transporting her crops, since transport trucks are very scarce in that part of the region.

This will be her 17th loan with MFP. She is a very reliable member with regard to her previous payments, so she expects to continue in this way. With the 2,000 soles she is applying for, she will buy bags of natural and other fertilizers in order to improve her plants and obtain a good yield from her crops.

loans.use: To buy bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Susana Eugenia

texts.es: Susana, originaria de la ciudad de León, tiene 39 años de edad, tiene dos hijos, ella es comerciante, se dedica a vender y elaborar tortillas de maíz. El negocio de las tortillas era de su madre lo trae por herencia, pues  desde pequeña le ayudaba a vender tortillas mientras su madre la elaboraba. Ahora tiene 7 años de ser ella quien se hace cargo de este negocio. Ella solicito el crédito para comprar maíz y leña para elaborar sus tortillas. En sus planes futuros ella quiere acondicionar mejor el local, comprar un terreno y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Susana is from the city of Leon. She is 39, and has two children. She has a small business making and selling corn tortillas.  

The tortilla business was her mother's, and she received it as an inheritance; since from the time she was small, she helped sell the tortillas while her mother made them.  For seven years now, she's been the one in charge of this business. 

She applied for the loan in order to buy corn and firewood to make her tortillas.  As for her future plans, she wants to better equip her business, buy a piece of land and help her children get ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy corn and firewood for making her tortillas.

loans.name: Valentin

texts.es:
El señor Valentín  de 31 años es un hombre muy trabajador, tienen tres hijos; Valentín es un esposo y padre que se preocupa por dar lo mejor que el pueda a su Familia. 
Hace 12 años su única fuente principal era el ingreso que el percibía por semana de la maquiladora, desde hace 12 años como operador, pero con el ingreso que el obtenía  no era suficiente para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su hogar y fue por ello que se vio en la necesidad de poner un negocio donde pudiera obtener un ingreso extra.
Así que desde hace 5 años inicio con su negocio de artículos de segunda mano como los son: camisas, blusas, pantalones, faldas y más. En este momento quiere comprar ropa de temporada para que su negocio este al día con el cambio de clima. De esta manera el recibirá mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Sr. Valentín is 31 years old and a hardworking gentleman.  He has three children.  Valentín is a husband and father who is concerned about providing the best he can for his family.  

For the past 12 years, his only source of income was the weekly salary he earned at a factory where he works as an operator.  However, his income was insufficient for covering the basic household needs.  For this reason, he saw the need to start a business as a way of generating extra income.  

Five years ago, he started his business selling secondhand clothing such as shirts, blouses, trousers, skirts, and other items.  At the moment, he wants to buy seasonal clothing for his business to accommodate the change in the weather.  This will enable him to generate more revenue.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal clothing for the colder weather.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: Maria Dolores cuenta con su negocio de venta de ropa usada desde hace 4 años ofreciendo buena calidad y servicio a sus clientes. Para María este negocio es muy importante para ella por que de esta manera apoya a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. El negocio queda ubicado en una de las colonias de la ciudad donde se ponen muchos comerciantes de todo tipo de artículos pero que ella se diferencia con el trato y calidad que ofrece. María Dolores quiere comprar un toldo, por que en temporadas de lluvia o cuando esta soleado sufre las inclemencias del tiempo, y no quiere llegar a contagiarse de una enfermedad a causa de esto. Aparte de proteger ella misma también le conservara su mercancía en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Maria Dolores has a business selling used clothing. For the past four years, she has been offering good quality and service to her customers. For Maria, this business is very important to her because it allows her to help her husband with the household expenses. Her business is located in one of the subdivisions of the city where there are many merchants who sell all types of products. However, Maria differentiates herself by the service and quality she offers.

Maria Dolores wants to buy a canopy for the rainy season and to use for protection on sunny days. She does not want to risk getting sick because of the weather. In addition, she will be able to protect her merchandise so that it remains in excellent condition.

loans.use: to buy a canopy for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing for the colder weather.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: La señora Patricia es madre soltera que tienen a cargo 1 pequeño de 2 años y se encuentra embarazada en espera de uno nuevo. Ella se preocupa por el bienestar de sus hijos por tal motivo trabaja para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida ya que será padre y madre para ellos. Hace unos años su madre le dono un pedazo de terreno el cual comenzó a construir su casa con ahorros propios pero le faltó realizar los acabados de la parte de afuera. Para realizar su proyecto necesita comprar cemento, arena, y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en:
Sra. Patricia is a single mother who takes care of a two-year-old child and is pregnant with another one. She is concerned about the welfare of her children. For this reason, she works to provide them a better quality of life since she has to be both father and mother to them.

A few years ago, her mother gave her a piece of land on which she could begin building a house. She used money that she saved, but she lacks the funds to make the finishing touches on the outside. In order to complete this project, Patricia needs to buy cement, sand, and to pay for labor.

loans.use: to pay for materials and labor in order to complete the finishing touches on the outside of her house.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: El señor Juan Carlos  solicita  un préstamo para impermeabilizar el techo de su casa; por que en las temporadas de lluvias el agua se trasmina por consecuencia el techo se esta deteriorando. Juan Carlos quiere prevenir que el problema se agrave  y tenga que gastar más de lo previsto. Para poder cubrir los gastos el trabaja en maquiladora de Lunes a Viernes y algunas ocasiones se queda tiempo extra para recibir mas dinero. Juan Carlos es padre  de dos niños, de los que quiere formar unos buenos ciudadanos y un mejor patrimonio. Para que ella pueda realizar su proyecto necesita comprar el impermeabilizante.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan Carlos is requesting a loan to waterproof the roof of his house. As a result of the rainy season, water has seeped through and has caused the ceiling to deteriorate. Juan Carlos wants to prevent the problem from getting worse and having to spend more than expected. In order to cover his expenses, he works at a factory Monday through Friday. On some occasions, he will work overtime in order to earn more money.

Juan Carlos is the father of two children, who he wants to become good citizens and inherit a good legacy. In order to complete this project, he needs to buy waterproofing materials.

loans.use: to buy waterproofing materials for his roof.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: El señor Juan José es un hombre muy trabajador que desde hace 4 años adquirió su vivienda de interés social. En este momento se ven en la necesidad de cambiar la tubería de su casa por que cuando fue construido el material era de muy baja calidad; por lo que ahora ya comienza a tener problemas, a Juan José le preocupa esta situación por que le genera mayores gastos. Para que su proyecto sea realizado necesita comprar tubería, accesorios, pintura y pagar al plomero que le hará el trabajo.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan José is a hardworking gentleman who acquired his home four years ago through a government subsidy program. At the moment, he needs to replace the plumbing in his house because the original material that was used was of very poor quality. Now he is starting to have problems.

Juan José is concerned that this situation will lead to more expenses. For this project, he needs to buy pipes, fittings, paint, as well as pay a plumber to do the work.

loans.use: to pay for materials and labor in order to replace the plumbing in his house.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is a 49-year-old man who is married to Magdalena, a 38-year-old lady. They have been blessed with six children: Yulinda, 18, who only graduated from Junior High School, helps her mother to weave; Imanuel, 17, is studying in the first grade of Senior High School; Brudel, 12, Sifrido, 11, and Aquarius, 8, are still in Primary School; and Novita, is just 6.

Julius has a farm that is located 3 km away from his residence. Currently, Julius cultivates “Kangkung” (water spinach) and corn. Actually, Julius also cultivated beans and string beans but they have been harvested and sold at the market. Julius was thinking of cultivating more corn, beans and ‘kangkung’ but he only has a small plot of land to farm. He believes that the more he can cultivate, the more he can harvest to be sold in the market. Thus, he can generate more income for his family.

Julius was offered a plot of land to hire, but he does not have money to do so. Therefore, he is requesting a loan of IDR 4,000,000 from TLM. He is expecting that TLM will approve his loan application soon.

loans.use: To rent a plot of land

loans.name: Olandina

texts.en:
Olandina is a 51-year-old lady who is married to Olandino, a 63-year-old man. They originated from East Timor. They have two children named: WarteP., 35, who is married and Merita, 18, who is in Senior High School. 

Olandina owns a kiosk business selling daily needs such soap, detergent, shampoo, biscuits, etc and vegetables such “Kangkung” (water spinach), cauliflower, carrots, spinach and cabbage. She operates this business from 8 am to 9 pm. This business has been running for five years. She should work hard in order to cover their living needs. Olandino used to work as a soldier in East Timor. Now he helps Olandina run the kiosk business.    
Olandina plans to improve her business by purchasing more stock. Therefore, she is requesting a loan of IDR 7,500,000 to purchase additional stock such as instant noodles, biscuits, cooking oil, cigarettes, rice, etc, and to renovate her kiosk. She really hopes that TLM will assist her in improving her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks such as instant noodles, biscuits, cooking oil, cigarettes, rice, etc, and to renovate her kiosk

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan is 28 years old, married and has one child. The family lives in the peaceful village of San Jose, Baggao, Cagayan. To make a living, she operates a general store selling farm supplies in the nearby public market. She had been in this business for almost a year. The daily net profit of PHP 500 goes to their daily needs at home such as meals and the allowance of her child.

She has insufficient funds, which is why she is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy hog feed, medicines, vitamins, fertilizers and seeds to sell in her store. This will help increase the capacity of sales from her business.

She hopes to earn more income and improve her daily sales to boost her profits for the education of her child.

loans.use: to buy hog feed, medicines, vitamins, fertilizers and seeds to sell in her store.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
Beatriz is a hardworking mother of three. She is 51 years old. To provide sustenance for the needs of the family, she is selling fruits and vegetables to the people in her village. She is earning a daily income of PHP 300. She has been using her income as revolving capital to continuously operate the business and for daily meals and allowances of her children. 

She needs additional vegetables to sell. That is why she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy cabbages, tomatoes, eggplants and squash to sell in the village.

In the future, she hopes to continuously earn an income to achieve financial stability.

loans.use: to buy cabbages, tomatoes, eggplant and squash to sell

loans.name: Herminia

texts.en:
This is Herminia, 51, a resident of Quezon City, Philippines. She is married to Baldrich, a carpenter. All of her siblings are still studying. She, together with her husband and children, manage their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Herminia owns a sari-sari store. She buys groceries like canned goods, condiments, milk, sugar, and primary commodities that are needed in every household. Aside from this, she also sells pork and rice. She earns money by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 700 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

She is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 12,000 that will help her to continue operations.  She will use the loan to buy additional grocery items that will help her to accommodate the demands of her customers.  She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business, “the more display of grocery items, more customers will come to your store because they believe you have what they need.” 

Herminia dreams of providing a comfortable life for her family and seeing all of her children with a stable job in the future. She never fails to attend to the fellowship* every week as it inspires her to grow more spiritually.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and other products to sell

loans.name: 03.12.90 Thiệu Dương Thiệu Hóa Group

texts.en:
Mrs Hiệp works in agriculture raising poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby cattle to raise and then sell in the future.

Hiệp is 27 years old and married with one child.
Hiệp is the group leader of the 90 Thiệu D. solidarity group, which consists of five members. 
She lives and works in Thiệu Hóa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

In 2010, Hiệp joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hiệp has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Hiệp has been involved in this business for four years.
The main hardship that Hiệp

loans.use: to purchase baby cattle to raise and then sell in the future.

loans.name: 03.12.91 Thiệu Dương Thiệu Hóa Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Gái  works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase farming tools. She is 41 years old, married, and has 4 children. Gái is the group leader of the 91 Thiệu D. solidarity group, which consists of 7 members. She lives and works in Thiệu Hóa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with 2 dependents.

In 2010, Gái joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Gái has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Gái has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Gái faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Gái hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to buy land of her own, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase farming tools.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
At her young age of 23, Estrella is now blessed with two children. To generate income and provide sustenance for the family, her spouse works as a farmer and Estrella involved herself in the business of buying and selling second-hand goods such as used bottles and plastics. She had been doing it for almost two years. 

She is now asking for a loan of PHP 4,000 to buy more used bottles, plastics and newspapers to sell. This would help increase her earnings.

Someday, she hopes to provide a successful life for her family.

loans.use: to buy more used bottles, plastics and newspapers to sell.

loans.name: Myra

texts.en:
Myra enjoys her activities in her food selling business. In the afternoon, she cooks and sells fish balls and other dim sum to sell to the people in her village. Though income generated from this business is minimal, she patiently saves it for the daily allowances of her children. She has three children and two of them attend school. She had been doing this activity for three years. 

She needs additional products to sell. That is why she needs a loan of PHP 4,000 to buy more meatballs, fish balls and eggs to sell. 

In the future, she wants to strengthen her business to generate more income. She hopes to save enough profit to finance the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy more meatballs, fish balls and eggs to sell.

loans.name: Ma.caren Elizabeth

texts.en:
This is Ma. Caren, 49, a resident of Quezon City, Philippines. She is married to Pedro, a taxi driver. A mother of three children, she dreams of sending them all to school. She, together with her husband and children, manage their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Caren owns a variety store. She buys groceries like canned goods, condiments, milk, sugar, and other primary commodities that are needed in every household. Aside from this, she also sells frozen meat products. She earns money by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of 500 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

Caren is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 that will help her to have additional capital. She will use the loan to buy additional groceries, toiletries, beverages and frozen meat products that will help her to accommodate the demands of her customers. With the help of God, she strongly believes that her business will be more prosperous.

Caren hopes to continuously provide a good life for her family. She wants her children to have their own businesses when they grow up. Hard work and faith in God paves the way for her to turn dreams into reality. She never fails to attend to the fellowship* every week as it inspires her to grow more spiritually. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and other products to sell

loans.name: Perveen's Group

texts.en:
Perveen is 52 years old, married and has four children: two sons and two daughters. She couldn’t educate her children due to financial constraints and they started working in as teenagers to financially contribute to the family.
 
Perveen is a very supportive lady in nature. She supports her family with her decorative embroidery business. She is very skillful and works with great dedication. She crafts beautiful designs on clothes, which attracts many customers.
  
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her decorative embroidery business. With the loan, she will buy embroidery material in bulk quantity to be able to prepare better quality embroidered clothes and increase her profits.
