texts.fr: DIEU EST GRAND est un groupe de deux personnes, dont les membres vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Mariama (qui a la main levée sur la photo),est âgée de 37 ans et est mariée à un Ferrailleur du nom de Constant. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à leurs charges. Mariama vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Mariama n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de sa famille, Mariama mène comme activité, la vente de fruits, de tissus et de chaussures de façon secondaire dans son quartier. Mariama s'approvisionne au Bénin. C'est la deuxième fois que Mariama et Mélaine, le second membre du groupe DIEU EST GRAND, sollicitent l'appui financier de ALIDé en vue de renforcer leur capacité financière et de mieux répondre à la demande de leur clientèle.
texts.en:
DIEU EST GRAND Group is made up of two women who live in the same neighborhood. The group's representative, Mariama, is 37 years old and married to a scrap metal dealer named Constant. She's the one raising her hand in the photograph.

The couple has four school-attending children, whom they have to support. Mariama lives together with her children and husband. She never attended school. To provide for herself and her family, she sells fruits, fabrics, and shoes in her neighborhood.

She gets her supplies in Benin. This is the second time that Mariama and Mélanie, the other member of the group, are seeking financial support from Kiva's partner, ALIDé, in order to bolster their financial capabilities and better meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy fruits, fabrics, and shoes

loans.name: Isata

texts.en:
Isata is 25 years old and married with two children, ages 3 and 12. Both children attend school. She runs a provisions and food store in Goderich, Sierra Leone.

Isata has been in this business for seven years and sells products like scented soap, sweet milk, salt, oil and soft drinks. Her husband is a businessman who also helps the family generate more income. She says that the biggest challenge to her business is recovering from construction damage from the main road nearby.

She has requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more oil, soft drinks, plastic bags, and sweet milk. Isata says that the extra income from this loan will help her increase the range of her products and improve the welfare of her children.  In the future, she would like to expand her business to different parts of the city.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, plastic bags, sweet milk, and other food products.

loans.name: Fabiola

texts.es:
Fabiola tiene 21 años de edad, es una jovencita con ganas de superación personal. Ella vive en la zona de la laguna Alalay de la ciudad de Cochabamba, trabaja en un estudio jurídico como secretaria hace 2 años y también vende productos para el arreglo y cuidado de imagen personal. 
Fabiola vive en la casa de sus abuelos junto a su madre y hermanos, su padre murió hace algunos años, debido a que Fabiola trabaja y estudia necesita el préstamo para que compre mercadería de cosméticos y mejore la actividad  que tiene, de esta manera puede mejorar su nivel de vida. Ella está muy agradecida con la gente que por medio de Kiva le pudo dar la oportunidad de hacer realidad su sueño.
Fabiola entre sus planes futuros planea sacar un nuevo préstamo para abrir una repostería donde trabaje su querida mamá.
texts.en:
Fabiola, age 21, is a young woman who looks to succeed on a personal level. She lives in the District of Laguna Alalay in the city of Cochabamba. For the past two years, she has worked as a secretary at a law firm. She also sells personal care and image makeover products.

Fabiola lives at the home of her grandparents with her mother and her siblings. Her father died a few years ago. Due to her work and her studies, Fabiola needs a loan to buy cosmetics so that she can improve her business in order for her to raise her standard of living. She is very grateful to the people who lend through Kiva for giving her the opportunity to fulfill her dream. Fabiola’s future plans include obtaining a new loan so that she can open a pastry shop where she can work with her beloved mother.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Josephine A's Group

texts.fr:
Mariée, Joséphine est mère de 4 enfants, tous scolarisés. 
Joséphine est une commerçante, elle vend des sacs de charbons qu'elle distribue dans les quartiers de sa zone de résidence à ceux qui en besoin; ce qui lui facilite l'écoulement. Elle fait surtout des ventes en gros, aux semi-gros et détaillants qui vont revendre pour y gagner un peu. Ses achats se font auprès des fournisseurs qui ont reçu l'agrément de commercialiser des produits forestiers. Joséphine s'est associée à Pulchérie pour obtenir son premier crédit à FINADEV afin d'augmenter son stock de provisions en vu d'une meilleure satisfaction des attentes de sa clientèle. Elle estime que le bénéfice généré par ce concours financier lui permettra d'améliorer sa participation aux charges du ménage et les conditions de vie de sa famille. 
Son plus grand projet est d'avoir sa propre maison et de soutenir ses enfants à faire les études supérieures.
texts.en:
Joséphine is married and the mother of four children, all enrolled in school. She sells sacks of charcoal that she distributes in the neighborhoods of her area to those who need it; this makes her sales easier. She especially sells wholesale, and to other retailers who resell it to make a little. Her purchases are made from suppliers who have a legal permit to sell such forest-derived goods. 

Joséphine joined Pulchérie to obtain her first loan from FINADEV in order to grow her inventory and better satisfy the expectations of her clientele. She expects that the income she generates with the help of this loan will permit her to contribute more to supporting her household and improving living conditions for her family. 

Her greatest dream is to have her own house and to be able to support her children while they attend institutions of higher learning.

loans.use: to buy 50 sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Kaprie

texts.en:
Kaprie is 46 years old and married with three children, ranging from ages 1 to 17. Two of his children are attending school, and he also supports 4 relatives. 

Kaprie runs a building materials shop in Goderich, a part of Western Area in Sierra Leone. He has been in this business for 17 years and sells pipes, electrical cables, pumps, hand basins, and toilet seats. He says that the main challenge to his business is lacking access to more capital to grow and expand.  

He requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase new products, including nails, cement, and paint, and to stock up on more pipes and electrical cables. Kaprie says that the extra income from this loan will improve the welfare of his family. In the future, he would like to open more building material stores around the city.

loans.use: to purchase more pipes, electrical cables, hand basins, and other building materials

loans.name: Wilber

texts.es: El señor  Wilber, nacido en Comarapa Santa Cruz, tiene un hijo pequeño, tiene  una parcela hace 15 años en la localidad de la Planchada a 32 km. De Jorochito, donde vive y trabaja en la agricultura, también cuenta con un tractor con el cual trabaja, el se dedica a la siembra de: maíz, papa, sandia, poroto, todo lo que el siembra lo vende en el mismo lugar,  el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la siembra de sandia y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra,   es cliente antiguo de la institución ya que trabaja hace cinco secuencias, es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable con  el pago de sus cuotas,  se siente muy agradecido con la institución por apoyo que le a brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Wilber was born in Comarapa Santa Cruz. He has a young son. Wilber has owned a parcel of land for 15 years in the town of Planchada, which is 32 km from De Jorochito, where he lives and works as a farmer. He also owns a tractor that he uses for work.

Wilber grows corn, potatoes, watermelons, and beans. Everything he grows is sold in the same place. The money from this loan will be used for planting watermelon and everything he needs for preparing the land. Wilber is a longtime client of Emprender and has worked in five loan cycles. He is a person who is hardworking and responsible with his payments.

Wilber is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for planting watermelon.

loans.name: David

texts.es: El Señor David, es una persona de 28 años de edad de estado civil soltero, alcanzo a estudiar el bachillerato en humanidades, vive en casa de sus padres en la ciudad de Cochabamba y no cuenta con dependientes económicos a cargo; la actividad principal a la que se dedica el cliente es al comercio de lubricantes en especial la venta de grasa de rodamientos para maquinaria agrícola y de construcción en el Valle Alto de la ciudad de Cochabamba, es decir en las poblaciones de Tarata, Cliza, Punata, Araní y Tíraque. Finalmente el cliente tiene ganas de incrementar su mercadería y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión y de tal forma poder mejorar sus ingresos económicos para de esta manera también mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Sr. David is 28 years old, single, and completed his Bachelor’s degree in Humanities. He lives at the home of his parents in the city of Cochabamba and has no financial dependents. His main business activity involves selling lubricants, especially grease used for farming and construction machinery. David does most of his business in Valle Alto in the city of Cochabamba, but he also travels to the towns of Tarata, Cliza, Punata, Araní, and Tíraque.

His goal is to increase his inventory of merchandise. For this reason, he needs to request investment capital so that he can increase his earnings and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase machine lubricants.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, es natural de la ciudad de Palma, tiene 51 años, es casada y madre de 04 hijos, que se encuentran en etapa escolar. Juntos habitan en su propia casa. María es un mujer responsable y decidida, su trabajo consiste en sembrar cacao y achiote, productos que tiene mucha demanda en los centros de acopio de su ciudad. Sus compradores saben de la calidad que tiene sus productos, por ello es que genera ganancias gracias a este negocio. Tiene 20 años y aún continua sembrado y cuidando sus tierras, haciéndolas más fertiles. Ella menciona que sino no fuera por éste negocio nunca hubiera logrado cubrir los gastos educativos de sus hijos, ni tampoco hubiera comprado bienes para su hogar. En adelante, espera seguir ahorrando, ya que desea comprar una nueva casa  en la ciudad de Ayacucho que le será de gran utilidad para sus hijos, para que terminen sus estudios superiores en esa ciudad. Este será su segundo crédito y esta muy contenta de saber que contara nuevamente con su ayuda. Con el monto solicitado comprará palas, picos y machetes, herramientas que le servirán para la siembra.
texts.en:
María is a native of the city of Palma. She is 51 years old, married, and the mother of four school-age children. They live together in their own home. María is a responsible and decisive woman whose work consists of planting cacao and annatto. These products are in high demand at the collection centers in her city. Her buyers know that her products are of good quality, so she is able to generate good earnings from her business. María started farming when she was 20 years old and continues to plant crops and care for her land by making it more fertile. She says that if her business did not exist, she would not able to pay for the educational expenses of her children nor would she be able to buy furnishings for her home. In the future, María hopes to continue saving because she wants to buy a new house in Ayacucho, which will be of great use to her children so that they can finish their college studies in the city.

This will be her second loan. María is very pleased to know that she has renewed support. The amount she requested will be used to buy shovels, pick axes, and machetes. These tools will be used for the planting season.

loans.use: to buy shovels, pick axes, and machetes.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana Julia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quiewn tiene una comideria en la que invertirá el credito. Ella comprara mercaderia (granos básicos, carne, repollo,...etc.) para su negocio para seguir creciendo poco a poco.
texts.en: Ana Julia is a hardworking businesswoman who has a cafeteria where she will invest her credit. She will purchase merchandise such as basic grains, meat, chicken, etc. for her business to be able to grow little by little.

loans.use: to purchase meat, grains, and chicken for her business

loans.name: Titomangba (Cite) Group

texts.fr: Le groupe TITOMANGBA (CITE) est composé de deux personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. C'est la sixième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Albertine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Albertine est âgée de 37 ans et vit au Bénin. Albertine est mariée à un enseignant du nom de Mimoune. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Albertine et son mari répondent ensemble aux besoins de leur famille. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Albertine mène comme activité depuis une dizaine d'année, la vente de sacs de maïs. Albertine s’approvisionne  dans l’un des marchés du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Albertine sollicite ensemble avec Naïmatou le second membre du groupe TITOMANGBA (CITE), un sixième crédit.
texts.en: The Titomangba (Cite) group consists of two people who live in the same district. They are requesting their sixth loan from ALIDé so that they can invest in their businesses and raise their level of activity. Albertine, the group's representative, is the woman in the picture with her hand raised. She is 37 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to a teacher called Mimoune and the couple have 3 dependent children who all go to school. Both parents take care of the family's needs. Albertine has been selling bags of corn for the past 10 years in order to be able to take care of her needs and those of her children, and she gets her supplies from her local market in Benin. She and Naïmatou, her fellow Titomangba (Cite) group member, are making their sixth loan request so that they are able to increase their customer satisfaction levels and raise their business revenues.

loans.use: to buy bags of corn for resale.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es: Ella invertirá el credito en la compar de manzanas y perecederos, cajetas etc. para seguir creciendo.
texts.en: She will invest her loan in the purchase of apples, perishable goods, caramel candies, and other products so that she can continue growing.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials & pay for labor to build her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase computer equipment for her Internet business.

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es:
La Señora Faustina tiene 50 años, está casada con el Señor Saturnino con quien tiene 4 hijos: Julio Cesar D. 30, Rosana D. 26, Rodrigo D. 23 y Liz D. 18 años, estos 2 últimos son estudiantes y viven todavía con ellos.  
Faustina tiene una despensa bien surtida con todo tipo D. artículos, hace aproximadamente 12 años que se dedica a esto. En cuanto a su clientela comenta  que tiene una clientela bien formada y en la cual le va muy bien.
PretenD. utilizar el crédito para la compra comestibles, bebidas, lácteos y demás con lo que podrá abastecerse y cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Señora Faustina is 50 years old.  She is married to Señor Saturnino, with whom she has four children: Julio Cesar, aged 30; Rosana, 26: Rodrigo, 23; and Liz, aged 18.  These last two are students and still live with their parents.

Faustina has a well-stocked store with all types of items, which she has had for approximately 12 years.  As regards her customers, she comments that she has a solid customer base and with that, things are going very well for her.

She is planning to use the loan to buy food, drinks, dairy products and other things so she can stock up and meet her customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy food, drinks, dairy products and other things for her retail premises.

loans.name: Ervin Santiago

texts.es: Don Ervin invertirá el crédito en Charolina, royal, forro fino, zuelas, hilos, pega blanca, bega amarilla,  evillas y Alistado.
texts.en: Don Ervin will use the loan to buy more shoe making supplies such as thin lining, soles, thread, white glue, yellow glue, buckles, etc.

loans.use: to buy shoemaking supplies

loans.name: Katherine Scarleth

texts.es: Katherine es una joven estudiante que cursa la carrera de Administración Turística y Hotelera, el crédito será usado para pagar el curso de titulación de su carrera, su mamá le apoyará para pagar este crédito. En un futuro espera poder ser una profesional exitosa, espera también tener mejores oportunidades en la vida, le gusta mucho su carrera, ha tenido muchos desafíos pero los ha logrado vencer y espera muy pronto poder coronar su carrera
texts.en: Katherine is a young student who is studying for a degree in Tourism and Hotel Administration.  She will use this loan to pay the tuition for a course she needs for her degree.  Her mother will help her to pay back this loan.  In the future, she hopes to become a successful professional who will have better opportunities in life.  She enjoys her tourism studies very much.  She has faced a lot of challenges, but she has been able to overcome them and she hopes that very soon she will be able to get her degree.

loans.use: to pay for a course that she needs to get her degree

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es: Liliana, tiene la edad 39 de años, está casada y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo actualmente. Ella con el crédito va comprar cosméticos y ropa para la venta. Ella cuenta con un pequeño local donde vende ropa y productos para belleza. Ella quiere aumentar la cantidad de productos para su venta y así tener una mejor diversidad de productos para su venta y aumentar la clientela de compra de productos. Ella tiene como meta generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para el bienestar de su familia y propio en el futuro. Es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
At present Liliana is 39 years old, married, and lives with her two children and husband. With the loan she will buy cosmetics and clothing to sell. She has a small business where she sells clothing and beauty products. 

She wants to increase the number of products for sale to have a greater diversity of items, and grow her clientele. Liliana's goal is to generate a larger profit for the well-being of her family and herself for the future. 

This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She hadn't had other loans before from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered her the loan with more ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: María de los Angeles utilizara el credito para seguir invirtiendo en materiales para la produccion de calzado.
texts.en: María de los Angeles will use the loan to continue investing in shoe-making materials.

loans.use: Purchase materials to make women's shoes

loans.name: Degbo-Gbahoun Group

texts.fr: DEGBOGBAHOUN est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres habitent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Monique Evelyne (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 30 ans et est mariée à un transitaire nommé Julien. Le couple a un enfant. Monique Evelyne assure ensemble avec son mari les différentes charges de la maison. Monique Evelyne n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Il y a une dizaine d'année, Monique Evelyne mène comme activité la vente d'ustensiles de cuisine, de tissus et du charbon de bois par le système de distribution. Cette activité lui procure des revenus l'aidant à répondre efficacement aux exigences de sa famille. Monique Evelyne s’approvisionne au Bénin. C’est la cinquième fois que Monique Evelyne et les autres membres du groupe DEGBOGBAHOUN sollicitent l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue de renforcer leur fonds de roulement et leur activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle.
texts.en:
DEGBOGBAHOUN is a group of three people whose members live in the same neighborhood. Their representative is Monique Evelyne (whose hand is raised in the photo). She is 30 years old and married to a forwarding agent named Julien. The couple has one child. Monique Evelyne and her husband handle together the various household responsibilities. 

Monique Evelyne never attended school. She started selling kitchen utensils, fabrics and charcoal through the distribution system about ten years ago. She buys her stock in Benin. The income earned from this activity allows her to meet her family’s needs.

Monique Evelyne and the other group members are seeking a fifth loan from ALIDé to help strengthen their working capital and bolster their activities to better meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils, fabrics, and charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Yvoty Ii Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Yvoty Ii se conformó en el 2011, con mucho esfuerzo se encuentran en el primer ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa. Además del trabajo independiente de cada una, también desarrollan actividades en forma conjunta  para recaudar fondos con el fin de contar con un capital dentro del grupo, a la vez se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos que es la de trabajar para apoyar económicamente  a sus familias en especial.
La Señora Florinda se dedica a la venta de pescado. Ella nos comenta que mediante este negocio la economía de la familia mejoró bastante ya que además ayuda el ingreso de su marido que es empleado en un negocio.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de pescado, con lo cual podrá aumentar su stock y cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
The women's committee named "Yvoty Ii" was formed in 2011.  With a great deal of effort they came to their first lending cycle, and they are united and committed to each other in the program.  In addition to the work that each one does, they also are developing activities together to collect funds with the goal of gaining some capital for the group.  Together they help each other to reach their objectives, which are to work to be able to support their families financially.

Señora Florinda works selling fish.  She tells us that through this business her family's financial situation has greatly improved.  She is also able to help out with the income of her husband, who is employed in a business.

She is requesting the loan to purchase fish, with which she can increase her stock and meet her customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy fish for later sale.

loans.name: Walidaan Group

texts.fr:
le groupe existe il y'a environ 5ans. il composé de 14 femmes habitant le village. et qui font du commerce de détails(mil,arachides,légumes).

la dame khady,habillée en rose au milieu de la photo est la responsable du groupe.elle est mariée et mere de 04 enfants.elle a 38ans.

Khady, vend de l'huile a base d'arachide et des poissons séchés. elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine car elle a toujours pratiquée cette activée. 

avec son prêt elle va acheter de l'arachide, et des poissons séchés pour les revendre.

des profits générés par son activité,elle va assister son époux dans les dépenses familiales; augmenter son épargne pour avoir une autonomie financière.
texts.en:
This group was created about five years ago. It consists of 14 women from the same village whose trade is the retail sale of millet, peanuts, vegetables, etc.

Khady is the group leader. She is dressed in pink at the center of the photo. Khady is 38 years old and married with four children. She sells peanut oil and dried fish. She has a lot of experience in this activity, having done this all her life. 

She will use her loan to buy peanuts, as well as dried fish for resale. With the profits earned, she plans to help her husband with the family expenses and add to their savings in order to achieve financial independence.

loans.use: to buy peanuts and dried fish.

loans.name: Raymunda

texts.es:
Raymunda, es natural de la ciudad de San Miguel, tiene 46 años. Es una mujer sociable y trabajadora y esta casada con Guillermo de 47 años y tiene 06 hijos. Juntos habitan en su propia casa en la comunidad de Palmapampa. La labor que realiza es labrar la tierra, pues posee 04 hectáreas de terreno, cultivando en ella cacao y plátano. Durante estos 20 años de trabajo la han convertido en una persona conocedora del agro. Y cuando llega la temporada de cosecha, cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros quienes se encargan de cosechar y trasladar los productos recolectados hasta cierto tramo para luego ser transportados con vehículos menores como carretillas y triciclos. 
Se siente muy comprometida con su trabajo, porque gracias a su esfuerzo hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas se desarrollan y dan buenos frutos. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP y se compromete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en la fecha indicada, ya que desea acceder a otros prestamos posteriormente y esta muy segura de que contará con el apoyo de todos ustedes. Con los 2,500 soles que solicita, comprará plantas injertadas de cacao para así obtener mejores frutos en corto tiempo.
texts.en:
Raymunda is 46 years old and native to San Miguel. She is a sociable and hard-working woman, is married to Guillermo, who is 47 years old, and has six children. Together they live in their own house in the community of Palmapampa. The work they do is till the earth. They own 4 hectares of property and cultivate cocoa and bananas. During the past twenty years of working, Raymunda has become an expert in agriculture. And when harvest time arrives, she counts on the help of laborers who are in charge of harvesting and transporting the collected products a certain distance before later being transferred into smaller vehicles such as handcarts and tricycle carts.
She feels very committed to her work, since, thanks to her efforts, today she enjoys seeing her plants develop and give good fruit. This will be her second loan with MFP, and she is committed to fulfill her payment plan on time, especially since she wishes to be eligible for other loans later. She is confident that she can count on all of your help. She will purchase grafted cocoa plants with the 2,500 PEN [$925] she is requesting so as to obtain better fruit in a shorter time.

loans.use: To purchase grafted cocoa plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To invest in her beauty and nail care business, with a portion for the purchase of beauty products.

loans.name: Sopp Mame Diarra Group

texts.fr:
le groupe est formé par 12(douze)femmes qui habitent toutes le village.il existe depuis environ 5ans avec la création du banc villageois.elles pratiquent le commerce d'huile d'arachides,mil,et vendent le petit déjeuner.

la dame Seynabou,mise en médaillon sur la photo est la responsable du groupe.elle est âgée de 35 ans et mère de 04enfants.

Seynabou vend le petit déjeuner au marché. elle a une bonne expérience dans cette activité pour l'avoir pratiquée pendant longtemps.

son crédit lui permettra d'acheter des produits(sucre,lait,beurre,œufs,café etc..)pour son activité.

avec ses bénéfices ,elle aidera son mari dans les dépenses familiales. elle assurera une bonne scolarité a ses enfants.
texts.en:
The group is composed of 12 women living in the same village. The group has been in existence for about five years following the creation of the Banc Villageouis. The group members sell peanut oil, millet and breakfast items.

Ms. Seynabou, whose photo also appears in a separate medallion, is the group’s leader. She is 35 years old and the mother of four.
Seynabou sells breakfast foods at the market. She has a lot of experience in this area as she has been doing it for a long time. Her loan will allow her to buy the products (sugar, milk, butter, eggs, coffee etc…) necessary for her business. Thanks to her income, she will help her husband support the family. She will take care of paying for proper school studies for her children.

loans.use: to buy products such as sugar, milk, butter, eggs, coffee etc for her food stand

loans.name: Jose Paciente

texts.es: José Paciente, tiene la edad 76 de años, está casada y vive con su esposa actualmente que es su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar los materiales para hacerle mejoras a su finca de ganado. El con el crédito va hacer la mejora de las cercas y los repastos para ofrecerles a sus animales mejor calidad de pastos para su bienestar. El cuenta con los potreros pero quiere mejorarlos en condiciones. El quiere obtener de estas mejoras los mejores resultados y así generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias al poder darle a sus animales mejores pastos y el obtener los resultados esperados a un plazo más rápido. El piensa en el futuro de ambos por lo cual hará estas mejoras.   Es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José is 76 years old, married, and lives with his wife who is now his main concern. With the loan he plans to buy materials to improve his cattle farm. He wishes to improve the enclosures and the grazing land so the animals have better quality food. He has some vacant land but he wants to improve its quality.

From these improvements José expects to get better results and generate more income in a short period of time. He is thinking of the future of both his wife and himself.

José has not had loans from state banks in the past, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with good repayment conditions and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to improve his cattle farm

loans.name: Sop Serigne Saliou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe est créé en 2007. il est composé de 16 femmes qui habitent pour la plupart le village. Elles s'exercent toutes au petit commerce de grains(mil,haricot local,...).

Madame FATOU,mise en exergue sur la photo est responsable du groupe.elle a 43ans. elle est mariée et maman de 06enfants.

elle pratique le commerce de grains(arachide,haricot, mil).qu'elle fait bien parce quelle en a une bonne expérience pour avoir durée dans la pratique de cette activité.

son crédit lui permettra d'acheter de l'arachide, qu'elle transformera en huile pour la revendre. elle achètera aussi des haricots locaux et du mil pour diversifier.

Avec les recettes de son activité, elle veux assurer un bon avenir a ses enfants et de pouvoir atteindre une autonomie financière.
texts.en:
The group was created in 2007. It is made up of 16 women who for the most part live in the village. They all practice a small retail activity selling grains (millet, local beans etc...)

Mrs. Fatou, whose photo is highlighted in the description, is the leader of the group. She is 43 years old, married and the mother of six children.

She sells grains (peanuts, beans, millet). She is doing well because she has a large experience from having been in this business a long time. Her loan will allow her to buy peanuts that she will transform in oil and will in turn sell. She will also buy local beans and millet to diversify her activity.

With the profit from her business, she wants to guarantee her children a good future and obtain financial independence.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts, millet and local beans

loans.name: Sant Yalla Group

texts.fr:
ce groupe existe il y'a environ 5 ans.il formé par 13 femmes habitant le même village. elles font le commerce et l'embouche ovine comme activités.

madame Fatou debout a l'extreme gauche de la photo est la responsable. elle est agée de 53ans mariée et mére de 08 enfants.

elle a comme activité le commerce de légumes,et en même temps fais de l'embouche ovine. elle en a une bonne expérience car elle la fait depuis longtemps.

avec son crédit elle achètera des légumes et ruminants(moutons), pour les revendre.

de ses bénéfices  elle assura un bon suivi médical a ses enfants, et augmentera ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This group has been in existence for about 5 years, and is made up of 13 women who live in the same village. They fatten and sell sheep. 

Madame Fatou, standing at the far left of the photo, is the group's leader. Alongside fattening sheep, she also sells vegetables. She has plenty of experience in these activities. With her loan, she will buy vegetables and ruminants (sheep), for re-sale.

With her profits, she will be able to pay for good medical care for her children, and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and ruminants (sheep).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools to repair vehicles

loans.name: Fifame/xwlacodji Group

texts.fr: FIFAME/XWLACODJI est un groupe constitué de trois personnes et dont la représentante (dont la main est levée sur la photo) est nommée Florence. Les membres du groupe habitent dans le même quartier au Bénin. Florence est âgée de 33 ans et est mariée à un pêcheur du nom de Martin. Le couple a six enfants, tous à leur charge. Parmi les enfants, certains sont scolarisés. Florence et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants. Le couple subvient ensemble aux divers besoins de la famille. Florence n'a jamais fréquenté l’école. Afin de satisfaire ses besoins et ceux de ses enfants, Florence achète des poissons frais au port de pêche, et les revend à sa clientèle au Bénin. Florence exerce cette activité depuis une quinzaine d’année. C’est la première fois que Florence et les autres membres du groupe FIFAME/XWLACODJI sollicitent un crédit auprès de ALIDé, afin d'agrandir leur activité et d'accroître leur chiffre d'affaire et leur revenu.
texts.en:
Fifame / Xwlacodji is a group made up of three persons, whose representative (with the raised hand on the photo) is named Florence. The members of the group live in the same neighborhood in Benin.

Florence is 33 years old and is married to a fisherman named Martin. The couple has six children all under their care. Amongst the children some attend school. Florence and her husband live together with their children. Together the couple provides for the various needs of the family.

Florence never attended school. In order to provide for her needs and those of her children, she buys fresh fish at the fishing port and sells them to her customers in Benin. She has been practicing this activity for about fifteen years. 

This is the first time that Florence and the other members of the group  Fifame / Xwlacodji request a loan from ALIDé to expand their activity and increase their sales and income.

loans.use: to purchase fresh fish

loans.name: Urbano

texts.es: Urbano, está soltero y vive con sus padres actualmente. El lo que va comprar con el crédito es una novilla para engorde. El cuenta con el terreno apto a su poder para la explotación de este proyecto. El quiere comprar la novilla pequeña para engordarla y luego venderla en el mercado local y así generarle ganancias. Además el terreno que el utilizara esta sin uso por lo cual quiere invertir en la compra para utilizarlo racionalmente. El quiere obtener de este proyecto nuevo las mayores de las ganancias para su bienestar y la de su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Urbano is single and currently lives with his parents.  He wants to use the loan to buy a calf to raise.  He has a plot of land which is appropriate for this type of project.  He will raise the calf and then sell it at the local market where he can make a good profit.  The land he has is not in use so the purchase would be aimed at using it rationally.  With this new project he wants to increase his income for the well-being of his family.  This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR.  He has never had a loan through the state banks and FUDECOSUR is giving him better payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy a calf.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elena; ella tiene 57 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tejido de chompas, ella teje chompas para niños, mujeres y varones y luego lo vende en forma independiente, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tejido de chompas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar lana de diferentes colores, agujas y palitos de tejer.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "KANCHARY", which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Elena, 57, is married and has three children.  She alternates her daily activities with her sweater knitting business.  She knits for children, women and men and sells independently.  Her work hours are from 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. and through her business she has been able to support her children.  She wants to increase her knitting activity and is requesting a loan to buy different colored yarn, pins and knitting needles.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy different colored yarn, pins and knitting needles.

loans.name: Roly

texts.es:
Roly, es natural del distrito de Samugari, tiene 21 años de edad, es un joven jovial y trabajador, aunque todavía no cuenta con casa propia pero se esmera para obtener uno. Para Roly, el factor más relevante es “la creatividad y la persistencia”, a pesar de su corta edad quiere lograr sus metas por sí solo y  por ello apostó por la agricultura. Gracias al pequeño lote que sus padres le ofrecieron, él puede sembrar con tranquilidad sus sembríos de cacao y frejoles y así cubrir sus propios gastos personales. Tiene 03 años realizando esta actividad, y hata el momento simpre ha cosechado productos de calidad, sin emabargo necesita de capital para contratar jornaleros que le ayuden en la cosecha. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP y se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Roly solicita 2,000 mil soles, para contratar jornaleros y hacerlas trabajar en sacar la maleza de entre sus plantas, así como en la recolección de sus frutos, posteriormente espera ahorrar lo suficiente para ampliar sus
 siembra y así mejorar sus ingresos económicos
texts.en: Roly is 21 and from the district of Samugari.  He is a hard-working young man who does not have his own house yet but is working hard toward that end.  Roly's main characteristics are "creativity and persistence" and despite his young age he has goals he wants to reach on his own and has decided on agriculture as a means of earning a living.  Thanks to a small plot of land his parents gave him he can go grow cocoa and beans to cover his personal expenses.  He has been involved in this activity for three years and to date his crops have been good quality.  However he does not have the money to hire help for the harvest.  This is his second loan through MFP and he is committed to paying it back on time.  Roly is requesting 2,000 PEN to hire workers to pull the weeds from among the crops.  They will also help at harvest time.  He wants to be able to save enough to increase his plantation and improve his income.

loans.use: To hire workers.

loans.name: Lidia Marina

texts.es: Doña Lidia es una señora extranjera con 55 años de edad, soltera y trabajadora. Vive con sus hijos y nietos. Reside en Costa Rica hace seis años. Se dedica hace cinco años al comercio ambulante por catálogo de productos amway, debido a que tenía que salir adelante y ayudar en su hogar. Ella cuenta con el apoyo de su familia para las ventas y cobros de su negocio. Es una persona con deseos de superación. Se dedica también a la fisioterapia y se caracteriza por su forma de ser al querer ayudar a las demás personas. Es primera vez que solicita financiamiento para su actividad, debido a que ve la urgencia de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.
texts.en: Doña Lidia, 55, is a foreign lady who is single and hard-working.  She has lived with her children and grandchildren in Costa Rica for six years.  For five years she has been selling Amway products by catalogue in order to get ahead and help with the household expenses.  She has her family's support in sales and payment collection for the business.  She is a person with a great desire to improve her lifestyle.  She also is a physical therapist and known for wanting to help other people.  This is her first request for a loan for her business, since she wants to be able to provide immediate service to meet customer demand.

loans.use: To buy Amway products.

loans.name: Minor

texts.es: Minor, está casado y vive con sus hijos y esposa actualmente que son su mayor prioridad. El lo que va comprar con el crédito son cerdos para su engorde. El comprara cerdos de engorde y todos los insumos necesarios para su posterior mantenimiento. El quiere engordarlos para su posterior venta en el mercado de la localidad y así obtener de estos los mejores resultados para su bienestar. El quiere ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida en el futuro y generar  mayores ingresos para su estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Minor is married and lives with his wife and children, who are his main priority.  He plans to use the loan to buy pigs and all the necessary supplies for their maintenance. Once they are fully grown he will sell them at the local market for a good profit for his family's well-being.  He wants to give his family the best lifestyle possible in the future, and generate a greater income for economic stability.  This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR.  He has never had a state bank loan, but FUDECOSUR is giving him better payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy pigs to raise.

loans.name: Flor De Pilar 2 Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Flor de Pilar 2, se conformó en agosto del 2011,  se encuentran en el primer ciclo. Además del trabajo independiente de cada una, también desarrollan actividades en forma conjunta  para recaudar fondos con el fin de contar con un capital dentro del grupo, a la vez se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos que es la de trabajar para apoyar económicamente  a sus familias en especial.
La Sr. Rosa se dedica a la venta de queso, nos comenta  que mediante este negocio la economía de la familia podrá  mejorar, ya que por medio de su negocio y su arduo trabajo logra tener los ingresos necesarios para paliar los gastos diarios.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de queso, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The women's committee named "Flor de Pilar II" was formed in August 2011, and they are in their first lending cycle.  In addition to their own independent work, they also are developing activities together to bring in money, with the goal of having some capital within the group.  They work together to help each other achieve their objectives, which are to work to help their families out financially.

Señora Rosa works selling cheese.  She tells us that through this business, her family's financial situation will improve, and that through her business and her hard work, she will be able to earn the necessary income to cover their daily expenses.

She is requesting the loan to buy cheese, with which she will be able to stock up and meet her customers' demand.

loans.use: to buy cheese for later resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise (ice-cream, candy, soda and other things) and raw ingredients for making lunches and fast food.

loans.name: Djéneba

texts.fr:
Mme Djéneba est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 34ans et le moins âgé a23ans. 03 vont à l’école. Elle a 05 personnes en charge.

Elle vend de l’eau glacée, du jus de bissaps du jus de gingembre depuis 03ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de gounghin. Ses clients sont les élèves, les enfants et la population en générale.

Elle veut s’acheter 02 sacs de sucre,01 sachet de 100 paquet pour attacher le jus e,01 sac de 100 kg de bissaps et 01 plat de gingembre.

Mme utilise ses bénéfices pour acheter un congélateur. Elle ambitionne aider la famille surtout les enfants dans leur études et acheter une machine à coudre les sachets.
texts.en:
Mrs. Djéneba is married with four children. The eldest is 34 years old and the youngest is 23. Three of them go to school. She has five people in her care.

She has been selling iced water, bissaps juice (made from dried hibiscus flowers), and ginger juice for three years. She gets her supplies at the Gounghin market. Her customers are students, children, and the general population.

She wants to buy two bags of sugar, one bag of 100 pouches to package the juice, one 100 kg bag of hibiscus, and one plate of ginger.

Mrs. Djéneba will use the profits to buy a freezer. She plans to help her family, especially with respect to the children’s studies, and she wants to buy a machine to sew the pouches.

loans.use: to buy two bags of sugar, one bag of 100 pouches to package the juice, one 100 kg bag of hibiscus, and one plate of ginger

loans.name: Maira

texts.es: Maira, está casada y vive sola actualmente. Ella  va comprar  los materiales para la mejora de las porquerizas. Ella cuenta con los establecimientos pero necesita hacerle unas mejoras para así invertir en la compra de más cerdos y así producir  más cerdos de engorde para generar mayores ganancias. Ella pretende con este inversión agrandar sus establecimientos y poder incluir mas cerdos para su engorde y a la hora de venderlos obtener mejores ganancias para su bienestar en el futuro y tener su economía más estable en tiempos duros. Es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Maira is married and currently lives alone. She will buy materials for making improvements to her pigsties. Maira has the facilities, but needs to make a few improvements so that she can invest in the purchase of more pigs for fattening in order to generate better profits. She intends to expand her facilities so that she can house more pigs for fattening, which she will sell in order to obtain more earnings for her future well-being, as well as to have more stable finances for difficult times.

This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. Maira has not had any other loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to make improvements to the infrastructure of her pigsties.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Beatriz; ella tiene 42 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere implementar su casa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar un televisor para su casa.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Kanchary Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

Beatriz, 42, is single and has two children.  She works from 7 a.m. until 8 p.m.  She gets her children ahead with this job.

Beatriz wants to set up her house.  She is requesting the loan to buy a television set for her house.

She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy a television set for her house.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es: Doña Irma es una señora con 65 años de edad. Casada y vive con su esposo y un nieto (grandchild). Tiene deseos de superación y por eso trabaja mucho. Es clienta de la Fundación hace varios años y actualmente con los ingresos de su negocio le ayuda a una hija a pagar los estudios universitarios, la cual ya está terminando la licenciatura. Debido a eso, ella busca financiamiento para aumentar sus ventas y no dejar de ayudarle a su familia. Cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijas en las toma de decisiones. Siempre se ha dedicado a la venta de productos omnilife y angelísima, los cuales tiene mucha salida al mercado por ser tan buenos para la salud.
texts.en: Irma is 65 years old. She is married and she lives with her husband and her grandchild. She wants to improve in life and she works hard for this reason. She has been a client of Fundación Mujer for many years. One of her daughters is completing her university studies, and with the money Irma earns from her activity she is helping her daughter paying for university fees. This is why she is requesting a loan: she wants to increase her sales volume in order to continue helping her family. She counts on her daughters’ support in taking decisions. She has always been engaged in selling Omnilife and Angelísima products, two brands of very good health products that sell very well.

loans.use: To buy Omnilife and Angelísima products and then sell them.

loans.name: Silbera

texts.es: Silbera, de 42 años, es una mujer trabajadora y responsable, tiene un apareja con quien convive y del que tiene 04 hijos. Juntos habitan en su propia casa en el distrito de Samugari. Los campos de cultivo que con tanto esfuerzo logró comprarlo Silbera y su pareja, es el único sustento para los miembros de su familia. Sus cultivos de cacao y plátanos están trabajadas de manera técnificada, y por tanto sus frutos tienen mayor proporción que el normal, siendo muy solcitados en los centros de acopio. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembríos de las plaga de insectos, ya que estos perjudican los brotes de los frutos. Tiene 15 años realizando éste trabajo, y hasta el momento considera difícil transportar los pesados sacos de sus productos desde la chacra hasta los secaderos, lugar donde secan los granos. Solo espera trabajar con el mismo ímpetu que la caracteriza para salir adelante. Este será su 11avo crédito con MFP y espera de su ayuda para seguir cumpliendo sus objetivos trazados. Con los 2,000 soles que solicita, comprará sacos de abono para fertilizar sus tierras.
texts.en:
Silbera, age 42, is a hardworking and responsible woman. She has a partner with whom she lives and they have four children. Silbera and her family live in their own home in the District of Samugari. After much effort, Silbera and her partner were able to buy some land which has become the only source of income for the members of her family. Her crops of cacao and bananas are cultivated using technical methods, which promote a higher yield than normal. These crops are frequently requested at the collection centers. What she enjoys most about her work is protecting her crops from swarms of insects that could harm the fruit buds. Silbera has been in this line of work for 15 years. The most difficult part is transporting the heavy sacks of products from the fields to the dryers where the beans undergo the drying process. Her only wish is to work with the same level of urgency for which she is known so that she can get ahead.

This will be her 11th loan with MFP. She hopes to receive support so that she can continue accomplishing her goals. The 2000 PEN that she requested will be used to buy sacks of compost for fertilizing her land.

loans.use: to buy sacks of compost.

loans.name: Elmer Gilberto

texts.es:
Don Elmer tiene 42 años de edad, es divorciado y tiene dos hijos. Él ha trabajado en la agricultura desde que era un niño, y aprendió la profesión de uno de sus tíos.

Para comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cultivos, don Elmer sale a las 7 a.m de su casa y debe viajar un total de 4 horas. Para salir de su comunidad él paga para transportarse en un camión pick-up, y luego aborda un bus. Don Elmer vende un 80% de su cosecha en un mercado a 4 horas de su casa. El otro 20% lo almacena para consumo en su hogar. Don Elmer esta solicitando un préstamo de Fundación Campo para la compra de abono, herbicidas y pesticidas para sus cultivos de maíz y maicillo. El crédito le ayudará a don Elmer para poder comprar todos sus insumos al mismo tiempo, y así ahorrar en el costo del transporte.

Don Elmer sueña en un futuro poder construir un estanque y criar peces de agua dulce. De esta forma el podría mejorar sus ingresos con un nuevo producto.
texts.en:
Elmer, 42, is divorced and has two children.  He has worked in agriculture since he was a child, and he learned the profession from one of his uncles.

To buy the supplies he needs for his crops, Elmer leaves his house at 7 a.m. and has to travel a total of four hours.  To leave his community, he pays for transportation in a pick-up truck, then takes a bus.  Elmer sells 80% of his crop at a market four hours from his house.  He stores the other 20% for home consumption.

Elmer is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to buy fertilizer, herbicides, and pesticides for his corn and millet crops.  The loan will help him to be able to buy all his supplies at the same time, and so save on the cost of transportation.

Elmer dreams about being able to construct a pond to raise freshwater fish in the future.  In this way he would be able to improve his earnings with a new product.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, and pesticides for his crops.

loans.name: Jorge  Alberto

texts.es: El joven Jorge es una persona responsable y muy trabajadora,  el cual  labora  actualmente  con un dentista,  de esta  manera  obtiene ingresos  pasa  salir  adelante y  poder  ayudar   en su casa  con los   gastos  del  hogar, Jorge   nos  comenta  que desafortunadamente   hace  tiempo   sufrió un accidente  automovilístico en el  cual  perdió   algúnos de  sus dientes, es  por  ello  que  esta  muy  contento de  habernos  encontrado  ya  que   ayudaremos en la realización de  su proyecto   el cual consiste   en arreglarse  los  dientes , agradece  el apoyo  brindado.
texts.en: Jorge is a responsible and very hard-working young man who is currently working with a dentist.  In this way, he makes the income he needs to get ahead in life and help at home with the household expenses.  Jorge tells us that he unfortunately suffered a car accident some time ago and lost some of his teeth as a result.  He is very happy to have found us as we will help him to carry out his project of having his teeth fixed.  He is grateful for the support we have offered him.

loans.use: to buy dentures

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 49 años y 8 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 10 años.
Juana tiene una tienda de abarrotes en Apacucha y vende cochinilla y tara, empezó con un negocio pequeño y fue creciendo poco a poco, gracias a ello pudo educar a sus hijos, y construir su casa. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de gaseosa y cerveza para su tienda. Agradece mucho porque todo es gracias a las capacitaciones que ha recibido en su Banco Comunal y a la responsabilidad que le enseñaron. Su meta es poder terminar de hacer su casa.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the “Tarpuy” communal bank.  She’s 49 years old and has 8 children.  She’s been a member of Finca Perú for the last 10 years.

Juana has a grocery store in Apacucha and she also sells cochineal and spiny holdback.  She started out with a small store and has gradually been growing.  Thanks to it she was able to educate her children and build her house.

She will use the requested loan to buy soft-drinks and beer for her store.  She is very grateful because everything is due to the training she’s gotten in her communal bank and the responsibility she was taught.  Her goal is to be able to finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks.

loans.name: Ma  Asuncion

texts.es: La Sra.  Asunción  es una  persona   muy   responsable,  la cual cuenta  con un  negocio  de  ropa  y accesorios que le a permitido   por   varios  años salir  adelante,  en  esta  ocasión  requiere  de nuestro  apoyo para  realizar  la  compra  de mercancía   ya  que  ella se  preocupa  por  brindar  un excelente  servicio  a  sus  clientes brindándoles  la  mercancía   en el  momento  que   se lo  solicitan  ,  agradece  el  apoyo   brindado para  la realización de su  proyecto   ya  que   ve  en el crédito la posibilidad  de  hacer  crecer   su  negocio.
texts.en: Asunción is a very responsible person who has a business selling clothes and accessories that has made it possible for her to get ahead for several years.  On this occasion, she needs our support to buy merchandise because she strives to provide excellent customer service by having merchandise on hand when the customers ask for it.  She is grateful for the support provided for her project’s realization because the loan will enable her to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy clothes and accessories.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 34 años y 2 hijos, es socia de Finca Peru desde hace 11 años.
María compra y vende cochinilla y tara, el primer préstamo que obtuvo lo utilizó para comprar cochinilla. Agradece porque le ayudaron a formar su negocio, le gusta mucho el ahorro y las capacitaciones. El préstamo que solicita lo utilizará para la compra de cochinilla, y la meta que tiene ahora es poder terminar de hacer su casa.
texts.en:
María is a member of the “Tarpuy” communal bank.  She’s 34 years old and has two children.  She’s been a member of Finca Perú for the last 11 years.

María is a cochineal and spiny holdback merchant.  She used the first loan she got to buy cochineal.  She is grateful because they helped her start her business.  She likes the savings and the training very much.  She will use the requested loan to buy cochineal.  Her current goal is to be able to finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy cochineal.

loans.name: Evelyn Gabriela

texts.es: Doña Evelyn es una mujer joven con 23 años de edad, casada, madre de un niño. Vive con su esposo y su bebé. Se dedica al comercio ambulante de ropa de mujer y zapatos sin descuidar a su familia. Cuenta con el apoyo de su madre para el cuido de su hijo cuando tiene que salir a vender o cobrar su mercadería. Se dedica a la actividad hace tres años, porque tiene como objetivo superarse tanto a nivel personal como económico, y poder ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar. El préstamo lo va invertir en reforzar su negocio con mercadería para la época que se aproxima.
texts.en: Evelyn is a young, married woman and the mother of a son.  She’s 23 years old and lives with her husband and baby.  She is a street vendor of women’s clothes and shoes but does not neglect her family.  Her mother helps her out babysitting her son when she has to go out to sell or collect payment for her merchandise.  She’s been in this line of work for three years because her goal is to improve both personally and economically and help her husband meet household expenses.  She will use the loan to strengthen her business with merchandise for the season that’s approaching.

loans.use: to buy women's clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 28 años y un hijo, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 5 años.
Gladys tiene un Centro de Internet, antes ella vendía fruta, pero vió que en la cuadra donde vive no había Internet y por esa necesidad invirtió en ese negocio, le va bien gracias a las capacitaciones que ha recibido y todo el esfuerzo que ella le ha puesto a su negocio. Con el préstamo que solicita comprará un CPU. Su meta es poder comprar un terreno.
texts.en: Gladys is a member of the “Tarpuy” communal bank.  She’s 28 years old and has a son.  She’s been a member of FINCA Perú for the last five years.  Gladys has an Internet Access center.  She used to sell fruit but she saw that there was no Internet access service on her block and because of the need she invested in that business.  She does well thanks to the training she’s gotten and all the effort she’s put into her business.  She will use the requested loan to buy a CPU.  Her goal is to be able to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy a CPU.

loans.name: Alicia Bertha

texts.es:
Alicia es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 38 años y 3 hijos, es socia de Finca Peru desde hace 5 años.
Alicia tiene una panadería y servicio de lavado de carros, recuerda que con el primer crédito compró harina para hacer los panes, ella empezó con poco capital, tiene un local grande y había la posibilidad de poder poner otro negocio y  así nació  la idea de poder hacer el lavado de carros, el apoyo que le brindaron en Finca fue una base para que ella pueda progresar , todo lo que pudo aprender le ayudó a poder tener un buen negocio, ahora la meta que tiene es poder mejorar su casa.
texts.en: Alicia is a member of the “Tarpuy” communal bank.  She’s 38 years old and has three children.  She’s been a member of FINCA Perú for the last five years.  Alicia has a bakery and a car wash service.  She recalls that she used the first loan buy flour to make bread.  She started out with little capital.  She has a large locale and had the possibility of setting up another business and that’s where the idea for a car wash came from.  The support she got at FINCA was the base for her to make progress.  Everything she was able to learn helped her have a good business and now the goal she has is to be able to make some home improvements.

loans.use: to buy bread baking ingredients.

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Dionicio; el tiene 68 años de edad y es viudo y tiene 5 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de llantería, el es propietario de una tienda donde vende llantas, el socio trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de llantas. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar llantas al por mayor.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Dionicio, 68, is a member of the “Kanchary” communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.  He’s a widower and has five children.  He alternates his daily chores with a tire shop.  He owns a store where he sells tires.  He works from 9am until 7pm.  Through this business he’s able to support his children.  He wants to expand the tire sale business and is asking for a loan to buy tires at wholesale.  He is happy about the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy tires at wholesale.

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es:
Ysabel es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 64 años y 12 hijos, es socia D. FINCA Peru desD. hace 4 años. 
Ysabel lleva ropa a las ferias, recuerda que con su primer crédito compró ropa, siempre trabajo en ese rubro, pero antes trabajaba con poco capital, ahora gracias a los préstamos que ha recibido ha podido crecer y aumentar su capital. Con el préstamo que ha solicitado comprará ropa para la feria D. Huano Huano, le encanta las reuniones D. su Banco Comunal porque se distrae y recibe muchas capacitaciones D. cómo poder mejorar su negocio. Su meta es poder terminar el segundo piso D. su casa.
texts.en: Ysabel is a member of the “Tarpuy” communal bank.  She’s 64 years old and has 12 children.  She’s been a member of FINCA Perú for the last four years.  Ysabel takes clothes to the markets.  She recalls that she used her first loan to buy clothes; she’s always been in this line of work.  But she used to work with very little capital and now, thanks to the loans she’s gotten, she’s been able to grow and increase her capital.  She will use this requested loan to buy clothes at the Huano Huano market.  She loves the meetings of her communal bank because she districts herself and receives much training, like on how to improve her business.  Her goal is to finish the second story on her house.

loans.use: to buy assorted seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Rawelgyoba Pierre

texts.fr:
Mr R.Pierre est marié et père de 09 enfants. Le plus âgé a 32ans et le moins âgé a13ans. 06 vont à l’école. Il a 07 personnes en charge.

Il mène une activité d’Agropastoral et le Jardinage depuis 34ans. Il s’approvisionne à ICOBAM en ville et à kokologo village environnant. Ses clients sont les femmes et les hommes.

Il veut s’acheter des semences (05 sachets de choux et 05 sachets de salade).

Mr utilise ses bénéfices pour scolariser ses enfants et épargne le peu qui reste. Il ambitionne agrandir son jardin de légumes et continuer à assurer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mr. R. Pierre is married and the father of nine children. The oldest is 32 years old, and the youngest is 13. Six of them go to school. He has seven persons in his care. 

He has been doing agro-pastoral and market-gardening work for 34 years. He is supplied from ICOBAM in town and from Kokologo, a nearby village. His customers are women and men. 

He wants to buy some seeds (5 pouches of cabbage and 5 pouches of salad).

Mr. Pierre uses his profits to provide schooling to his children and to save the little that remains. His ambition is to expand his vegetable garden and to continuing ensuring his children's education.

loans.use: to buy seeds (5 pouches of cabbage and 5 pouches of salad)

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 42 años y 2 hijos, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 3 años.
Gloria tiene una plastiquería, y tenía el negocio de venta de ropas, empezó con poco capital, pero ahora esta muy bien en su plastiquería, empezó en lima pero a causa de un problema tuvieron que venir a Ayacucho, y una tía la invitó a ser socia del Banco Comunal y desde la fecha no se retira, con las capacitaciones  aprendió a como hacer que su negocio pueda crecer. Esta muy feliz, y con el préstamo que esta sacando viajará a Lima para poder traer descartables como platos y vasos que es lo que mas vende, su meta es poder fabricar ella misma bolsas, y esta ahorrando para ello.
texts.en: Gloria is a member of the communal bank Tarpuy.  She is 42, has two children and has been a member of Finca Perú for three years.  Gloria has a plastic merchandise store and also sells clothing.  She began with a small amount of capital but is now doing very well in her plastics business which she set up in Lima, but had to transfer to Ayacucho because of problems.  An aunt invited her to become a member of the communal bank and she has continued since then.  Through the training courses she has learned how to grow the business.  She is very pleased and plans to use the loan to travel to Lima to bring back disposables such as plates and cups which is what she sells the most.  Her goal is to start making bags and she is saving towards that end.

loans.use: To buy plates and cups.

loans.name: Ruth Liliana

texts.es:
Ruth es socia del Banco Comunal Tarpuy, tiene 30 años y 2 hijos.
Ruth tiene una tienda de Bicicletas y repuestos, ella siempre tenía este negocio, claro que antes era poco, pero ahora aumentó su capital y ventas, esta feliz porque en su Banco Comunal le brindan la ayuda que necesita, las capacitaciones y el apoyo que ha recibido han hecho que ella pueda crecer en su tienda, le encanta el ahorro que gracias a ello se puede trazar metas a largo plazo. Con el préstamo comprará repuestos para las bicicletas, la meta que siempre se traza es poder hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Ruth is a member of the communal bank Tarpuy.  She is 30 and has two children.  Ruth runs a bicycle and repair parts shop which she has had for a long time.  Before she did not have a lot of business but now her sales and capital have increased.  She is pleased that the communal bank has given her the help she needs as well as training and support so she could expand her store.  She loves being able to save so she can establish long-term goals.  She plans to use the loan to buy repair parts for the bicycles.  He ongoing goal is to grow her business.

loans.use: To buy bicycle repair parts.

loans.name: Jenny Yadira

texts.es:
Jenny es una madre soltera de 34 años. Junto a sus tres hijas vive desde que nació en la parroquia de "Río Verde" del cantón Santo Domingo. Santo Domingo de los Colorados es una de las ciudades más jóvenes del Ecuador, actualmente se ha constituido en el punto de enlace entre las región Sierra y Costa. Es un sitio privilegiado, no solo por la riqueza étnica, sino también por los paisajes inusitados que se pueden encontrar desde el ingreso mismo a esta bella ciudad. Santo Domingo de los Colorados pertenece actualmente a la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, recientemente conformada.  La fiesta principal de Santo Domingo, se celebra con un movimiento intenso de visitantes, intercambio comercial y cultural. 

Jenny trabaja vendiendo ropa y cosméticos puerta a puerta y de esta manera sustenta económicamente su hogar. Aprendió esto de unas amigas y diariamente trabaja y también dedica tiempo a sus hijos. Ella desea invertir en un lote de ropa por lo que acudió a Fundación Alternativa en busca de un crédito. Con la inversión espera tener más ingresos y así poder solventar los gastos del hogar.

Ella sueña con tener una casa propia para sus hijos y sabe que trabajando duro podrá lograr su gran meta.
texts.en:
Jenny is a single mother, aged 34.  She lives with her three daughters in the "Rio Verde" parish where she was born in the Santo Domingo Canton.  Santo Domingo de los Colorados is one of the youngest cities in Ecuador.  Currently it is the link between the Sierra region and the coast.  It is a privileged location, not only because of its rich ethnicity, but also because of the unusual landscape found upon entering this beautiful city.  Santo Domingo de los Colorados belongs to the province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, which was recently set up.  The main festivities of Santo Domingo are celebrated with crowds of visitors and many commercial and cultural exchanges.

Jenny sells clothing and cosmetics door-to-door and is able to support the household this way.  She learned her trade from friends and works every day, while also caring for her children.  In order to buy a bundle of clothing she has requested a loan through Fundación Alternativa.  With the investment she hopes to increase her income and be able to cover household expenses.

She dreams of having her own house one day for her children.  She knows that she will have to work hard to reach her goal.

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Domitila

texts.es: Domitila, de 27 años, convive con Dionicio de 36 años, con quien tiene 03 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Desde muy joven Domitila se dedicó a la actividad agrícola, específicamente al cultivo del cacao, café y frutas cítricas, actividades que lo aprendió de sus padres. Asimismo en éste trabajo cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, ya que gracias a él, le seria imposible producir cacao y café en cantidad, frutos que son requeridos en el mercado nacional e internacional. Adicionalmente nos comenta, que también se debe a las buenas técnicas agrarias lo que hace posible que sus productos sean de calidad y por ende tenga buenas ganancias. Ella esta contenta con esta labor que realiza, porque sabe que es gracias a ello que lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por el que se compromete una vez más en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles ue solicita, lo invertirá para contratar peones que ayudarán a cuidar sus plantas, podar y fertilizar.
texts.en: Domitila, 27, lives with her common-law husband, Dionicio, 36, and their three children.  They live in their own house in the district of Pichari.  From a very early age Domitila has been involved in agriculture, specifically in growing cocoa, coffee and citrus fruits.  She learned her trade from her parents.  Her husband helps her with the work or it would be impossible to produce cocoa, coffee and fruit in large quantities, as is required for the domestic and international markets.  She tells us that she also must seek out the latest agrarian techniques so her products are top quality to make a good profit.  She is very pleased with the work she does because this way she can cover the daily household expenses.  This is her second loan through MFP and she is committed to paying it back on time.  She plans to use the 3,000 PEN to hire workers to help care for, prune and fertilize the crops.

loans.use: To hire workers.

loans.name: Frolian

texts.es: Froilán, tiene la edad de 21 años, está soltero y vive con sus padres y hermanos. El con el crédito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia de café. El con el crédito comprara los fertilizantes  necesarios para asistir de la mejor forma su cafetal. El cuenta con un cafetal en condiciones regulares por lo cual quiere mejorarla y así tenerlo en condiciones buenas para la próxima cosecha. El quiere obtener de su cafetal los mejores resultados  y las mayores ganancias para su bienestar y cumplir metas que tiene planeadas para su futuro.. Es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Froilán, 21, is single and lives with parents and siblings.  He plans to use the loan to buy supplies, such as fertilizer, to improve his coffee crop.  He has a coffee plantation that is in need of improvement so he wants to prepare it for the next harvest.  He wants more income and better earnings from his coffee crop; this is for his own well-being and in order to meet the goals he has planned for his future.  This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR.  He has never had a loan through state bank, but FUDECOSUR is giving him better payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy supplies for his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan José, tiene la edad de 40 años, está casado y vive con su esposo y 3 hijos  actualmente. El con el crédito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia de café. El con el crédito comprara los fertilizantes y insumos necesarios para asistir de la mejor forma su cafetal. El cuenta con la plantación en producción y condiciones regulares por lo cual quiere mejorarla y así tenerla en condiciones optimas para la próxima cosecha. El quiere obtener de su cafetal los mejores resultados  y las mayores ganancias para así darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Juan José is 40 years old, married, and lives with his wife and three children.  He will use his loan to buy the supplies he needs to care for his coffee crops.  He will use his loan to buy fertilizers and the supplies he needs to better look after his coffee plantation.  His plantation is currently in production and in regular condition.  He would like to improve it and thereby have it in optimum condition for his next harvest.  He would like to extract the best results and the best profits from his coffee plantation so that he can provide his family with a better quality of life.  This is Juan José's first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't obtained previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have provided him with this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to care for his coffee plantation

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Guillermo, tiene la edad de 46 años, está casado y vive con su esposo e hijos  actualmente. El con el crédito va comprar una máquina de coser. El cuenta con un pequeño taller de costura en su casa además cuenta con la experiencia necesaria y el material para la realizar la confección de prendas de vestir. El quiere cumplir con la clientela que tiene y darles los trabajos encargados en un tiempo rápido y así obtener del proyecto los resultados esperados para el bienestar de su familia y mejorar su bienestar  familiar cada día.  Es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Guillermo is 46 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children.  He will use his loan to buy a sewing machine.  Guillermo has a small sewing workshop in his home.  He has the necessary experience and material to make clothes.  He would like to please his customers and return the work they have ordered from him quickly, thereby obtaining the hoped-for results from his project so that he can improve his family's well being. and continue improving it.

This is the first loan that Guillermo has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have provided him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Claudia Melissa

texts.es:
Claudia es una chica muy trabajadora, vive sola, es soltera y no tiene hijos, sus padres son muy pobres y por tanto ella se independizo a muy temprana edad para salir a adelante, actualmente vive en una cuarto pequeña en "anticretico" ( anticretico, es un tipo de prestamo o transacción, en el cual la persona que da en anticretico su casa, recibe un dinero que esta siendole prestado mientras el preste su casa, normalmente el que recibe el dinero lo usa para comercio o para invertir en otras cosas) 
Ahora bien, claudia esta ampliando el anticretico por que le estan brindando una habitacion extra para que pueda vivir mejor, con mas espacio. Para este motivo es que ella solicito un prestamo a nuestra institucion que es financiada por Kiva, a la vez ella esta muy agradecida a "Kiva" por este apoyo que le brindan.
